atk-s0102a:13_8: Antojetavane kira karerikuṭi kosambakuṭi gandhakuṭi salaḷāgāranti cattāri mahāgehāni,
atk-s0102a:13_12: Iti bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā thambhānaṃ upari kāritāya devavimānakappāya karerikuṭikāyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0102a:13_13: Pacchābhattanti ekāsanikakhalupacchābhattikānaṃ pātova bhuttānaṃ antomajjhanhikepi pacchābhattameva.
atk-s0102a:14_0: Karerimaṇḍalamāḷeti tasseva karerimaṇḍapassa avidūre katāya nisīdanasālāya.
atk-s0102a:14_1: So kira karerimaṇḍapo gandhakuṭikāya ca sālāya ca antare hoti,
atk-s0102a:14_5: dvepi jātiyo”ti evaṃ vibhattena pubbenivutthakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsena saddhiṃ yojetvā pavattitā.
atk-s0102a:15_4: sāvakā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhā ca anussaranti.
atk-s0102a:16_2: Paṭipāṭiyā anussarantāpi asaññabhavaṃ patvā khandhappavattiṃ na passanti,
atk-s0102a:16_4: kūpe patitā paṅguḷā viya ca honti.
atk-s0102a:16_7: Iti titthiyānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0102a:16_8: Yathā hi andhā yaṭṭhikoṭiggāhake satiyeva gacchanti,
atk-s0102a:17_2: Evaṃ santepi te vaṭṭe saṃsaraṇakasattānaṃ khandhānaṃ abhāvakālo nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:17_3: Asaññabhave pana pañcakappasatāni pavattantīti tattakaṃ kālaṃ atikkamitvā buddhehi dinnanaye ṭhatvā parato anussaranti;
atk-s0102a:17_5: Dve aggasāvakā pana paccekabuddhā ca cutipaṭisandhiṃ oloketvā anussaranti.
atk-s0102a:18_0: Titthiyā ca pubbenivāsaṃ anussaramānā attanā diṭṭhakatasutameva anussaranti.
atk-s0102a:18_2: Buddhā pana attanā vā parehi vā diṭṭhakatasutaṃ sabbameva anussaranti.
atk-s0102a:19_5: Tassa ettakāni jātisatāni jātisahassāni jātisatasahassānīti vā ettakāni kappasatāni kappasahassāni kappasatasahassānīti vā natthi,
atk-s0102a:19_10: sinerukūṭe vissaṭṭhaindavajiraṃ viya ca asajjamānameva gacchati.
atk-s0102a:19_11: “Aho mahantaṃ bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇa”nti evaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva ārabbha kathā uppannā,
atk-s0102a:20_2: atha bhagavā anuppattoti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:20_10: “ime bhikkhū mama pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇaṃ thomenti,
atk-s0102a:20_11: pubbenivāsañāṇassa pana me nipphattiṃ na jānanti;
atk-s0102a:20_12: handa nesaṃ tassa nipphattiṃ kathetvā dassāmī”ti āgantvā pakatiyāpi buddhānaṃ nisīditvā dhammadesanatthameva
atk-s0102a:20_13: ṭhapite taṅkhaṇe bhikkhūhi papphoṭetvā dinne varabuddhāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0102a:20_15: bhante”tiādipaṭivacanassa ca pariyosāne tesaṃ pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetukāmo iccheyyātha notiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:20_17: Atha naṃ pahaṭṭhamānasā bhikkhū yācamānā etassa bhagavātiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:21_1: Atha bhagavā tesaṃ yācanaṃ gahetvā kathetukāmo “tena hi,
atk-s0102a:21_3: suṇāthā”ti te sotāvadhāraṇasādhukamanasikāresu niyojetvā aññesaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇaṃ pakāsetukāmo ito so,
atk-s0102a:21_5: Tattha yaṃ vipassīti yasmiṃ kappe vipassī.
atk-s0102a:21_7: devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:21_11: aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī”tiādīsu upayogavacane.
atk-s0102a:22_0: Bhaddakappeti pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe sārakappeti bhagavā imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāha.
atk-s0102a:22_1: Yato paṭṭhāya kira amhākaṃ bhagavatā abhinīhāro kato,
atk-s0102a:22_2: etasmiṃ antare ekakappepi pañca buddhā nibbattā nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:22_3: Amhākaṃ bhagavato abhinīhārassa purato pana taṇhaṅkaro,
atk-s0102a:22_6: dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:22_7: Tesaṃ orabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhasuññameva ahosi.
atk-s0102a:23_0: Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne pana koṇḍañño nāma buddho ekova ekasmiṃ kappe uppanno.
atk-s0102a:23_3: sobhitoti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā.
atk-s0102a:23_5: Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne pana ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa upari anomadassī, padumo,
atk-s0102a:23_6: nāradoti tayo buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā.
atk-s0102a:23_8: Asaṅkhyeyyakappapariyosāne pana ito kappasatasahassānaṃ upari padumuttaro bhagavā ekova ekasmiṃ kappe uppanno.
atk-s0102a:23_9: Tassa orabhāge ito tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ upari sumedho,
atk-s0102a:23_10: sujātoti dve buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā.
atk-s0102a:23_11: Tato orabhāge ito aṭṭhārasannaṃ kappasahassānaṃ upari piyadassī,
atk-s0102a:23_13: dhammadassīti tayo buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā.
atk-s0102a:23_14: Atha ito catunavutikappe siddhattho nāma buddho ekova ekasmiṃ kappe uppanno.
atk-s0102a:23_16: phussoti dve buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe uppannā.
atk-s0102a:23_22: gotamo amhākaṃ sammāsambuddhoti cattāro buddhā uppannā,
atk-s0102a:23_24: Evamayaṃ kappo pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappo sārakappoti bhagavā imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāha.
atk-s0102a:24_1: “imasmiṃ kappe ettakā buddhā uppannā vā uppajjissantīti vā”ti,
atk-s0102a:24_5: Kappasaṇṭhānakālasmiñhi ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ ekaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite lokasannivāse lokassa saṇṭhānatthāya devo vassituṃ ārabhati.
atk-s0102a:24_7: Tato tilamattā kaṇamattā taṇḍulamattā mugga- māsa- badara- āmalaka- eḷāluka-
atk-s0102a:24_10: yojanasatayojanasahassayojanasatasahassamattā hutvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷabbhantare yāva avinaṭṭhabrahmalokā pūretvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0102a:25_0: Manussalokasaṇṭhahanaṭṭhānaṃ pana patte udake dhamakaraṇamukhe pihite viya vātavasena taṃ udakaṃ santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0102a:25_4: Tattha pubbanimittaṃ hutvā eko paduminigaccho uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:25_5: tassa sace tasmiṃ kappe buddho nibbattissati,
atk-s0102a:25_9: ekaṃ uppajjati. Sace dve, tayo, cattāro,
atk-s0102a:25_12: Tāni ca kho ekasmiṃyeva nāḷe kaṇṇikābaddhāni hutvā.
atk-s0102a:25_20: cha devalokā nava brahmalokā suññā bhavissantī”ti anattamanā honti.
atk-s0102a:25_22: “sabbaññubodhisattesu mātukucchiṃ okkamantesu nikkhamantesu sambujjhantesu dhammacakkaṃ pavattentesu
atk-s0102a:25_23: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karontesu devorohanaṃ karontesu āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajjantesu parinibbāyantesu dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanādīni
atk-s0102a:25_25: cha devalokā nava brahmalokā paripūressantī”ti ca attamanā udānaṃ udānentā attano attano brahmalokaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:25_27: Tesaṃ nimittānaṃ ānubhāvena cattāro buddhā uppannā,
atk-s0102a:25_29: Suddhāvāsabrahmānopi tāni padumāni disvā imamatthaṃ jāniṃsu.
atk-s0102a:27_2: bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena kappaparicchedavasena pubbenivāsaṃ dassetvā idāni tesaṃ buddhānaṃ jātiparicchedādivasena dassetuṃ vipassī,
atk-s0102a:27_4: Tattha āyuparicchede parittaṃ lahukanti ubhayametaṃ appakasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:28_0: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato vā upari appaṃ,
atk-s0102a:28_1: aññaṃ vassasataṃ apatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati.
atk-s0102a:28_3: asuko kira evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatīti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hoti.
atk-s0102a:29_0: Vipassīādayo pana sabbepi bodhisattā mettāpubbabhāgena somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttaasaṅkhārikacittena mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:29_1: Tena cittena gahitāya paṭisandhiyā asaṅkhyeyyaṃ āyu,
atk-s0102a:30_14: Evaṃ yāva bhavaggā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbā devabrahmaparisāpi adhammikāva honti.
atk-s0102a:30_18: vimānesu khobhitesu devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittāni na namanti,
atk-s0102a:30_19: devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittesu anamantesu sītuṇhabhedo utu yathākālena na sampajjati,
atk-s0102a:30_20: tasmiṃ asampajjante na sammā devo vassati,
atk-s0102a:30_25: vassantopi vappakāle aṅkurakāle nāḷakāle pupphakāle khīraggahaṇādikālesu yathā yathā sassānaṃ upakāro na hoti,
atk-s0102a:30_26: tathā tathā vassati ca vigacchati ca,
atk-s0102a:30_29: Ekabhājane pakkhittataṇḍulesupi ekasmiṃ padese bhattaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:31_1: tadā uparājānopi dhammikā hontīti purimanayeneva yāva brahmalokā sabbepi dhammikā honti.
atk-s0102a:31_5: tesaṃ akhobhā devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittāni namanti.
atk-s0102a:31_8: vappakālato paṭṭhāya sassānaṃ upakāraṃ karonto kāle vassati,
atk-s0102a:31_10: tena sassāni samapākāni sugandhāni suvaṇṇāni surasāni ojavantāni honti,
atk-s0102a:31_11: tehi sampāditaṃ bhojanaṃ paribhuttampi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0102a:32_1: sikhī sattativassasahassāyukakāleti idaṃ anupubbena parihīnasadisaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0102a:32_4: Imasmiṃ tāva kappe kakusandho bhagavā cattālīsavassasahassāyukakāle nibbatto,
atk-s0102a:32_5: āyuppamāṇaṃ pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāri ṭhatvā pañcame vijjamāneyeva parinibbuto.
atk-s0102a:32_6: Taṃ āyu parihāyamānaṃ dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ hutvā tato parihāyamānaṃ tiṃsavassasahassakāle ṭhitaṃ;
atk-s0102a:32_8: Tasmimpi tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ hutvā parihāyitvā vīsativassasahassakāle ṭhitaṃ;
atk-s0102a:32_10: Tasmimpi tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ hutvā parihāyitvā vassasatakālaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0102a:32_12: Evaṃ anupubbena parihāyitvā parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:32_13: Tattha yaṃ yaṃ āyuparimāṇesu manussesu buddhā nibbattanti,
atk-s0102a:32_14: tesampi taṃ tadeva āyuparimāṇaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:35_1: Bodhiparicchede pana pāṭaliyā mūleti pāṭalirukkhassa heṭṭhā.
atk-s0102a:35_2: Tassā pana pāṭaliyā khandho taṃ divasaṃ paṇṇāsaratano hutvā abbhuggato,
atk-s0102a:35_4: Taṃ divasañca sā pāṭali kaṇṇikābaddhehi viya pupphehi mūlato paṭṭhāya ekasañchannā ahosi,
atk-s0102a:35_14: Mahāsamuddopi pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi nīluppalarattuppalehi ca sañchanno ahosi.
atk-s0102a:35_20: Abhisambuddhoti sakalaṃ buddhaguṇavibhavasiriṃ paṭivijjhamāno cattāri saccāni abhisambuddho.
atk-s0102a:36_2: bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho puṇḍarīkassa mūle abhisambuddho”tiādīsupi imināva nayena padavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:36_5: Taṃ divasañca sopi dibbagandhehi pupphehi susañchanno ahosi.
atk-s0102a:36_11: ekato supakkāni pakkhittadibbojāni viya surasāni olambanti. Yathā so,
atk-s0102a:37_10: Tesu yassa yassa rukkhassa mūle catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātabodhiṃ buddhā paṭivijjhanti,
atk-s0102a:39_1: Sāvakayugaparicchede pana khaṇḍatissanti khaṇḍo ca tisso ca.
atk-s0102a:39_6: Agganti ṭhapetvā vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ avasesehi saddhiṃ asadisaguṇatāya uttamaṃ.
atk-s0102a:39_10: Sikhinā bhagavatā saddhiṃ aruṇavatito brahmalokaṃ gantvā brahmaparisāya vividhāni pāṭihāriyāni dassento
atk-s0102a:40_6: Samāpajjanabahulo rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭileṇamaṇḍapādīsu samāpattibalena jhāyanto ekadivasaṃ araññe nirodhaṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0102a:40_8: So yathāparicchedena samāpattito uṭṭhāya cīvarāni papphoṭetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0102a:42_1: Sāvakasannipātaparicchede vipassissa bhagavato paṭhamasannipāto caturaṅgiko ahosi,
atk-s0102a:42_5: iti te ca kho pannarase uposathadivase.
atk-s0102a:42_6: Atha satthā bījaniṃ gahetvā nisinno uposathaṃ osāresi.
atk-s0102a:42_9: Yasmā pana amhākaṃ bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyāva sannipāto ahosi,
atk-s0102a:42_13: etarahi eko sāvakānaṃ sannipāto”ti aniṭṭhapetvā “ahosī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:43_1: dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ parivārāni aḍḍhateyyasatānīti aḍḍhateḷasāni bhikkhusatāni.
atk-s0102a:43_2: Tattha dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya vatthuṃ kathetvā pabbajjā dīpetabbā.
atk-s0102a:43_3: Pabbajitānaṃ pana tesaṃ mahāmoggallāno sattame divase arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0102a:43_4: Dhammasenāpati pannarasame divase gijjhakūṭapabbatamajjhe sūkarakhataleṇapabbhāre bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa
atk-s0102a:43_5: sajjite dhammayāge vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne desanaṃ anubujjhamānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ patto.
atk-s0102a:43_6: Bhagavā therassa arahattappattiṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā veḷuvaneyeva paccuṭṭhāsi. Thero –
atk-s0102a:43_7: “kuhiṃ nu kho bhagavā gato”ti āvajjanto veḷuvane patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā sayampi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā veḷuvaneyeva paccuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:45_1: Upaṭṭhākaparicchede pana ānandoti nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:45_2: Bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ anibaddhā upaṭṭhākā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:45_10: Tattha ekadā bhagavā nāgasamālattherena saddhiṃ addhānamaggapaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ patto.
atk-s0102a:45_15: iminā maggena gacchāmā”ti āha. So – “handa, bhagavā,
atk-s0102a:45_17: ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ chamāyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0102a:45_20: Tassapi bhikkhuno itarena maggena gacchato corā pattacīvarañceva hariṃsu,
atk-s0102a:45_23: na añño”ti cintetvā lohitena gaḷitena bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:45_24: “Kimidaṃ bhikkhū”ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0102a:45_27: etaṃyeva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā nivārayimhā”ti vatvā naṃ samassāsesi.
atk-s0102a:46_0: Ekadā pana bhagavā meghiyattherena saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃsamigadāye jantugāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:46_1: Tatrāpi meghiyo jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā nadītīre pāsādikaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā – “bhagavā,
atk-s0102a:46_3: ahaṃ tasmiṃ ambavane samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti vatvā bhagavatā tikkhattuṃ nivāriyamānopi gantvā akusalavitakkehi upadduto anvāsatto.
atk-s0102a:46_6: “idameva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā nivārayimhā”ti vatvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:46_7: Tattha gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0102a:46_10: ‘ekacce bhikkhū iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti,
atk-s0102a:46_14: Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0102a:46_15: tumheyeva patthayamāno satasahassakappādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūrayiṃ,
atk-s0102a:46_16: nanu mādiso mahāpañño upaṭṭhāko nāma vaṭṭati,
atk-s0102a:46_23: na me tayā upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ atthī”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0102a:46_24: Etenevupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ katvā asītimahāsāvakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:47_17: catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci.
atk-s0102a:48_1: bhagavā attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ na dassati,
atk-s0102a:48_15: ko evaṃ upaṭṭhahato bhāro’ti” ime cattāro paṭikkhepe yāci.
atk-s0102a:49_2: sacāhaṃ tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataṃ parisaṃ āgatakkhaṇe eva bhagavantaṃ dassetuṃ lacchāmi,
atk-s0102a:49_5: yaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ parammukhā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0102a:49_10: saddhā kulaputtā bhagavato okāsaṃ alabhantā maṃ evaṃ vadanti – ‘sve,
atk-s0102a:49_12: bhagavatā saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇheyyāthā’ti,
atk-s0102a:49_13: sace bhante bhagavā tattha na gamissati,
atk-s0102a:49_28: kasmā tvaṃ chāyā viya bhagavantaṃ avijahanto dīgharattaṃ vicarasī’ti.
atk-s0102a:49_29: Tenāhaṃ parammukhā desitassapi dhammassa puna kathanaṃ icchāmī”ti imā catasso āyācanā yāci.
atk-s0102a:50_0: Evaṃ ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0102a:50_1: Tasseva ṭhānantarassatthāya kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇīti imassa nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ sandhāya – “mayhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:50_3: etarahi ānando bhikkhu upaṭṭhāko aggupaṭṭhāko”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:52_2: “na tāva mayā sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ vaṃso nirantaraṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathito,
atk-s0102a:52_3: ajja mayi pana vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe ime bhikkhū bhiyyoso mattāya pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ ārabbha vaṇṇaṃ kathayissanti.
atk-s0102a:52_4: Athāhaṃ āgantvā nirantaraṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ kathetvā matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ kathāvārassa okāsaṃ datvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0102a:55_0: Sabbabodhisattānañhi ekasmiṃ kulavaṃsānurūpe putte jāte nikkhamitvā pabbajitabbanti ayameva vaṃso,
atk-s0102a:55_2: Sabbaññubodhisattānañhi mātukucchiṃ okkamanato paṭṭhāya pubbe vuttappakārāni anekāni pāṭihāriyāni honti,
atk-s0102a:55_3: tatra nesaṃ yadi neva jātanagaraṃ, na pitā, na mātā,
atk-s0102a:55_9: devo vā sakko vā māro vā brahmā vā esa maññe,
atk-s0102a:55_10: devānañca īdisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ anacchariya”nti maññamāno jano neva sotabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:55_16: “ekasmiṃ kulavaṃsānurūpe putte jāte nikkhamitvā pabbajitabba”nti ayameva vaṃso ayaṃ paveṇī.
atk-s0102a:55_17: Tasmā puttādīnaṃ vasena sambahulavāro ānetvā dīpetabbo.
atk-s0102a:60_0: Ete tāva sattannampi bodhisattānaṃ anukkameneva satta puttā veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:61_0: Tattha rāhulabhadde tāva jāte paṇṇaṃ āharitvā mahāpurisassa hatthe ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:61_1: Athassa tāvadeva sakalasarīraṃ khobhetvā puttasineho aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:61_5: tesu ekekasmiṃ jāte idaṃ sinehabandhanaṃ evaṃ vaḍḍhantaṃ dubbhejjaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:61_8: Taṃ divasameva ca rajjaṃ pahāya nikkhanto.
atk-s0102a:62_0: Sutanā sabbakāmā ca, sucittā atha rocinī;
atk-s0102a:63_0: Rucaggatī sunandā ca, bimbā bhavati sattamāti.
atk-s0102a:64_0: Etā tesaṃ sattannampi puttānaṃ mātaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:64_1: Bimbādevī pana rāhulakumāre jāte rāhulamātāti paññāyittha.
atk-s0102a:65_0: Vipassī kakusandhoti ime pana dve bodhisattā payuttaājaññarathamāruyha mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:65_1: Sikhī koṇāgamanoti ime dve hatthikkhandhavaragatā hutvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:65_3: Kassapo uparipāsāde mahātale nisinnova ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānā uṭṭhāya taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā –
atk-s0102a:65_9: Mahāpurisopi satta divasāni padhānamanuyuñjitvā bodhipallaṅke nisīditvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0102a:65_10: Amhākaṃ pana bodhisatto kaṇṭakaṃ assavaramāruyha nikkhantoti.
atk-s0102a:66_0: Vipassissa pana bhagavato yojanappamāṇe padese vihāro patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0102a:67_0: Vipassissa pana bhagavato ekaratanāyāmā vidatthivitthārā aṭṭhaṅgulubbedhā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakā kāretvā cūḷaṃsena chādetvā vihāraṭṭhānaṃ kiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:67_2: Vessabhussa suvaṇṇahatthipādāni kāretvā tesaṃ cūḷaṃsena chādetvā kiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:67_6: Amhākaṃ bhagavato salakkhaṇānaṃ kahāpaṇānaṃ cūḷaṃsena chādetvā kiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:68_0: Tattha vipassissa bhagavato tathā bhūmiṃ kiṇitvā vihāraṃ katvā dinnupaṭṭhāko punabbasumitto nāma ahosi,
atk-s0102a:69_5: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti.
atk-s0102a:70_7: Tathā hi dīpaṅkarassa vassasatasahassaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0102a:71_0: Pamāṇavemattaṃ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā.
atk-s0102a:72_2: Padhānavemattaṃ nāma kesañci padhānaṃ ittarakālameva hoti,
atk-s0102a:73_0: Rasmivemattaṃ nāma maṅgalassa bhagavato sarīrarasmi dasasahassilokadhātuppamāṇā ahosi.
atk-s0102a:73_5: Maṅgalassa pana niccampi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharatūti ajjhāsayo ahosi.
atk-s0102a:73_6: Paṭividdhaguṇesu pana kassaci vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:74_0: Aparaṃ amhākaṃyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca dīpesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:74_10: Visākhānakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto ca.
atk-s0102a:75_1: Idāni atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnantiādīsu te bhikkhū – “āvuso,
atk-s0102a:75_4: Yaṃ pana idaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya pacchāmukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā cuti gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:75_6: Ākāse padaṃ dassento viya bhagavā kathesī”ti ativimhayajātā hutvā –
atk-s0102a:75_8: āvuso,”tiādīni vatvā puna aparampi kāraṇaṃ dassento –
atk-s0102a:75_10: Tattha yatra hi nāmāti acchariyatthe nipāto,
atk-s0102a:75_12: Chinnapapañceti ettha papañcā nāma taṇhā māno diṭṭhīti ime tayo kilesā.
atk-s0102a:75_26: Evaṃvihārīti ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahitova puna kasmā gahitameva gaṇhātīti ce;
atk-s0102a:75_29: Tasmā evaṃ nirodhasamāpattivihārī te bhagavanto ahesunti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:76_5: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitehi nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:76_6: Aniccānupassanādikā sattānupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīkaṅgavasena pariccattāhi niccasaññādīhi vimuttattā tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:76_7: Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṃ samucchinnehi kilesehi vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:76_8: Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni maggānubhāvena kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhante uppannattā paṭippassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:76_9: Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0102a:78_5: dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā”ti ca “devatāpi tathāgatassa etamatthaṃ ārocesu”nti ca imehi dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:78_6: Tattha devatārocanapadaṃ suttantapariyosāne devacārikakolāhalaṃ dassento vicāressati.
atk-s0102a:78_8: Tattha khattiyo jātiyātiādīni ekādasapadāni nidānakaṇḍe vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0102a:80_2: vipassī bodhisattotiādīsu pana vipassīti tassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0102a:80_3: tañca kho vividhe atthe passanakusalatāya laddhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:80_5: Bodhisaṅkhātesu vā catūsu maggesu satto āsatto laggamānasoti bodhisatto.
atk-s0102a:80_8: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā mātukucchiṃ okkamīti attho.
atk-s0102a:80_9: Okkamīti iminā cassa okkantabhāvo pāḷiyaṃ dassito,
atk-s0102a:81_8: Vipassī bodhisattopi tatheva katvā tusitapure nibbattitvā saṭṭhisatasahassādhikā sattapaññāsa vassakoṭiyo tattha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:81_9: Aññadā pana dīghāyukadevaloke nibbattā bodhisattā na yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0102a:81_12: Pāramīnaṃ pūrento pana yathā idāni ekena attabhāvena sabbaññutaṃ upanetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0102a:81_13: evaṃ sabbaso pūritattā tadā vipassī bodhisatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:82_1: “manussānaṃ gaṇanāvasena idāni sattahi divasehi cuti bhavissatī”ti pañca pubbanimittāni uppajjanti –
atk-s0102a:82_8: tā kira saṭṭhisatasahassādhikā sattapaṇṇāsa vassakoṭiyo amilāyitvā tadā milāyanti.
atk-s0102a:82_10: Ettakaṃ pana kālaṃ devānaṃ neva sītaṃ na uṇhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:82_11: tasmiṃ kāle sarīrā bindubinduvasena sedā muccanti.
atk-s0102a:82_12: Ettakañca kālaṃ tesaṃ sarīre khaṇḍiccapāliccādivasena vivaṇṇatā na paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:82_15: maraṇakāle pana tesaṃ kilantarūpo attabhāvo hoti.
atk-s0102a:82_16: Ettakañca tesaṃ kālaṃ devaloke ukkaṇṭhitā nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:83_0: Imāni pana pubbanimittāni yathā loke mahāpuññānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃyeva ukkāpātabhūmicālacandaggāhādīni nimittāni paññāyanti,
atk-s0102a:83_4: Yathā ca manussesu pubbanimittāni nakkhattapāṭhakādayova jānanti, na sabbe;
atk-s0102a:83_7: Tattha ye mandena kusalakammena nibbattā devaputtā,
atk-s0102a:83_14: bhāvitaṃ bhāvanaṃ āgamma upari devalokesu sampattiṃ anubhavissāmā”ti na bhāyanti.
atk-s0102a:83_15: Vipassī bodhisattopi tāni pubbanimittāni disvā “idāni anantare attabhāve buddho bhavissāmī”ti na bhāyati.
atk-s0102a:83_16: Athassa tesu nimittesu pātubhūtesu dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā – “mārisa,
atk-s0102a:83_17: tumhehi dasa pāramiyo pūrentehi na sakkasampattiṃ,
atk-s0102a:83_21: lokanittharaṇatthāya pana buddhattaṃ patthayamānehi pūritā. So vo,
atk-s0102a:84_0: Atha mahāsatto tāsaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāladīpadesakulajanettiāyuparicchedavasena pañcamahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi.
atk-s0102a:84_3: Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaāyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0102a:84_4: Tadā hi sattānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇāni na paññāyanti,
atk-s0102a:84_13: Vassasatato ūnaāyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0102a:84_15: ussannakilesānañca dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0102a:84_19: vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma,
atk-s0102a:85_0: Tato dīpaṃ vilokento saparivāre cattāro dīpe oloketvā –
atk-s0102a:86_3: katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā nibbattantī”ti desaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi.
atk-s0102a:86_5: “puratthimāya disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo”tiādinā nayena vinaye vuttova.
atk-s0102a:86_9: Etasmiñhi padese buddhā paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahāsāvakā cakkavattirājāno aññe ca mahesakkhā khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatimahāsālā uppajjanti.
atk-s0102a:87_4: bandhumā nāma me rājā pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi.
atk-s0102a:88_6: “kittakaṃ panassā āyū”ti āvajjanto “dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari satta divasānī”ti passi.
atk-s0102a:89_2: buddhabhāvāyā”ti devatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karonto paṭiññaṃ datvā –
atk-s0102a:89_4: tumhe”ti tā devatā uyyojetvā tusitadevatāhi parivuto tusitapure nandanavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0102a:89_6: Tatra naṃ devatā ito cuto sugatiṃ gacchāti pubbekatakusalakammokāsaṃ sārayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0102a:89_7: So evaṃ devatāhi kusalaṃ sārayamānāhi parivuto tattha vicarantoyeva cavi.
atk-s0102a:90_4: “Imasmiṃ me ṭhāne paṭisandhiṃ gahitā”ti evaṃ pana jānāti.
atk-s0102a:90_11: Yasmā pana teneva cittena taṃ cittaṃ ñātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0102a:90_17: Evaṃ sato sampajāno mātukucchiṃ okkamanto pana ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhicittesu mettāpubbabhāgassa somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttaasaṅkhārikakusalacittassa
atk-s0102a:90_21: evaṃ sopi āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0102a:91_0: Tadā kira pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya vigatasurāpānaṃ mālāgandhādivibhūtisampannaṃ nakkhattakīḷaṃ
atk-s0102a:91_1: anubhavamānā bodhisattamātā sattame divase pāto uṭṭhāya gandhodakena nahāyitvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā
atk-s0102a:91_2: varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā sirisayane nipannā niddaṃ okkamamānā
atk-s0102a:91_4: “cattāro kira naṃ mahārājāno sayaneneva saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā anotattadahaṃ netvā nahāpetvā dibbavatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:91_9: Atha bodhisatto setavaravāraṇo hutvā tato avidūre eko suvaṇṇapabbato,
atk-s0102a:91_10: tattha caritvā tato oruyha rajatapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā kanakavimānaṃ pavisitvā mātaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0102a:92_0: Atha pabuddhā devī taṃ supinaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0102a:92_1: Rājā vibhātāya rattiyā catusaṭṭhimatte brāhmaṇapāmokkhe pakkosāpetvā haritūpalittāya lājādīhi katamaṅgalasakkārāya
atk-s0102a:92_2: bhūmiyā mahārahāni āsanāni paññapetvā tattha nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ sappimadhusakkarābhisaṅkhatassa varapāyāsassa
atk-s0102a:92_5: Atha nesaṃ sabbakāmasantappitānaṃ taṃ supinaṃ ārocetvā –
atk-s0102a:92_10: so ca kho purisagabbho na itthigabbho,
atk-s0102a:93_0: Ayamettha dhammatāti ayaṃ ettha mātukucchiokkamane dhammatā,
atk-s0102a:94_4: Apica ekā kira itthī sāmikena saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā ubbandhitvā maritukāmā rajjupāse gīvaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0102a:94_5: Aññataro puriso vāsiṃ nisento taṃ itthikammaṃ disvā rajjuṃ chinditukāmo –
atk-s0102a:95_0: Tesu tesu janapadesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle ekappahāreneva rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalagahaṇādīni,
atk-s0102a:95_4: padumānaṃ divā vikasanaṃ rattiṃ milāyananti evamādi utuniyāmo.
atk-s0102a:97_0: Purimā purimā cittacetasikā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayena
atk-s0102a:97_1: paccayoti evaṃ yadetaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ anantarā sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ nibbattanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:98_0: Yā panesā bodhisattānaṃ mātukucchiokkamanādīsu dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīnaṃ pavatti,
atk-s0102a:98_3: Tasmā tamevatthaṃ dassento dhammatā esā bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:99_1: Tattha kucchiṃ okkamatīti ettha kucchiṃ okkanto hotīti ayamevattho.
atk-s0102a:99_7: Uḷārāni uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantītiādīsu hi madhuraṃ uḷāranti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:99_8: Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsāya pasaṃsatītiādīsu seṭṭhaṃ uḷāranti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:99_10: Devānaṃ devānubhāvanti ettha devānaṃ ayamānubhāvo nivatthavatthassa pabhā dvādasayojanāni pharati,
atk-s0102a:100_0: Lokantarikāti tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekeko lokantariko hoti,
atk-s0102a:100_1: tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ pattānaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ āhacca ṭhapitānaṃ majjhe okāso viya.
atk-s0102a:100_2: So pana lokantarikanirayo parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahasso hoti.
atk-s0102a:100_8: Evaṃmahiddhikāti candimasūriyā kira ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyanti,
atk-s0102a:100_10: Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti,
atk-s0102a:101_0: Yepi tattha sattāti yepi tasmiṃ lokantarikamahāniraye sattā uppannā.
atk-s0102a:101_1: Kiṃ pana kammaṃ katvā tattha uppajjantīti.
atk-s0102a:101_2: Bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca upari aparādhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:101_3: aññañca divase divase pāṇavadhādisāhasikakammaṃ katvā uppajjanti,
atk-s0102a:101_7: Te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapabbate lagganti.
atk-s0102a:101_8: Yadā saṃsappantā aññamaññassa hatthapāsaṃ gatā honti,
atk-s0102a:101_9: atha “bhakkho no laddho”ti maññamānā tattha vāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārakaudake patanti,
atk-s0102a:101_10: vāte paharantepi madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti,
atk-s0102a:101_11: patitamattāva accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya vilīyanti.
atk-s0102a:102_0: Aññepi kira bho santi sattāti bho yathā mayaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavāma,
atk-s0102a:102_1: evaṃ aññe kira sattāpi imaṃ dukkhamanubhavanatthāya idhūpapannāti taṃ divasaṃ passanti.
atk-s0102a:102_2: Ayaṃ pana obhāso ekayāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0102a:103_1: Cattāro naṃ devaputtā cātuddisaṃ rakkhāya upagacchantīti ettha cattāroti catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:103_2: Dasasahassacakkavāḷesu pana cattāro cattāro katvā cattālīsasahassāni honti.
atk-s0102a:103_3: Tattha imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe mahārājāno khaggahatthā bodhisattassa ārakkhatthāya upagantvā sirigabbhaṃ paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0102a:103_4: itare gabbhadvārato paṭṭhāya avaruddhake paṃsupisācakādiyakkhagaṇe paṭikkamāpetvā yāva cakkavāḷā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:104_1: Nanu paṭisandhikkhaṇe kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi koṭisatasahassamārā koṭisatasahassasineruṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0102a:104_2: bodhisattassa vā bodhisattamātuyā vā antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ,
atk-s0102a:104_17: tena parupakkamena na tesaṃ jīvitantarāyo atthi,
atk-s0102a:104_18: santi kho pana amanussā virūpā duddasikā bheravarūpā migapakkhino,
atk-s0102a:104_19: yesaṃ rūpaṃ vā disvā saddaṃ vā sutvā bodhisattamātu bhayaṃ vā santāso vā uppajjeyya,
atk-s0102a:104_21: Apica bodhisattassa puññatejena sañjātagāravā attano gāravacoditāpi te evamakaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:105_0: Kiṃ pana te antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā ṭhitā cattāro mahārājāno bodhisattassa mātuyā attānaṃ dassenti,
atk-s0102a:105_3: sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā varasayane nipannakāle pana dassenti.
atk-s0102a:105_4: Tattha kiñcāpi amanussadassanaṃ nāma manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:105_5: bodhisattassa mātā pana attano ceva puttassa ca puññānubhāvena te disvā na bhāyati,
atk-s0102a:105_6: pakatiantepurapālakesu viya assā etesu cittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:106_2: Anuppanne kira buddhe manussā tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ santike vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sīlaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0102a:106_3: Bodhisattamātāpi kāladevilassa isino santike sīlaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:106_4: Bodhisatte pana kucchigate aññassa pādamūle nisīdituṃ nāma na sakkā,
atk-s0102a:106_6: Tasmā sayameva sīlaṃ aggahesīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:107_1: Purisesūti bodhisattassa pitaraṃ ādiṃ katvā kesuci manussesu purisādhippāyacittaṃ nuppajjati.
atk-s0102a:107_2: Bodhisattamāturūpaṃ pana kusalā sippikā potthakammādīsupi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:107_3: Taṃ disvā purisassa rāgo nuppajjatīti na sakkā vattuṃ,
atk-s0102a:107_4: sace pana taṃ rattacitto upasaṅkamitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0102a:108_1: Pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānanti pubbe kāmaguṇūpasañhitanti iminā purisādhippāyavasena vatthupaṭikkhepo kato,
atk-s0102a:108_3: Tadā kira deviyā evarūpo putto kucchiṃ upapannoti sutvā samantato rājāno mahagghaābharaṇatūriyādivasena
atk-s0102a:108_5: Bodhisattassa ca bodhisattamātu ca katakammassa ussannattā lābhasakkārassa pamāṇaparicchedo natthi.
atk-s0102a:109_1: Akilantakāyāti yathā aññā itthiyo gabbhabhārena kilamanti hatthapādā uddhumātatādīni pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0102a:109_4: Passatīti kalalādikālaṃ atikkamitvā sañjātaaṅgapaccaṅgaahīnindriyabhāvaṃ upagataṃyeva passati.
atk-s0102a:109_7: Yatheva hi mātā puttena saddhiṃ nipannā vā nisinnā vā –
atk-s0102a:109_8: “hatthaṃ vāssa pādaṃ vā olambantaṃ ukkhipitvā saṇṭhapessāmī”ti sukhavāsatthaṃ puttaṃ oloketi,
atk-s0102a:109_9: evaṃ bodhisattamātāpi yaṃ taṃ mātu uṭṭhānagamanaparivattananisajjādīsu uṇhasītaloṇikatittakakaṭukāhāraajjhoharaṇakālesu
atk-s0102a:109_11: “atthi nu kho me taṃ puttassā”ti sukhavāsatthaṃ olokayamānā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnaṃ bodhisattaṃ passati.
atk-s0102a:109_12: Yathā hi aññe antokucchigatā pakkāsayaṃ avattharitvā āmāsayaṃ ukkhipitvā udarapaṭalaṃ piṭṭhito katvā
atk-s0102a:109_13: piṭṭhikaṇḍakaṃ nissāya ukkuṭikaṃ dvīsu muṭṭhīsu hanukaṃ ṭhapetvā deve vassante rukkhasusire makkaṭā viya
atk-s0102a:109_16: bodhisatto pana piṭṭhikaṇḍakaṃ piṭṭhito katvā dhammāsane dhammakathiko viya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā puratthābhimukho nisīdati.
atk-s0102a:109_19: Atha naṃ kucchitaco paṭicchādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:109_22: Bodhisatto pana antokucchigato mātaraṃ na passati.
atk-s0102a:110_5: na ca sakkā bodhisattamātaraṃ apanetvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetunti tattakaṃyeva bodhisattamātu āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:110_9: Paṭhamavayasmiñhi sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hoti,
atk-s0102a:110_10: tena tadā sañjātagabbhā itthī gabbhaṃ anurakkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:110_12: Majjhimavayassa pana dve koṭṭhāse atikkamma tatiye koṭṭhāse vatthu visadaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:110_14: tasmā bodhisattamātāpi paṭhamavaye sampattiṃ anubhavitvā majjhimavayassa tatiye koṭṭhāse vijāyitvā kālaṃ karotīti ayamettha dhammatā.
atk-s0102a:111_1: Nava vā dasa vāti ettha vā saddassa vikappanavasena satta vā aṭṭha vā ekādasa vā dvādasa vāti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:112_1: Devā paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno paṭiggaṇhanti.
atk-s0102a:112_5: ‘tadā bodhisattamātā suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā macchakkhisadisaṃ dukūlapaṭaṃ yāva pādantā pārupitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:112_8: Atha te pakatibrahmaveseneva upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:112_9: Tesaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno ajinappaveṇiyā paṭiggahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:114_1: Visadova nikkhamatīti yathā aññe sattā yonimagge laggantā bhaggavibhaggā nikkhamanti,
atk-s0102a:114_3: alaggo hutvā nikkhamatīti attho udenāti udakena.
atk-s0102a:114_4: Kenaci asucināti yathā aññe sattā kammajavātehi uddhaṃpādā adhosirā yonimagge pakkhittā sataporisaṃ narakapapātaṃ patantā viya,
atk-s0102a:114_5: tāḷacchiddena nikkaḍḍhiyamānā hatthī viya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantā nānāasucimakkhitāva nikkhamanti,
atk-s0102a:114_7: Bodhisattañhi kammajavātā uddhapādaṃ adhosiraṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:114_9: nisseṇito otaranto puriso viya ca dve hatthe ca dve pāde ca pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena kenaci asucinā amakkhitova nikkhamati.
atk-s0102a:115_1: Tāsu sītā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patati uṇhā rajatakaṭāhe.
atk-s0102a:115_2: Idañca pathavitale kenaci asucinā asammissaṃ tesaṃ pānīyaparibhojanīyaudakañceva aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ kīḷāudakañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0102a:115_3: aññassa pana suvaṇṇarajataghaṭehi āhariyamānaudakassa ceva haṃsavattakādipokkharaṇīgatassa ca udakassa paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0102a:116_2: Pāḷiyaṃ pana mātukucchito nikkhantamatto viya dassito,
atk-s0102a:116_4: Nikkhantamattañhi naṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0102a:116_9: Ettha ca chattassa parivārāni khaggādīni pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍānipi āgatāneva.
atk-s0102a:116_10: Pāḷiyaṃ pana rājagamane rājā viya chattameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:116_15: Sabbāni kira tāni adissamānarūpā devatā gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:121_0: Sabbā ca disāti idaṃ sattapadavītihārūpari ṭhitassa viya sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0102a:121_2: Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā paṭhaviyaṃ patiṭṭhito puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0102a:121_10: uparīti dasa disā anuviloketvā attanā sadisaṃ adisvā –
atk-s0102a:121_11: “ayaṃ uttarā disā”ti uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:121_16: natthi dāni punabbhavoti padadvayena imasmiṃ attabhāve pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0102a:122_0: Ettha ca samehi pādehi pathaviyā patiṭṭhānaṃ caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0102a:122_1: uttarābhimukhabhāvo mahājanaṃ ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā gamanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0102a:122_4: pañcarājakakudhabhaṇḍānaṃ paṭilābho pañcahi vimuttīhi vimuccanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0102a:122_7: “ayamantimā jātī”ti sīhanādo anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānassa pubbanimittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:123_4: Tantibaddhā vīṇā cammabaddhā bheriyo ca kenaci avāditā sayameva vajjiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:123_25: Devatā attano attano vimānadvāre ṭhatvā apphoṭanaseḷanacelukkhepādīhi mahākīḷakaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:123_27: Mahājanaṃ neva khudā na pipāsā pīḷesi.
atk-s0102a:124_1: Devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto dhammacakkappavattanakāle ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:124_2: Paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:124_3: Pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:124_5: Cammabaddhabherīnaṃ vajjanaṃ mahatiyā dhammabheriyā anussāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:124_13: Ratanānaṃ sakatejobhāsitattaṃ yaṃ lokassa dhammobhāsaṃ dassessati,
atk-s0102a:125_5: Sakuṇānaṃ pathavigamanaṃ mahājanassa ovādaṃ sutvā pāṇehi saraṇagamanassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:125_8: Devatānaṃ vimānadvāresu ṭhatvā apphoṭanādīhi kīḷanaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ patvā udānaṃ udānassa pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:125_13: Rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalaggahaṇaṃ vimuttipupphehi pupphitassa ca sāmaññaphalabhārabharitabhāvassa ca pubbanimittaṃ.
atk-s0102a:126_1: “yadā mahāpuriso pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho padasā gantvā āsabhiṃ vācaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0102a:126_12: Ayaṃ pana pañho heṭṭhālohapāsāde samuṭṭhito tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherena vissajjitova.
atk-s0102a:126_13: Thero kira ettha niyatipubbekatakammaissaranimmānavādavasena taṃ taṃ bahuṃ vatvā avasāne evaṃ byākari –
atk-s0102a:126_15: mahājanassa pana ākāsena gacchanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0102a:126_25: “buddhena viya hutvā bho therena pañho kathito”ti attamanā ahosi.
atk-s0102a:127_0: Imā ca pana ādito paṭṭhāya kathitā sabbadhammatā sabbabodhisattānaṃ hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:129_1: Addasa khoti dukūlacumbaṭake nipajjāpetvā ānītaṃ addasa.
atk-s0102a:129_8: gatiyo”ti ettha nirayādibhedāya sattehi gantabbagatiyā vattati.
atk-s0102a:129_9: “Imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ neva jānāmi āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vā”ti ettha ajjhāsaye.
atk-s0102a:129_12: jutiñca pajānāmi evaṃmahiddhiko bako brahmā”ti ettha nipphattiyaṃ vattati.
atk-s0102a:129_14: Anaññāti aññā gati nipphatti nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:130_3: Cāturantoti puratthimasamuddādīnaṃ catunnaṃ samuddānaṃ vasena caturantāya pathaviyā issaro.
atk-s0102a:130_5: Janapado asmiṃ thāvariyaṃ thirabhāvaṃ pattoti janapadatthāvariyappatto.
atk-s0102a:130_6: Caṇḍassa hi rañño balidaṇḍādīhi lokaṃ pīḷayato manussā majjhimajanapadaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbatasamuddatīrādīni nissāya paccante vāsaṃ kappenti.
atk-s0102a:130_7: Atimudukassa rañño corehi sāhasikadhanavilopapīḷitā manussā paccantaṃ pahāya janapadamajjhe vāsaṃ kappenti,
atk-s0102a:130_8: iti evarūpe rājini janapado thirabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0102a:130_9: Imasmiṃ pana kumāre rajjaṃ kārayamāne etassa janapado pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ayopaṭṭena parikkhitto viya thiro bhavissatīti dassento –
atk-s0102a:134_0: Cakkaratanassa ca nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0102a:134_1: sabbe gandhapupphādīhi tasseva pūjañca abhivādanādīni ca karontīti cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:134_2: Cakkaratanassa ca ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ agghatīti aggho natthi,
atk-s0102a:134_4: Cakkaratanañca aññehi loke vijjamānaratanehi asadisanti atulaṭṭhenāpi ratanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:134_5: Yasmā ca pana yasmiṃ kappe buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0102a:134_13: Imehi sattahi ratanehi parivārabhāvena ceva sabbabhogūpakaraṇabhāvena ca samannāgatoti sattaratanasamannāgato.
atk-s0102a:135_0: Idāni tesaṃ sarūpato dassanatthaṃ tassimānītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:135_2: dvesahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhavaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ samatthaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0102a:135_3: Tathā purebhattameva sāgarapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anusaṃyāyanasamatthaṃ vehāsaṅgamaṃ hatthiratanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:135_5: caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre yojanappamāṇaṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanasamatthaṃ maṇiratanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:135_8: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā sakalarajjamanusāsanasamatthaṃ jeṭṭhaputtasaṅkhātaṃ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pātubhavati.
atk-s0102a:136_6: Divasampi yujjhantā na kilamantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:136_8: Adaṇḍenāti ye katāparādhe satte satampi sahassampi gaṇhanti,
atk-s0102a:136_12: Ayaṃ pana duvidhampi daṇḍaṃ pahāya adaṇḍena ajjhāvasati.
atk-s0102a:136_13: Asatthenāti ye ekatodhārādinā satthena paraṃ vihesanti,
atk-s0102a:136_15: Ayaṃ pana satthena khuddamakkhikāyapi pivanamattaṃ lohitaṃ kassaci anuppādetvā dhammeneva –
atk-s0102a:136_16: “ehi kho mahārājā”ti evaṃ paṭirājūhi sampaṭicchitāgamano vuttappakāraṃ pathaviṃ abhivijinitvā ajjhāvasati,
atk-s0102a:137_0: Evaṃ ekaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā dutiyaṃ kathetuṃ sace kho panātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:137_1: Tattha rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesataṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ chadanaṃ āvaraṇaṃ vivaṭaṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ vivaṭakaṃ etenāti vivaṭacchado.
atk-s0102a:138_1: Evaṃ dutiyaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā tāsaṃ nimittabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni dassetuṃ ayañhi, deva,
atk-s0102a:138_3: Tattha suppatiṭṭhitapādoti yathā aññesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapentānaṃ aggapādatalaṃ vā paṇhi vā passaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ phusati,
atk-s0102a:138_7: Assa pana suvaṇṇapādukatalamiva ekappahāreneva sakalaṃ pādatalaṃ bhūmiṃ phusati,
atk-s0102a:139_1: tesaṃ arā ca nemi ca nābhi ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttāva.
atk-s0102a:139_2: Sabbākāraparipūrānīti iminā pana ayaṃ viseso veditabbo,
atk-s0102a:139_3: tesaṃ kira cakkānaṃ pādatalassa majjhe nābhi dissati,
atk-s0102a:139_35: antamaso cakkavattirañño parisaṃ upādāya sabbo cakkalakkhaṇasseva parivāro.
atk-s0102a:140_2: Yathā hi aññesaṃ aggapādo dīgho hoti,
atk-s0102a:140_6: Mahāpurisassa pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā aggapādo hoti,
atk-s0102a:140_8: catutthakoṭṭhāse āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitā viya rattakambalageṇḍukasadisā paṇhi hoti.
atk-s0102a:141_0: Dīghaṅgulīti yathā aññesaṃ kāci aṅguliyo dīghā honti,
atk-s0102a:141_3: Mahāpurisassa pana makkaṭasseva dīghā hatthapādaṅguliyo mūle thūlā,
atk-s0102a:142_0: Mudutalunahatthapādoti sappimaṇḍe osāretvā ṭhapitaṃ satavāravihatakappāsapaṭalaṃ viya mudu.
atk-s0102a:143_1: Ediso hi phaṇahatthako purisadosena upahato pabbajjaṃ na paṭilabhati.
atk-s0102a:143_2: Mahāpurisassa pana catasso hatthaṅguliyo pañcapi pādaṅguliyo ekappamāṇā honti,
atk-s0102a:143_3: tāsaṃ ekappamāṇatāya yavalakkhaṇaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0102a:143_4: Athassa hatthapādā kusalena vaḍḍhakinā yojitajālavātapānasadisā honti.
atk-s0102a:144_0: Uddhaṃ patiṭṭhitagopphakattā ussaṅkhā pādā assāti ussaṅkhapādo.
atk-s0102a:144_2: tena tesaṃ pādā āṇibaddhā viya baddhā honti,
atk-s0102a:144_5: Mahāpurisassa pana āruhitvā upari gopphakā patiṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0102a:144_6: tenassa nābhito paṭṭhāya uparimakāyo nāvāya ṭhapitasuvaṇṇapaṭimā viya niccalo hoti,
atk-s0102a:144_9: puratopi pacchatopi ubhayapassesupi ṭhatvā passantānaṃ pādatalāni paññāyanti,
atk-s0102a:145_2: samantato samasaṇṭhitena maṃsena parikkhittāhi suvaṭṭitāhi sāligabbhayavagabbhasadisāhi jaṅghāhi samannāgatoti attho.
atk-s0102a:146_2: Avasesajanā hi khujjā vā honti vāmanā vā.
atk-s0102a:146_5: Te aparipuṇṇakāyattā na sakkonti anonamantā jaṇṇukāni parimajjituṃ.
atk-s0102a:147_0: Kosohitavatthaguyhoti usabhavāraṇādīnaṃ viya suvaṇṇapadumakaṇṇikasadisehi kosehi ohitaṃ paṭicchannaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ assāti kosohitavatthaguyho.
atk-s0102a:148_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇoti jātihiṅgulakena majjitvā dīpidāṭhāya ghaṃsitvā gerukaparikammaṃ katvā ṭhapitaghanasuvaṇṇarūpasadisoti attho.
atk-s0102a:148_1: Etenassa ghanasiniddhasaṇhasarīrataṃ dassetvā chavivaṇṇadassanatthaṃ kañcanasannibhattacoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:149_1: Na upalimpatīti na laggati padumapalāsato udakabindu viya vivaṭṭati.
atk-s0102a:149_2: Hatthadhovanādīni pana utuggahaṇatthāya ceva dāyakānaṃ puññaphalatthāya ca buddhā karonti,
atk-s0102a:149_4: Senāsanaṃ pavisantena hi bhikkhunā pāde dhovitvā pavisitabbanti vuttametaṃ.
atk-s0102a:150_0: Uddhaggalomoti āvaṭṭapariyosāne uddhaggāni hutvā mukhasobhaṃ ullokayamānāni viya ṭhitāni lomāni assāti uddhaggalomo.
atk-s0102a:151_2: Yebhuyyena hi sattā khandhe kaṭiyaṃ jāṇūsūti tīsu ṭhānesu namanti,
atk-s0102a:151_6: eke mukhaṃ unnametvā nakkhattāni gaṇayantā viya caranti,
atk-s0102a:151_10: Ayaṃ pana ujumeva uggantvā dīghappamāṇo devanagare ussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya bhavissatīti dīpenti.
atk-s0102a:151_12: evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ jātamattassa sabbaso aparipuṇṇaṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:151_13: taṃ taṃ āyatiṃ tathābhāvitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:152_0: Sattussadoti dve hatthapiṭṭhiyo dve pādapiṭṭhiyo dve aṃsakūṭāni khandhoti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇo maṃsussado assāti sattussado.
atk-s0102a:152_5: mahāpuriso pana sattasu ṭhānesu paripuṇṇamaṃsussadattā nigūḷhasirājālehi hatthapiṭṭhādīhi vaṭṭetvā suṭṭhapitasuvaṇṇāḷiṅgasadisena
atk-s0102a:153_0: Sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo.
atk-s0102a:153_3: Mahāpurisassa pana sīhassa pubbaddhakāyo viya sabbo kāyo paripuṇṇo.
atk-s0102a:153_4: Sopi sīhasseva tattha tattha vinatunnatādivasena dussaṇṭhitavisaṇṭhito na hoti,
atk-s0102a:154_2: kammavipāke paccupaṭṭhite yehi aṅgehi dīghehi sobhati,
atk-s0102a:155_0: Iti nānācittena puññacittena cittito dasahi pāramīhi sajjito mahāpurisassa attabhāvo,
atk-s0102a:155_1: loke sabbasippino vā sabbaiddhimanto vā patirūpakampi kātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:156_0: Citantaraṃsoti antaraṃsaṃ vuccati dvinnaṃ koṭṭānaṃ antaraṃ,
atk-s0102a:156_1: taṃ citaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ antaraṃsaṃ assāti citantaraṃso.
atk-s0102a:156_4: Mahāpurisassa pana kaṭito paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ yāva khandhā uggamma samussitasuvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya piṭṭhiṃ chādetvā patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0102a:157_1: Yathā paññāsahatthatāya vā satahatthatāya vā samakkhandhasākho nigrodho dīghatopi vitthāratopi ekappamāṇova hoti,
atk-s0102a:157_3: Yathā aññesaṃ kāyo dīgho vā hoti byāmo vā,
atk-s0102a:158_1: Yathā eke koñcā viya ca bakā viya ca varāhā viya ca dīghagalā vaṅkagalā puthulagalā ca honti,
atk-s0102a:158_7: meghassa viya gajjito saro mahā hoti.
atk-s0102a:159_0: Rasaggasaggīti ettha rasaṃ gasanti harantīti rasaggasā.
atk-s0102a:159_3: Mahāpurisassa kira sattarasaharaṇīsahassāni uddhaggāni hutvā gīvāyameva paṭimukkāni.
atk-s0102a:159_4: Tilaphalamattopi āhāro jivhagge ṭhapito sabbakāyaṃ anupharati.
atk-s0102a:159_5: Teneva mahāpadhānaṃ padahantassa ekataṇḍulādīhipi kaḷāyayūsapasatamattenāpi kāyassa yāpanaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0102a:159_6: Aññesaṃ pana tathā abhāvā na sakalaṃ kāyaṃ ojā pharati.
atk-s0102a:160_3: Mahāpurisassa pana sīhassa heṭṭhimaṃ viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisāni honti.
atk-s0102a:160_4: Atha nemittakā hanukapariyantaṃ olokentāva imesu hanukesu heṭṭhime vīsati uparime vīsatīti cattālīsadantā
atk-s0102a:160_5: samā aviraḷā patiṭṭhahissantīti sallakkhetvā ayañhi deva,
atk-s0102a:160_12: imassa pana ayapaṭṭakena chinnasaṅkhapaṭalaṃ viya samā bhavissanti.
atk-s0102a:160_13: Aññesaṃ kumbhilānaṃ viya dantā viraḷā honti,
atk-s0102a:160_15: Imassa pana kanakaphalakāyaṃ samussitavajirapanti viya aviraḷā tūlikāya dassitaparicchedā viya dantā bhavissanti.
atk-s0102a:160_17: Tena kāci dāṭhā kāḷāpi vivaṇṇāpi honti.
atk-s0102a:160_18: Ayaṃ pana suṭṭhu sukkadāṭho osadhitārakampi atikkamma virocamānāya pabhāya samannāgatadāṭho bhavissati.
atk-s0102a:161_1: Aññesaṃ jivhā thūlāpi honti kisāpi rassāpi thaddhāpi visamāpi,
atk-s0102a:161_2: mahāpurisassa pana jivhā mudu dīghā puthulā vaṇṇasampannā hoti.
atk-s0102a:161_3: So hi etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pariyesituṃ āgatānaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṃ mudukattā taṃ jivhaṃ kathinasūciṃ viya vaṭṭetvā ubho nāsikasotāni parāmasati,
atk-s0102a:161_6: Evamassa mududīghaputhulabhāvaṃ pakāsento tesaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodeti.
atk-s0102a:162_0: Brahmassaroti aññe chinnassarāpi bhinnassarāpi kākassarāpi honti,
atk-s0102a:162_1: ayaṃ pana mahābrahmuno sarasadisena sarena samannāgato bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:162_2: mahābrahmuno hi pittasemhehi apalibuddhattā saro visado hoti.
atk-s0102a:162_4: Vatthuno suddhattā nābhito paṭṭhāya samuṭṭhahanto saro visado aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatova samuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:163_1: nīlayuttaṭṭhāne panassa umāpupphasadisena ativisuddhena nīlavaṇṇena samannāgatāni nettāni honti,
atk-s0102a:164_5: hatthimūsikādīnaṃ akkhisadisehi viniggatehipi gambhīrehipi akkhīhi samannāgatā honti.
atk-s0102a:164_6: Mahāpurisassa pana dhovitvā majjitvā ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā viya mudusiniddhanīlasukhumapakhumācitāni akkhīni.
atk-s0102a:165_1: Bhamukantareti dvinnaṃ bhamukānaṃ vemajjhe nāsikamatthakeyeva jātā,
atk-s0102a:165_8: Sā panesā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhiyamānā upaḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā hoti,
atk-s0102a:165_9: vissaṭṭhā dakkhiṇāvaṭṭavasena āvaṭṭitvā uddhaggā hutvā santiṭṭhati.
atk-s0102a:165_12: aruṇappabhārañjite gaganappadese osadhitārakā viya ca atimanoharāya siriyā virocati.
atk-s0102a:166_0: Uṇhīsasīsoti idaṃ paripuṇṇanalāṭatañca paripuṇṇasīsataṃ cāti dve atthavase paṭicca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:166_1: Mahāpurisassa hi dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya maṃsapaṭalaṃ uṭṭhahitvā sakalanalāṭaṃ chādayamānaṃ pūrayamānaṃ gantvā vāmakaṇṇacūḷikāyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:166_3: Mahāpurisassa kira imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ disvā rājūnaṃ uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:166_12: Mahāpurisassa pana āraggena vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitaṃ viya suparipuṇṇaṃ udakapubbuḷasadisaṃ sīsaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:166_14: Dutiyanaye uṇhīsaṃ viya sabbattha parimaṇḍalasīsoti uṇhīsasīso.
atk-s0102a:168_1: Sabbakāmehīti idaṃ lakkhaṇāni pariggaṇhāpetvā pacchā kataṃ viya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0102a:168_3: Paṭhamañhi te nemittake santappetvā pacchā lakkhaṇapariggaṇhanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:168_6: Tassa kira niddosena madhurena khīrena samannāgatā saṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0102a:168_7: tathā sesāpi tesu tesu kammesu kusalā saṭṭhisaṭṭhiyeva.
atk-s0102a:168_9: tassa tassa katākatabhāvaṃ sallakkhaṇe saṭṭhi amacce upaṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0102a:168_11: dve saṭṭhiyo purisānanti cha saṭṭhiyo upaṭṭhakānaṃyeva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:168_14: Mā naṃ sītaṃ vātiādīsu mā abhibhavīti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:168_16: Aṅkeneva aṅkanti aññassa bāhunāva aññassa bāhuṃ.
atk-s0102a:169_6: karavīkasakuṇe kira madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena paharitvā paggharitarasaṃ pivitvā pakkhena
atk-s0102a:169_7: tālaṃ datvā vikūjamāne catuppadā mattā viya laḷituṃ ārabhanti.
atk-s0102a:169_8: Gocarapasutāpi catuppadā mukhagatāni tiṇāni chaḍḍetvā taṃ saddaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0102a:169_9: Vāḷamigā khuddakamige anubandhamānā ukkhittaṃ pādaṃ anikkhipitvāva tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0102a:169_11: Ākāse pakkhandā pakkhinopi pakkhe pasāretvā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānāva tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0102a:169_12: Udake macchāpi kaṇṇapaṭalaṃ papphoṭetvā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānāva tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0102a:170_2: buddhassarena sadiso kassaci saro”ti saṅghaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0102a:170_8: “imasmiṃ pañjare nisīditvā karavīko āgacchatū”ti suvaṇṇapañjaraṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0102a:170_9: Pañjaro gantvā ekassa karavīkassa purato aṭṭhāsi. So –
atk-s0102a:170_11: na sakkā na gantu”nti tattha nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:170_19: “ñātakā me āgatā”ti maññamāno pakkhena tālaṃ datvā madhurassarena maṇivaṃsaṃ dhamamāno viya viravi.
atk-s0102a:170_23: kīdiso nu kho sabbaññutaññāṇasiripattassa bhagavato saddo ahosī”ti pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā
atk-s0102a:170_26: Tato pana satabhāgena sahassabhāgena ca madhurataro vipassissa kumārassa saddo ahosīti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:171_2: kammavipākavasena pana devatānaṃ cakkhusadisameva maṃsacakkhu ahosi,
atk-s0102a:171_3: yena nimittaṃ katvā tilavāhe pakkhittaṃ ekatilampi ayaṃ soti uddharitvā dātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0102a:173_2: Ekadivasaṃ kira vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā atthe anusāsantassa rañño alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahāpurisaṃ ānetvā hatthe ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:173_3: Tassa taṃ aṅkekatvā upalāḷayamānasseva amaccā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:173_7: “aḍḍassa dubbinicchitattā evaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti puna sāmikaṃyeva sāmikaṃ katvā “ñatvā nu kho kumāro
atk-s0102a:173_8: evaṃ karotī”ti vīmaṃsantā puna sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:174_1: Vassikantiādīsu yattha sukhaṃ hoti vassakāle vasituṃ,
atk-s0102a:175_0: Tattha vassiko pāsādo nātiucco hoti, nātinīco,
atk-s0102a:175_12: Vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti.
atk-s0102a:175_14: yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
atk-s0102a:176_6: “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā purisāsaṅkā uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:176_7: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0102a:179_7: Disvāti aḍḍhayojanappamāṇena balakāyena parivuto susaṃvihitārakkhopi gacchanto yadā ratho purato hoti,
atk-s0102a:179_9: tādise okāse suddhāvāsakhīṇāsavabrahmehi attano ānubhāvena rathassa puratova dassitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:179_12: “mahāpuriso paṅke gajo viya pañcasu kāmaguṇesu laggo,
atk-s0102a:179_14: Evaṃ dassitañca taṃ bodhisatto ceva passati sārathi ca.
atk-s0102a:179_15: Brahmāno hi bodhisattassa appamādatthaṃ sārathissa ca kathāsallāpatthaṃ taṃ dassesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:179_16: Kiṃ panesoti “eso jiṇṇoti kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti, nāhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:179_17: bho ito pubbe evarūpaṃ addasa”nti pucchi.
atk-s0102a:180_0: Tena hīti yadi mayhampi evarūpehi kesehi evarūpena ca kāyena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:180_5: Antepuraṃ gatoti itthijanaṃ vissajjetvā sirigabbhe ekakova nisinno.
atk-s0102a:180_6: Yatra hi nāmāti yāya jātiyā sati jarā paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:181_1: Sārathiṃ āmantāpetvāti rājā kira nemittakehi kathitakālato paṭṭhāya ohitasoto vicarati,
atk-s0102a:181_2: so “kumāro uyyānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge nivatto”ti sutvā sārathiṃ āmantāpesi.
atk-s0102a:181_5: brāhmaṇānaṃ vacanaṃ mā saccaṃ hotūti evaṃ cintesīti attho.
atk-s0102a:183_1: Addasa khoti pubbe vuttanayeneva suddhāvāsehi dassitaṃ addasa.
atk-s0102a:183_6: Jarā paññāyissati byādhi paññāyissatīti idhāpi yāya jātiyā sati idaṃ dvayaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:183_8: ajātaṃ khemanti jātiyā mūlaṃ khaṇanto nisīdi,
atk-s0102a:185_5: taṃ sabbaṃ katvā niṭṭhapetvā matanti attho.
atk-s0102a:185_7: Yatra hi nāmāti idhāpi yāya jātiyā sati idaṃ tayaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:185_9: ajātaṃ khemanti jātiyā mūlaṃ khaṇanto nisīdi,
atk-s0102a:187_3: Sādhu dhammacariyātiādīsu ayaṃ deva dhammacaraṇabhāvo sādhūti cintetvā pabbajitoti evaṃ ekamekassa padassa yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:187_8: Pabbajitaṃ hissa disvā cittaṃ pabbajjāya ninnaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0102a:187_9: Atha tena saddhiṃ kathetukāmo hutvā sārathiṃ uyyojento tena hītiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:189_2: “pabbajitassa sādhu dhammacariyā”tiādīni ca aññañca bahuṃ mahājanakāyena rakkhiyamānassa puttadārasambādhe
atk-s0102a:189_3: ghare vasato ādīnavapaṭisaṃyuttañceva migabhūtena cetasā yathāsukhaṃ vane vasato pabbajitassa vivekānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttañca
atk-s0102a:189_4: dhammiṃ kathaṃ sutvā pabbajitukāmo hutvā – atha kho,
atk-s0102a:190_0: Imāni cattāri disvā pabbajitaṃ nāma sabbabodhisattānaṃ vaṃsova tantiyeva paveṇīyeva.
atk-s0102a:190_1: Aññepi ca bodhisattā yathā ayaṃ vipassī kumāro,
atk-s0102a:190_3: Amhākaṃ pana bodhisatto cattāripi ekadivasaṃyeva disvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anomānadītīre pabbajito.
atk-s0102a:190_4: Teneva rājagahaṃ patvā tattha raññā bimbisārena –
atk-s0102a:196_1: Sutvāna tesanti tesaṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ sutvā etadahosi.
atk-s0102a:196_4: Kasmā panettha yathā parato khaṇḍatissānaṃ anupabbajjāya –
atk-s0102a:196_8: Ete kira sabbepi vipassissa kumārassa upaṭṭhākaparisāva,
atk-s0102a:196_9: te pātova upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā kumāraṃ adisvā pātarāsatthāya gantvā bhuttapātarāsā āgamma “kuhiṃ kumāro”ti
atk-s0102a:196_10: pucchitvā “uyyānabhūmiṃ gato”ti sutvā “tattheva naṃ dakkhissāmā”ti nikkhamantā nivattamānaṃ sārathiṃ disvā –
atk-s0102a:196_11: “kumāro pabbajito”ti cassa vacanaṃ sutvā sutaṭṭhāneyeva sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā antarāpaṇato kāsāvapītāni
atk-s0102a:196_13: Iti nagarato nikkhamitvā bahinagare sutattā ettha –
atk-s0102a:197_0: Cārikaṃ caratīti gatagataṭṭhāne mahāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaṃ sajjetvā āgamma svātanāya nimantito janassa
atk-s0102a:197_1: āyācitabhikkhameva paṭiggaṇhanto cattāro māse cārikaṃ cari.
atk-s0102a:198_1: Ayaṃ pana vitakko bodhisattassa kadā uppannoti?
atk-s0102a:198_4: “yatheva maṃ ime pubbe gihibhūtaṃ parivāretvā caranti,
atk-s0102a:198_6: kiṃ iminā gaṇenā”ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ukkaṇṭhitvā “ajjeva gacchāmī”ti cintetvā puna “ajja avelā,
atk-s0102a:198_10: Taṃ divasañca uruvelagāmasadise gāme gāmavāsino svātanāya nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:198_11: Te caturāsītisahassānampi tesaṃ pabbajitānaṃ mahāpurisassa ca pāyāsameva paṭiyādayiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:198_12: Atha mahāpuriso punadivase tasmiṃyeva gāme tehi pabbajitehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:198_13: Tattha te pabbajitā mahāpurisassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0102a:200_0: Saṇateva brahāraññaṃ, taṃ bhayaṃ paṭibhāti ma”nti. ;
atk-s0102a:201_1: “ayaṃ kālo”ti nikkhamitvā paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ pidahitvā bodhimaṇḍābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0102a:201_2: Aññadāpi ca tasmiṃ ṭhāne vicaranto bodhimaṇḍaṃ passati,
atk-s0102a:201_5: tasmā alaṅkataṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ disvā ārohanatthāya cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
atk-s0102a:201_6: So dakkhiṇadisābhāgena upagamma padakkhiṇaṃ katvā puratthimadisābhāge cuddasahatthaṃ pallaṅkaṃ paññapetvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā –
atk-s0102a:201_8: na tāva ito vuṭṭhahāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:202_0: Aññeneva tānīti te kira sāyaṃ bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā “ativikālo jāto,
atk-s0102a:202_1: upadhārethā”ti vatvā paṇṇasālaṃ vivaritvā taṃ apassantāpi “kuhiṃ gato”ti nānubandhiṃsu,
atk-s0102a:202_3: buddhabhūtaṃyeva naṃ passissāmā”ti vatvā antojambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ pakkantā.
atk-s0102a:204_5: Cavati ca upapajjati cāti idaṃ dvayaṃ pana aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:204_6: Jarāmaraṇassāti ettha yasmā pabbajanto jiṇṇabyādhimatteyeva disvā pabbajito,
atk-s0102a:204_10: Iti jarāmaraṇaṃ mūlaṃ katvā abhiniviṭṭhassa bhavaggato otarantassa viya – atha kho,
atk-s0102a:205_1: Aniccādīni hi aniccāditova manasikaroto yonisomanasikāro nāma hoti. Ayañca –
atk-s0102a:205_3: kismiṃ asati na hontī”ti udayabbayānupassanāvasena pavattattā tesaṃ aññataro.
atk-s0102a:205_4: Tasmāssa ito yonisomanasikārā iminā upāyamanasikārena ahu paññāya abhisamayo,
atk-s0102a:205_5: bodhisattassa paññāya yasmiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:205_10: tāya saddhiṃ bodhisattassa samāgamo ahosīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0102a:206_0: Nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇanti ettha pana saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇanti ca,
atk-s0102a:206_1: avijjāya sati saṅkhārāti ca vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0102a:206_3: Avijjāsaṅkhārā hi atīto bhavo tehi saddhiṃ ayaṃ vipassanā na ghaṭiyati.
atk-s0102a:206_5: Nanu ca avijjāsaṅkhārehi adiṭṭhehi na sakkā buddhena bhavitunti.
atk-s0102a:207_8: Ettāvatā jāyetha vātiādīsu viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte,
atk-s0102a:207_10: dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesu ettakena jāyetha vā…pe…
atk-s0102a:207_12: ito hi paraṃ kiṃ aññaṃ jāyeyya vā…pe…
atk-s0102a:207_16: Evaṃ saddhiṃ aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhi pañca padāni dassetvā puna taṃ ettāvatāti vuttamatthaṃ niyyātento –
atk-s0102a:207_18: viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vatvā tato paraṃ anulomapaccayākāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamūlaṃ āyatimpi
atk-s0102a:207_20: Tattha kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti sakalassa jātijarāmaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsādibhedassa dukkharāsissa nibbatti hoti.
atk-s0102a:207_21: Iti mahāpuriso sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa nibbattiṃ addasa.
atk-s0102a:208_1: Samudayo samudayoti khoti nibbatti nibbattīti kho.
atk-s0102a:208_20: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti paccayasañjānanamattaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0102a:209_1: Adhigato kho myāyanti adhigato kho me ayaṃ.
atk-s0102a:209_11: Ettha ca viññāṇanirodhotiādīhi paccattapadehi nibbānameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0102a:209_12: Iti mahāpuriso sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa anibbattinirodhaṃ addasa.
atk-s0102a:210_1: Nirodho nirodhoti khoti anibbatti anibbattiti kho.
atk-s0102a:210_4: “imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotī”ti nirodhasañjānanamattameva kathitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:211_1: Aparena samayenāti evaṃ paccayañca paccayanirodhañca viditvā tato aparabhāge.
atk-s0102a:211_3: Udayabbayānupassīti tameva paṭhamaṃ diṭṭhaṃ udayañca vayañca anupassamāno.
atk-s0102a:211_6: Sabbeyeva hi pūritapāramino bodhisattā pacchimabhave puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0102a:211_7: pabbajitvā padhānamanuyuñjitvā bodhipallaṅkamāruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti,
atk-s0102a:211_9: tatiyayāme paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato uṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena
atk-s0102a:211_10: samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggena sakale buddhaguṇe paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0102a:211_12: So yathāvuttaṃ sabbaṃ anukkamaṃ katvā pacchimayāme ānāpānacatutthajjhānato uṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu
atk-s0102a:212_2: ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthīti ruppanasabhāvañceva bhūtupādāyabhedañca ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānavasena anavasesarūpapariggaho vutto.
atk-s0102a:212_3: Iti rūpassa samudayoti iminā evaṃ pariggahitassa rūpassa samudayadassanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:212_4: Tattha itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0102a:212_10: nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:212_12: vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa nirodhaṃ passatī”ti ayamassa vitthāro.
atk-s0102a:213_7: ito uddhaṃ viññāṇaṃ natthīti vedayitasañjānanaabhisaṅkharaṇavijānanasabhāvañceva sukhādirūpasaññādi phassādi
atk-s0102a:213_8: cakkhuviññāṇādi bhedañca ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānavasena anavasesavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇapariggaho vutto.
atk-s0102a:213_9: Iti vedanāya samudayotiādīhi pana evaṃ pariggahitānaṃ vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ samudayadassanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:213_10: Tatrāpi itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0102a:213_17: vitthāro pana udayabbayavinicchayo sabbākāraparipūro visuddhimagge vutto.
atk-s0102a:213_18: Tassa pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharatoti tassa vipassissa bodhisattassa imesu rūpādīsu
atk-s0102a:213_19: pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu samapaññāsalakkhaṇavasena udayabbayānupassino viharato yathānukkamena vaḍḍhite
atk-s0102a:213_20: vipassanāñāṇe anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamānehi āsavasaṅkhātehi kilesehi anupādāya aggahetvāva cittaṃ
atk-s0102a:214_0: Ettāvatā ca mahāpuriso sabbabandhanā vippamutto sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhamiva padumaṃ suvikasitacittasantāno cattāri maggañāṇāni,
atk-s0102a:214_6: sakale ca buddhaguṇe hatthagate katvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappo bodhipallaṅke nisinnova –
atk-s0102a:217_0: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi;
atk-s0102a:218_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0102a:223_0: Paññāpetuṃ gati natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukha”nti. ;
atk-s0102a:224_0: Evaṃ manasi karonto sarade sūriyo viya, puṇṇacando viya ca virocitthāti.
atk-s0102a:227_1: Tatiyabhāṇavāre yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyanti yadi panāhaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ.
atk-s0102a:227_4: So kira buddho hutvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke nisīdi,
atk-s0102a:227_11: Tato uṭṭhāya aṭṭhame sattāhe puna āgantvā ajapālanigrodhe nisinnamattasseva sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo ayañceva ito anantaro ca vitakko uppannoti.
atk-s0102a:228_10: Atakkāvacaroti takkena avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo na hoti,
atk-s0102a:228_21: Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati,
atk-s0102a:228_27: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā duvidhampi ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento –
atk-s0102a:229_7: idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0102a:229_10: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni sammanti vūpasammanti tasmā –
atk-s0102a:229_12: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti,
atk-s0102a:229_18: phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:229_20: So mamassa kilamathoti yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma,
atk-s0102a:229_23: Kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca assāti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:230_4: Vipassintiādīsu vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassāti attho.
atk-s0102a:231_3: Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sīsaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0102a:231_4: galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsapadīpakaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti
atk-s0102a:231_5: evamādīni dentassa aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0102a:231_10: evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa alaṃ desetuṃ;
atk-s0102a:232_0: Paṭisotagāminti niccādīnaṃ paṭisotaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāsubhanti evaṃ gataṃ catusaccadhammaṃ.
atk-s0102a:232_1: Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena ca rattā.
atk-s0102a:232_2: Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti,
atk-s0102a:232_3: te apassante ko sakkhissati evaṃ gāhāpetuṃ?
atk-s0102a:236_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0102a:236_3: Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ dhammassa ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ
atk-s0102a:236_4: kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena pākaṭā jātā. Athassa –
atk-s0102a:236_5: “ime sattā kañjikapuṇṇalābu viya takkabharitacāṭi viya vasātelapītapilotikā viya añjanamakkhitahatthā
atk-s0102a:236_6: viya kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā,
atk-s0102a:236_7: te kiṃ nāma paṭivijjhissantī”ti cintayato kilesagahanapaccavekkhaṇānubhāvenāpi evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0102a:237_1: pabbatena paṭicchādetvā ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso,
atk-s0102a:237_2: satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanaṃ viya duranubodho,
atk-s0102a:237_3: nanu mayā hi imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:237_6: Tassa me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassāpi pathavī na kampittha,
atk-s0102a:237_9: pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0102a:237_10: Iti mādisenāpi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo paṭividdho taṃ lokiyamahājanā kathaṃ paṭivijjhissantī”ti
atk-s0102a:238_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0102a:238_2: “mama appossukkatāya citte namamāne maṃ mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0102a:238_4: te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0102a:238_7: paṇīto vata bho dhammo’ti maññamānā sussūsissantī”ti.
atk-s0102a:238_8: Imampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami,
atk-s0102a:239_2: atha kho imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jeṭṭhakamahābrahmā esoti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:239_3: Nassati vata bho lokoti so kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāresi,
atk-s0102a:239_5: Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma loke.
atk-s0102a:239_6: Purato pāturahosīti tehi dasahi brahmasahassehi saddhiṃ pāturahosi.
atk-s0102a:239_7: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ,
atk-s0102a:239_10: Bhavissantīti purimabuddhesu dasapuññakiriyavatthuvasena katādhikārā paripākagatā padumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ,
atk-s0102a:239_11: dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā catuppadikagāthāvasāne ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve,
atk-s0102a:240_6: Apparajakkhetiādīsu yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ,
atk-s0102a:241_46: Iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0102a:241_48: Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati aññāti paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0102a:242_2: Antonimuggaposīnīti yāni aññānipi padumāni antonimuggāneva posayanti.
atk-s0102a:242_3: Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0102a:242_5: tāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni.
atk-s0102a:242_10: Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarojauppalādīni nāma atthi,
atk-s0102a:242_19: Tattha yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0102a:242_21: Yassa puggalassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0102a:242_23: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0102a:242_25: Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi gaṇhato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0102a:243_8: Tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākārato addasa.
atk-s0102a:243_9: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ sādheti,
atk-s0102a:244_0: Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ uppādetvā puna
atk-s0102a:244_1: te sabbesupi tīsu bhavesu sabbe satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi.
atk-s0102a:244_6: assaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ,
atk-s0102a:244_9: Ye te sattā na kammāvaraṇena…pe…ime te sattā bhabbā”ti.
atk-s0102a:245_0: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā –
atk-s0102a:245_5: Brahmā taṃ ñatvā somanassajāto bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi.
atk-s0102a:246_0: 70. Tattha ajjhabhāsīti adhiabhāsi, adhikicca ārabbha abhāsīti attho.
atk-s0102a:247_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova,
atk-s0102a:247_1: na hi tattha ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0102a:247_4: yathā selapabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
atk-s0102a:247_6: sundarapaññasabbaññutaññāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko
atk-s0102a:248_1: yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ.
atk-s0102a:248_3: Athassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ,
atk-s0102a:248_8: Evaṃ dhammapāsādamāruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā sattā,
atk-s0102a:248_9: te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0102a:248_12: te tassa dūre ṭhitāpi āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0102a:248_13: so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca.
atk-s0102a:250_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:251_0: Uṭṭhehīti bhagavato dhammadesanatthaṃ cārikacaraṇaṃ yācanto bhaṇati.
atk-s0102a:252_5: Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ pamuñcantu vissajjentu.
atk-s0102a:252_7: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ,
atk-s0102a:252_8: idāni pana sabbe janā saddhābhājanaṃ upanentu,
atk-s0102a:254_1: Bodhirukkhamūleti bodhirukkhassa avidūre ajapālanigrodhe antarahitoti attho.
atk-s0102a:254_2: Kheme migadāyeti isipatanaṃ tena samayena khemaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:254_3: migānaṃ pana abhayavāsatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:254_7: evaṃ aññepi buddhā paṭhamaṃ dhammadesanatthāya gacchantā ākāsena gantvā tattheva otaranti.
atk-s0102a:254_8: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavā upakassa ājīvakassa upanissayaṃ disvā –
atk-s0102a:254_11: Atha puna nibbindanto āgamma arahattaṃ sacchikarissatī”ti ñatvā aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ padasāva agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:254_12: Dāyapālaṃ āmantesīti disvāva punappunaṃ oloketvā – “ayyo no, bhante,
atk-s0102a:255_5: Tattha dānakathanti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:255_9: idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0102a:255_23: Dānañhi loke sakkasampattiṃ mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ cakkavattisampattiṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:256_0: Yasmā pana dānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:256_2: Sīlakathanti sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:256_3: Idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0102a:256_7: sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlakusumapiḷandhanaṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevakopi loko olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādisīlaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0102a:257_0: Idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:257_1: Saggakathanti ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo,
atk-s0102a:257_4: cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti,
atk-s0102a:257_5: tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.
atk-s0102a:258_0: Evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā puna hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya –
atk-s0102a:258_4: ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”tiādinā nayena kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:258_7: Saṃkilesoti tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0102a:258_9: Evaṃ kāmādīnavena tejjatvā nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi,
atk-s0102a:259_3: Bhagavā kira tesaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarassūpanissayaṃ olokento anekāsu jātīsu cīvaradānādīni disvā etha bhikkhavotiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:259_4: Te tāvadeva bhaṇḍū kāsāyavasanā aṭṭhahi bhikkhuparikkhārehi sarīrapaṭimukkeheva vassasatikattherā viya bhagavantaṃ namassamānāva nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:260_9: rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ dassento pañca lakkhaṇāni dassesi,
atk-s0102a:260_11: tathā vayaṃ dassentopi udayabbayavasena paññāsalakkhaṇāni dassesi,
atk-s0102a:262_2: Idhalokatthañceva paralokatthañca tāsetvā tāsetvā adhigataṃ viya katvā kathesi.
atk-s0102a:262_3: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇapañcavīsatimahābhayappabhedañhi idhalokatthaṃ buddhe bhagavati tāsetvā tāsetvā kathayante pacchābāhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:262_4: gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cātumahāpathe pahārasatena tāḷetvā dakkhiṇadvārena niyyamāno viya āghātanabhaṇḍikāya
atk-s0102a:262_5: ṭhapitasīso viya sūle uttāsito viya mattahatthinā maddiyamāno viya ca saṃviggo hoti.
atk-s0102a:262_6: Paralokatthañca kathayante nirayādīsu nibbatto viya devalokasampattiṃ anubhavamāno viya ca hoti.
atk-s0102a:263_0: Sampahaṃsesīti paṭiladdhaguṇena codesi, mahānisaṃsaṃ katvā kathesīti attho.
atk-s0102a:264_0: Saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavanti heṭṭhā paṭhamamaggādhigamatthaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0102a:264_6: alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuccitu”ntiādinā nayena saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavañca
atk-s0102a:264_12: nibbānaṃ nāma paṇītaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇa”ntiādinā nayena nibbāne ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0102a:267_0: 80. Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma, dhammañcāti saṅghassa aparipuṇṇattā dvevācikameva saraṇamagamaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:270_2: Sambodhito satta saṃvaccharāni satta māse satta divase atikkamitvā udapādi.
atk-s0102a:270_8: ime ca avasesā bhikkhū gihikālepi mayhaṃ puttameva parivāretvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0102a:270_10: ahameva ca ne catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmi,
atk-s0102a:270_11: aññesaṃ okāsaṃ na dassāmī”ti vihāradvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya yāva rājagehadvārā ubhayato khadirapākāraṃ
atk-s0102a:270_12: kārāpetvā kilañjehi chādāpetvā vatthehi paṭicchādāpetvā upari ca chādāpetvā suvaṇṇatārakavicittaṃ samolambitatālakkhandhamattaṃ
atk-s0102a:270_13: vividhapupphadāmavitānaṃ kārāpetvā heṭṭhā bhūmiyaṃ cittattharaṇehi santharāpetvā anto ubhosu passesu
atk-s0102a:270_15: sakalamaggavāsatthāya ca gandhantare pupphāni pupphantare gandhe ca ṭhapāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0102a:271_0: Bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto antosāṇiyāva rājagehaṃgantvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ paccāgacchati.
atk-s0102a:271_14: Satthā ca uppajjamāno sadevakassa lokassa atthāya hitāya uppanno.
atk-s0102a:271_15: Na hi raññoyeva nirayo uṇho assa,
atk-s0102a:271_21: raññā saddhiṃ yujjhitvāpi saṅghaṃ gahetvā dānādīni puññāni karoma.
atk-s0102a:271_22: Na sakkā kho pana suddhanāgareheva evaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0102a:272_4: api ca kho pana paṭhamadivaso mayhaṃ dātabbo”ti.
atk-s0102a:272_13: alabhantā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhitukāmā devāti. Yujjhāmi, tāta,
atk-s0102a:272_15: Deva tumhākaṃ dāsā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhāmāti vadanti,
atk-s0102a:272_18: Nāgarehi vinā na samattho ahaṃ devāti.
atk-s0102a:272_21: senāpatipi tesaññeva pakkho”ti ñatvā “aññānipi sattamāsādhikāni sattasaṃvaccharāni mayhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ dadantū”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:272_27: “atikakkhaḷaṃ dāni raññā saddhiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti anujāniṃsu.
atk-s0102a:273_0: Rājā sattamāsādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ sajjitaṃ dānamukhaṃ sattannameva divasānaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0102a:273_1: cha divase kesañci apassantānaṃyeva dānaṃ datvā sattame divase nāgare pakkosāpetvā –
atk-s0102a:273_4: “nanu amheyeva nissāya taṃ devassa uppanna”nti vatvā –
atk-s0102a:273_6: Rājā piṭṭhihatthena assūni puñchamāno bhagavantaṃ vanditvā – “bhante,
atk-s0102a:273_7: ahaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassaṃ aññassa vāraṃ akatvā yāvajīvaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmīti cintesiṃ.
atk-s0102a:273_9: nāgarā hi ‘mayaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhāmā’ti kuppanti.
atk-s0102a:273_10: Bhagavā sve paṭṭhāya tesaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:274_1: “ajja yathā añño koci ekabhikkhampi na deti,
atk-s0102a:274_3: Taṃ divasaṃ seṭṭhibhariyā rodamānā dhītaraṃ āha – “sace, amma,
atk-s0102a:274_8: ahaṃ tathā karissāmi yathā buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho paṭhamaṃ amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ paribhuñjissatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:274_9: Tato satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā nirudakapāyāsassa pūretvā sappimadhusakkarādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā
atk-s0102a:274_10: aññāya pātiyā paṭikujjitvā taṃ sumanamālāguḷehi parikkhipitvā mālāguḷasadisaṃ katvā bhagavato gāmaṃ pavisanavelāya
atk-s0102a:274_15: na ca tesaṃ punappunaṃ bhaṇantānaṃ kathā paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā hoti. Sā –
atk-s0102a:274_16: “cūḷapitā mahāpitā mātulā kissa tumhe gantuṃ na dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:274_18: “aññassa kassaci khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dātuṃ mā dethā”ti ṭhapitamha ammāti.
atk-s0102a:274_19: Kiṃ pana me hatthe khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ passathāti?
atk-s0102a:274_21: Kiṃ tumhākaṃ senāpati mālāguḷapūjampi kātuṃ na detīti? Deti, ammāti. Tena hi, apetha,
atk-s0102a:274_22: apethāti bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mālāguḷaṃ gaṇhāpetha bhagavāti āha.
atk-s0102a:274_23: Bhagavā ekaṃ senāpatissupaṭṭhākaṃ oloketvā mālāguḷaṃ gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0102a:274_25: bhavābhave nibbattiyaṃ me sati paritassanajīvitaṃ nāma mā hotu,
atk-s0102a:274_26: ayaṃ sumanamālā viya nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne piyāva homi,
atk-s0102a:274_27: nāmena ca sumanā yevā”ti patthanaṃ katvā satthārā –
atk-s0102a:274_28: “sukhinī hohī”ti vuttā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0102a:275_0: Bhagavā senāpatissa gehaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:275_4: Atthi no eko antarā piṇḍapāto laddhoti.
atk-s0102a:275_8: Pāyāso bhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahoti.
atk-s0102a:275_10: Satthā bhattakiccaṃ katvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0102a:275_15: evarūpāya ghare vasantiyā purisassa saggasampatti nāma na dullabhāti taṃ ānetvā jeṭṭhikaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:276_1: punadivase rājāti ekantarikāya dānaṃ dātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:276_2: Rājāpi carapurise ṭhapetvā nāgarehi dinnadānato atirekataraṃ deti,
atk-s0102a:276_3: nāgarāpi tatheva katvā raññā dinnadānato atirekataraṃ.
atk-s0102a:276_6: na gahapatikānaṃ gattavatthādīsu puñchitvā bāḷadārakānaṃ kheḷasiṅghāṇikādidhovanahatthehi kataṃ,
atk-s0102a:276_11: na aññesaṃ jaṅghasīsapiṭṭhiādīni bhañjitvā āharāpitehi kataṃ,
atk-s0102a:276_13: Evaṃ sattasu saṃvaccharesu sattasu māsesu sattasu divasesu ca atikkantesu atha bhagavato ayaṃ vitakko udapādi.
atk-s0102a:276_15: “sambodhito satta saṃvaccharāni satta māsāni satta divasāni atikkamitvā udapādī”ti.
atk-s0102a:279_1: Khantī paramaṃ tapoti adhivāsanakhanti nāma paramaṃ tapo.
atk-s0102a:279_3: Titikkhā saṅkhātā adhivāsanakhanti uttamaṃ tapoti attho.
atk-s0102a:279_4: Nibbānaṃ paramanti sabbākārena pana nibbānaṃ paramanti vadanti buddhā.
atk-s0102a:279_5: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātīti yo adhivāsanakhantivirahitattā paraṃ upaghāteti bādheti hiṃsati,
atk-s0102a:279_8: “Na hi pabbajito”ti etassa hi na samaṇo hotīti vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:279_12: Yo ca samaṇo paraṃ yaṃ kañci sattaṃ viheṭhayanto parūpaghātī hoti,
atk-s0102a:279_14: so pabbajito nāma na hotīti attho.
atk-s0102a:279_15: Athavā yo adhivāsanakhantiyā abhāvato parūpaghātī hoti,
atk-s0102a:279_16: paraṃ antamaso ḍaṃsamakasampi sañcicca jīvitā voropeti,
atk-s0102a:279_25: so paraṃ viheṭhayanto samaṇo na hoti.
atk-s0102a:280_6: Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya samathavipassanāhi kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena cittaṃ pariyodāpetabbanti
atk-s0102a:280_7: etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhī ti.
atk-s0102a:281_11: Tattha dvīhiyeva paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpito hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:281_12: Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa anupavadanaṃ anupaghātanaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaro paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu
atk-s0102a:281_13: mattaññutā aṭṭhasamāpattivasibhāvāya vivittasenāsanasevanañca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti.
atk-s0102a:281_14: Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:283_1: Ettāvatā ca iminā vipassissa bhagavato apadānānusārena vitthārakathanena –
atk-s0102a:283_4: dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā”ti evaṃ vuttāya dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni –
atk-s0102a:283_5: “devatāpi tathāgatassa etamatthaṃ ārocesu”nti vuttaṃ devatārocanaṃ pakāsetuṃ ekamidāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:284_4: evaṃ sesabuddhānampi sāsane vutthabrahmacariyā devatā ārocayiṃsu,
atk-s0102a:284_5: pāḷi pana vipassissa ceva amhākañca bhagavato vasena āgatā.
atk-s0102a:285_6: Sabbeheva ca saguṇehi bhavasampattiyā ca jeṭṭhā,
atk-s0102a:286_1: Imasmiñhi sutte vipassissa bhagavato apadānavasena tayo bhāṇavārā vuttā.
atk-s0102a:286_5: Iti sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ vasena amhākaṃ bhagavatā ekavīsati bhāṇavārā kathitā.
atk-s0102a:286_11: Tepiṭake buddhavacane aññaṃ suttaṃ chabbīsatibhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:286_13: Ito paraṃ anusandhidvayampi niyyātento iti kho bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:293_4: Kurūsu viharatīti kurū nāma jānapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0102a:293_5: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “kurū”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:293_8: mandhātukāle tīsu dīpesu manussā “jambudīpo nāma buddhapaccekabuddhamahāsāvakacakkavattippabhutīnaṃ uttamamanussānaṃ
