atk-s0102a:552_1: Maṃyeva uddisitvā mama paccāsīsamāno bhikkhusaṅgho hotu,
atk-s0102a:552_3: yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotūti iti vā yassa assāti attho.
atk-s0102a:552_4: Na evaṃ hotīti bodhipallaṅkeyeva issāmacchariyānaṃ vihatattā evaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0102a:552_9: Maññeti jiṇṇasakaṭaṃ viya veṭhamissakena maññe yāpeti.
atk-s0102a:553_4: Tasmātihānandāti yasmā iminā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsu hoti,
atk-s0102a:553_5: tasmā tumhepi tadatthāya evaṃ viharathāti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:553_6: Attadīpāti mahāsamuddagatadīpaṃ viya attānaṃ dīpaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0102a:553_14: Evaṃ sabbaṃ tamayogaṃ chinditvā ativiya agge uttamabhāve ete, ānanda,
atk-s0102a:553_18: sabbepi te catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:556_3: Bhagavā kira vuṭṭhavasso veḷuvagāmakā nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṃ gamissāmīti āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0102a:556_4: Dhammasenāpati bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0102a:556_5: So tattha antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā
atk-s0102a:556_6: pāde pakkhāletvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā phalasamāpattiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0102a:556_7: Athassa yathāparicchedena tato vuṭṭhitassa ayaṃ parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0102a:556_10: “aggasāvakā paṭhama”nti ñatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokesi. So –
atk-s0102a:556_15: ahaṃ kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti puna cintento mātaraṃ ārabbha satiṃ uppādesi –
atk-s0102a:556_16: “mayhaṃ mātā sattannaṃ arahantānaṃ mātā hutvāpi buddhadhammasaṅghesu appasannā,
atk-s0102a:556_18: natthi nu kho”ti āvajjetvā sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā –
atk-s0102a:556_25: Tathā hissa samacittasuttadesanādivase koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0102a:556_27: Aññesu ca ṭhānesu anekā abhisamayā dissanti.
atk-s0102a:556_28: Thereva cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattāneva asītikulasahassāni.
atk-s0102a:556_30: Tasmā mātaraṃ micchādassanā mocetvā jātovarakeyeva parinibbāyissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā –
atk-s0102a:556_31: “ajjeva bhagavantaṃ anujānāpetvā nikkhamissāmī”ti cundattheraṃ āmantesi. “Āvuso, cunda,
atk-s0102a:556_36: Bhikkhū senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya therassa santikaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:556_37: Thero senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā divāṭṭhānadvāre ṭhatvā divāṭṭhānaṃ olokento –
atk-s0102a:556_39: puna āgamanaṃ natthī”ti pañcasatabhikkhuparivuto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā etadavoca –
atk-s0102a:561_0: Anujānātu me bhante, bhagavā, anujānātu sugato;
atk-s0102a:563_0: Buddhā pana yasmā “parinibbāhī”ti vutte maraṇasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ saṃvaṇṇenti nāma,
atk-s0102a:563_1: “mā parinibbāhī”ti vutte vaṭṭassa guṇaṃ kathentīti micchādiṭṭhikā dosaṃ āropessanti,
atk-s0102a:563_9: idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikānaṃ tādisassa bhikkhuno dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissatīti desehi tesaṃ dhamma”nti āha.
atk-s0102a:564_1: “satthā mayhaṃ iddhivikubbanapubbaṅgamaṃ dhammadesanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:564_2: abbhuggantvā puna oruyha bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sattatālappamāṇe antalikkhe ṭhito iddhivikubbanaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0102a:564_7: Bhagavā “dhammasenāpatiṃ paṭipādessāmī”ti dhammāsanā uṭṭhāya gandhakuṭiabhimukho gantvā maṇiphalake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:564_8: Thero tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā –
atk-s0102a:564_9: “bhagavā ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa upari anomadassisammāsambuddhassa pādamūle nipatitvā tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ patthesiṃ.
atk-s0102a:564_15: vatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha yāva dassanavisayo,
atk-s0102a:564_16: tāva abhimukhova paṭikkamitvā “ito paṭṭhāya cutipaṭisandhivasena kismiñci ṭhāne gamanāgamanaṃ nāma natthī”ti vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0102a:564_25: appamattā hothā”ti nivattāpetvā attano parisāyeva saddhiṃ pakkāmi. Manussā –
atk-s0102a:564_27: idaṃ dāni gamanaṃ na puna paccāgamanāyā”ti paridevantā anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:565_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto antarāmagge sattāhaṃ manussānaṃ anuggahaṃ karonto sāyaṃ nāḷakagāmaṃ patvā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:565_1: Atha uparevato nāma therassa bhāgineyyo bahigāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:565_5: “Kasmā āgato”ti ca vutte “ajja kira ekadivasaṃ antogāme bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:565_18: daharakāle pabbajitvā mahallakakāle gihī hotukāmo”ti cintentī jātovarakaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā pañcasatānaṃ
atk-s0102a:565_19: bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kāretvā daṇḍadīpikāyo jāletvā therassa pāhesi.
atk-s0102a:566_4: Tesu gatamattesuyeva therassa kharo ābādho uppajji,
atk-s0102a:566_9: “mama puttassa pavatti mayhaṃ na ruccatī”ti attano vasanagabbhadvāraṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:566_10: Cattāro mahārājāno “dhammasenāpati kuhiṃ viharatī”ti olokentā “nāḷakagāme jātovarake parinibbānamañce nipanno,
atk-s0102a:566_11: pacchimadassanaṃ gamissāmā”ti āgamma vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero –
atk-s0102a:566_18: Tesaṃ gatāvasāne teneva nayena sakko devānamindo,
atk-s0102a:566_19: tasmiṃ gate suyāmādayo mahābrahmā ca āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:567_1: “ke nu kho ete mama puttaṃ vanditvā gacchantī”ti therassa gabbhadvāraṃ gantvā – “tāta, cunda,
atk-s0102a:567_7: Sā tuyhaṃ tāta dassanatthāyāti vatvā “tāta ke paṭhamaṃ āgatā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0102a:567_12: amhākaṃ satthu paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya khaggahatthā hutvā ārakkhaṃ akaṃsūti.
atk-s0102a:567_19: amhākaṃ satthu tāvatiṃsato otaraṇakāle pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā otiṇṇoti.
atk-s0102a:567_20: Tassa tāta gatāvasāne jotamāno viya ko āgatoti?
atk-s0102a:567_21: Upāsike tuyhaṃ bhagavā ca satthā ca mahābrahmā nāma esoti.
atk-s0102a:567_22: Mayhaṃ bhagavato mahābrahmatopi tvaṃ tāta mahantataroti?
atk-s0102a:567_24: ete nāma kira amhākaṃ satthu jātadivase cattāro mahābrahmāno mahāpurisaṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti.
atk-s0102a:568_2: kīdiso vata mayhaṃ puttassa bhagavato satthu ānubhāvo bhavissatī”ti cintayantiyā sahasā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīre phari. Thero –
atk-s0102a:568_7: satthu panassa kīdiso guṇo bhavissatīti idaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0102a:568_14: sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samo nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:568_15: itipi so bhagavāti vitthāretvā buddhaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:569_0: Brāhmaṇī piyaputtassa dhammadesanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya puttaṃ āha – “tāta, upatissa,
atk-s0102a:569_2: evarūpaṃ nāma amataṃ mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na adāsī”ti. Thero –
atk-s0102a:569_3: “dinnaṃ dāni me mātu rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā posāvanikamūlaṃ,
atk-s0102a:569_4: ettakena vaṭṭissatī”ti cintetvā “gaccha mahāupāsike”ti brāhmaṇiṃ uyyojetvā “cunda kā velā”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:569_8: Maṃ ukkhipitvā nisīdāpehi cundāti ukkhipitvā nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0102a:569_10: “āvuso catucattālīsaṃ vo vassāni mayā saddhiṃ vicarantānaṃ yaṃ me kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha,
atk-s0102a:569_12: amhākaṃ chāyā viya tumhe amuñcitvā vicarantānaṃ aruccanakaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:569_14: Atha thero aruṇasikhāya paññāyamānāya mahāpathaviṃ unnādayanto anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0102a:569_15: Bahū devamanussā therassa parinibbāne sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0102a:570_0: Āyasmā cundo therassa pattacīvarañca dhātuparissāvanañca gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā ānandattheraṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0102a:570_1: Bhagavā dhātuparissāvanaṃ gahetvā pañcahi gāthāsatehi therassa guṇaṃ kathetvā dhātucetiyaṃ kārāpetvā
atk-s0102a:570_6: Bhagavā tassa dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpetvā rājagahato nikkhamitvā anupubbena gaṅgābhimukho gantvā ukkacelaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:570_7: Tattha gaṅgātīre bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā tattha sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ parinibbānappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0102a:570_8: suttaṃ desetvā ukkacelato nikkhamitvā vesāliṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:570_9: Evaṃ gate atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya vesāliṃ piṇḍāya pāvisīti ayamettha anupubbī kathā.
atk-s0102a:572_0: Iti aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassento tathāgatassa khotiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:572_2: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:572_8: Yatheva hi veḷuvagāmake uppannaṃ māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ dasa māse vikkhambheti,
atk-s0102a:572_9: evaṃ punappunaṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā dasa dasa māse vikkhambhento imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyya,
atk-s0102a:572_12: buddhā ca khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ apatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti.
atk-s0102a:572_13: Buddhānubuddhesu ca mahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu ekakeneva khāṇukena viya ṭhātabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:573_1: Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0102a:573_2: Yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0102a:573_5: Māro hi yassa sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā,
atk-s0102a:573_9: So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti?
atk-s0102a:573_12: tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti.
atk-s0102a:573_13: Tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati.
atk-s0102a:573_15: Therassa panesa mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati?
atk-s0102a:573_17: Taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ na paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0102a:575_1: Māro pāpimāti ettha māroti satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro.
atk-s0102a:575_3: So hi pāpadhammasamannāgatattā “pāpimā”ti vuccati. Kaṇho, antako, namuci,
atk-s0102a:575_5: Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi bhagavato sambodhipattiyā aṭṭhame sattāhe bodhimaṇḍeyeva āgantvā –
atk-s0102a:576_5: Pariyattipaṭivedhadhammānaṃyeva dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:576_12: Sappāṭihāriyanti yāva na niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessanti.
atk-s0102a:577_2: Phītanti vuddhippattaṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāya sampattivasena.
atk-s0102a:577_3: Vitthārikanti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhitavasena.
atk-s0102a:577_6: Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yattakā viññujātikā devā ceva manussā ca atthi sabbehi suṭṭhu pakāsitanti attho.
atk-s0102a:578_7: mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthaṃ vāyāmaṃ karohīti vadati.
atk-s0102a:580_1: Sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajji, pajahi.
atk-s0102a:580_2: Tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji,
atk-s0102a:580_3: temāsamattameva pana samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0102a:581_7: bhītassa udānaṃ nāma natthī”ti etassa dīpanatthaṃ pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0102a:582_0: Tattha sabbesaṃ soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
atk-s0102a:582_2: na vā tulaṃ sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyaṃ kammaṃ atthīti atulaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
atk-s0102a:582_19: bhavābhisaṅkhāraṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji.
atk-s0102a:582_20: Saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato samāhito hutvā abhindī”ti.
atk-s0102a:583_4: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0102a:583_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhārakammaṃ –
atk-s0102a:583_6: “kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ vuttena kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0102a:583_7: Ajjhattarato samāhito abhindi kavacamiva attani sambhavaṃ.
atk-s0102a:583_8: So hi vipassanāvasena ajjhattarato samathavasena samāhitoti evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya samathavipassanābalena
atk-s0102a:583_11: Kilesābhāvena ca katakammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ kilesappahānena kammaṃ pajahi,
atk-s0102a:585_1: Yaṃ mahāvātāti yena samayena yasmiṃ vā samaye mahāvātā vāyanti,
atk-s0102a:585_6: Puna vāto attano balena antodhamakaraṇe viya udakaṃ ābandhitvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0102a:586_4: So imaṃ pathaviṃ kampetīti so iddhiṃ nibbattetvā saṃvejento mahāmoggallāno viya,
atk-s0102a:586_5: vīmaṃsanto vā mahānāgattherassa bhāgineyyo saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero viya pathaviṃ kampeti.
atk-s0102a:586_6: So kirāyasmā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā cintesi –
atk-s0102a:586_8: yena pabbajitadivaseyeva arahattaṃ patvā vejayanto pāsādo kampitapubbo”ti? Tato –
atk-s0102a:586_10: “ahaṃ kampessāmī”ti abhiññābalena vejayantamatthake ṭhatvā pādena paharitvā kampetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0102a:586_13: tvaṃ pūtigandheneva sīsena vejayantaṃ kampetuṃ icchasi,
atk-s0102a:587_3: kahaṃ nu kho me ācariyo sāmuddikamahānāgatthero”ti āvajjento mahāsamudde udakaleṇaṃ māpetvā divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0102a:587_4: nisinnoti ñatvā tattha gantvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:587_17: ettakenā”ti vatvā pāsādena patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotūti adhiṭṭhāya vejayantābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:588_13: Sāmaṇero pāsādaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā pāsādamatthake ṭhatvā udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0102a:593_0: Ito paresu chasu pathavīkampesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāpadāne vuttameva.
atk-s0102a:594_0: Iti imesu aṭṭhasu pathavīkampesu paṭhamo dhātukopena,
atk-s0102a:594_7: Mātukucchiṃ okkamante ca tato nikkhamante ca mahāsatte tassa puññatejena pathavī akampittha.
atk-s0102a:595_4: Bhagavā pana sallakkhitabhāvaṃ jānantopi okāsaṃ adatvāva aññānipi aṭṭhakāni sampiṇḍento –
atk-s0102a:597_5: Yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇoti te odātāpi honti kāḷāpi maṅguracchavīpi,
atk-s0102a:597_13: Yādisako tesaṃ saroti te chinnassarāpi honti gaggarassarāpi kākassarāpi,
atk-s0102a:597_16: Sacepi hi satthā rājāsane nisinno katheti,
atk-s0102a:597_17: “ajja rājā madhurena sarena kathetī”ti tesaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:597_18: Kathetvā pakkante pana bhagavati puna rājānaṃ āgataṃ disvā –
atk-s0102a:597_20: Tattha ko nu kho ayanti imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāneva māgadhabhāsāya sīhaḷabhāsāya madhurenākārena kathento ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito, kiṃ devo,
atk-s0102a:597_21: udāhu manussoti evaṃ vīmaṃsantāpi na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0102a:597_24: Evaṃ sutopi hi dhammo anāgate paccayo hoti yevāti anāgataṃ paṭicca deseti.
atk-s0102a:597_25: Anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisantiādīnampi soṇadaṇḍakūṭadaṇḍasamāgamādivasena ceva aññacakkavāḷavasena ca sambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:598_0: Imā pana aṭṭha parisā bhagavā kimatthaṃ āhari?
atk-s0102a:598_3: imāpi aṭṭha parisā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ desentassa tathāgatassa bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0102a:598_4: māraṃ pana ekakaṃ disvā tathāgato bhāyeyyāti ko evaṃ saññaṃ uppādetumarahati. Abhīto, ānanda,
atk-s0102a:601_0: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññītiādīsu pana ajjhattarūpe parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī nāma hoti.
atk-s0102a:601_1: Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti.
atk-s0102a:601_2: Pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā hatthapādapiṭṭhesu vā akkhīnaṃ pītakaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0102a:601_3: Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0102a:601_4: Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
atk-s0102a:601_5: Taṃ pana sunīlaṃ supītaṃ sulohitakaṃ suodātakaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0102a:602_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassevaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:602_2: so evaṃ ajjhattaṃ parikammassa bahiddhā ca appanāya vasena –
atk-s0102a:602_3: “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:602_8: Tāni abhibhuyyāti yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā –
atk-s0102a:602_9: “kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ atthī”ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti,
atk-s0102a:602_12: nāyaṃ mama bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
atk-s0102a:602_14: Jānāmi passāmīti iminā panassa ābhogo kathito.
atk-s0102a:602_17: Evaṃsaññī hotīti ābhogasaññāyapi jhānasaññāyapi evaṃsaññī hoti.
atk-s0102a:603_2: Abhibhuyyāti ettha pana yathā mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā –
atk-s0102a:603_4: kiṃ etaṃ mayhaṃ karissatī”ti taṃ na mahantato passati,
atk-s0102a:603_5: evameva ñāṇuttaro puggalo visadañāṇo “kiṃ ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:603_7: na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro atthī”ti tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
atk-s0102a:604_0: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.
atk-s0102a:605_0: Eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti yassa parikammampi nimittampi bahiddhāva uppannaṃ,
atk-s0102a:605_1: so evaṃ bahiddhā parikammassa ceva appanāya ca vasena –
atk-s0102a:605_2: “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:605_4: Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0102a:605_9: Sā ca nesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimagge caritaniddese vuttā.
atk-s0102a:606_3: apaññāya mānavivarāni asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:606_7: Visuddhavaṇṇavaseneva hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni.
atk-s0102a:606_17: dvīsupi passesu maṭṭhaṃ mudu siniddhaṃ khāyati.
atk-s0102a:607_1: “Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vā”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0102a:607_2: panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva.
atk-s0102a:607_5: evarūpāpi samāpattiyo samāpajjantassa ca vuṭṭhahantassa ca tathāgatassa bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0102a:607_6: māraṃ pana ekakaṃ disvā tathāgato bhāyeyyāti ko evaṃ saññaṃ uppādetumarahati. Abhīto, ānanda,
atk-s0102a:609_4: etāpi samāpattiyo samāpajjantassa ca vuṭṭhahantassa ca tathāgatassa bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā natthi…pe…
atk-s0102a:610_1: Idānipi bhagavā ānandassa okāsaṃ adatvāva ekamidāhantiādinā nayena aparampi desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0102a:610_2: Tattha paṭhamābhisambuddhoti abhisambuddho hutvā paṭhamameva aṭṭhame sattāhe.
atk-s0102a:613_3: Saddahasi tvanti evaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ tathāgatassa saddahasīti vadati.
atk-s0102a:614_5: tavevāyaṃ aparādho”ti evaṃ sokavinodanatthāya nānappakārato therasseva dosāropanatthaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0102a:615_11: yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ,
atk-s0102a:615_12: taṃ vata tathāgatassāpi sarīraṃ mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0102a:615_13: rodantenāpi kandantenāpi na sakkā taṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhunti.
atk-s0102a:616_1: Yathayidaṃ brahmacariyanti yathā idaṃ sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0102a:616_5: Etesaṃ pana bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ vinicchayo sabbākārena visuddhimagge paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddese vutto.
atk-s0102a:619_1: Nāgāpalokitanti yathā hi mahājanassa aṭṭhīni koṭiyā koṭiṃ āhacca ṭhitāni paccekabuddhānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:619_4: Buddhānaṃ pana saṅkhalikāni viya ekābaddhāni hutvā ṭhitāni,
atk-s0102a:619_5: tasmā pacchato apalokanakāle na sakkā hoti gīvaṃ parivattetuṃ.
atk-s0102a:619_6: Yathā pana hatthināgo pacchābhāgaṃ apaloketukāmo sakalasarīreneva parivattati,
atk-s0102a:619_10: “bhagavā anekāni kappakoṭisahassāni pāramiyo pūrentehi tumhehi na gīvaṃ parivattetvā apalokanakammaṃ
atk-s0102a:619_11: kata”nti ayaṃ pathavī kulālacakkaṃ viya parivattetvā bhagavantaṃ vesālinagarābhimukhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0102a:620_1: sāvatthirājagahanāḷandapāṭaligāmakoṭigāmanātikagāmakesupi tato tato nikkhantakāle taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ pacchimadassanameva,
atk-s0102a:620_4: Tattha tattha hi nivattetvā apalokentassetaṃ na acchariyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:620_8: Te taṃ nagaradvāre nāgāpalokitaṃ nāma cetiyaṃ katvā gandhamālādīhi pūjessanti,
atk-s0102a:620_9: taṃ nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatīti tesaṃ anukampāya apalokesi.
atk-s0102a:623_3: buddhādayo mahante mahante apadisitvā vuttāni mahākāraṇānīti attho.
atk-s0102a:624_1: Neva abhinanditabbanti haṭṭhatuṭṭhehi sādhukāraṃ datvā pubbeva na sotabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:624_2: evaṃ kate hi pacchā “idaṃ na sametī”ti vuccamāno –
atk-s0102a:624_4: idāni na dhammo”ti vatvā laddhiṃ na vissajjeti.
atk-s0102a:624_6: “kiṃ esa bālo vadatī”ti evaṃ pubbeva na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:624_7: evaṃ vutte hi vattuṃ yuttampi na vakkhati. Tenāha –
atk-s0102a:624_10: Sādhukaṃ uggahetvāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāḷi vuttā,
atk-s0102a:624_13: imasmiṃ ṭhāne pubbāparaṃ kathitanti suṭṭhu gahetvā.
atk-s0102a:625_9: vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evaṃ dveyeva piṭakāni pariyādiyanti.
atk-s0102a:625_11: vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evampi tīṇi piṭakāni na tāva pariyādiyanti.
atk-s0102a:626_1: “asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ na atthī”ti taṃ sabbaṃ paṭipakkhipitvā –
atk-s0102a:626_4: Tato taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento idaṃ suttamāhari –
atk-s0102a:627_2: ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya,
atk-s0102a:627_9: dubbharatāya saṃvattanti no subharatāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami,
atk-s0102a:627_16: ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya,
atk-s0102a:627_23: subharatāya saṃvattanti no dubbharatāya. Ekaṃsena, gotami,
atk-s0102a:628_1: Vinayeti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe saṃsandetabbānīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0102a:628_2: Na ceva sutte osarantīti suttapaṭipāṭiyā katthaci anāgantvā challiṃ uṭṭhapetvā guḷhavessantara-
atk-s0102a:628_6: Evaṃ āgatāni hi rāgādivinaye ca na paññāyamānāni chaḍḍetabbāni honti.
atk-s0102a:629_2: catutthaṃ mahāpadesaṃ dhāreyyāthāti idaṃ catutthaṃ dhammassa patiṭṭhānokāsaṃ dhāreyyātha.
atk-s0102a:630_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:631_2: ayaṃ vinayo”ti dhammavinicchaye patte ime cattāro mahāpadesā pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:632_6: taṃ vo na kappatī”tiādinā nayena khandhake vuttā cattāro mahāpadesā pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:633_3: ṭhapanīyo pañhoti imāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni nāma.
atk-s0102a:633_10: sotampi aniccaṃ ghānampi anicca”nti evaṃ vibhajitvā byākātabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:633_13: yathā sotaṃ tathā cakkhu”nti puṭṭhena “kenaṭṭhena pucchasī”ti paṭipucchitvā “dassanaṭṭhena pucchāmī”ti vutte “na hī”ti byākātabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:633_16: “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”ntiādīni puṭṭhena pana “abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā”ti ṭhapetabbo,
atk-s0102a:633_19: Iti tenākārena pañhe sampatte imāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:634_0: Suttādīsu pana suttaṃ nāma tisso saṅgītiyo ārūḷhāni tīṇi piṭakāni.
atk-s0102a:634_3: Attanomati nāma nayaggāhena anubuddhiyā attano paṭibhānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:634_8: Ācariyavādopi suttena samentoyeva gahetabbo, na itaro.
atk-s0102a:634_10: sāpi suttena samentāyeva gahetabbā, na itarā.
atk-s0102a:634_16: Tattha otarantānipi hi padabyañjanāni na ceva sutte otaranti,
atk-s0102a:636_2: So kira aḍḍho mahākuṭumbiko bhagavato paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpanno hutvā attano ambavane vihāraṃ kārāpetvā niyyātesi.
atk-s0102a:637_1: Taṃ kira mudu ceva siniddhañca hoti,
atk-s0102a:637_11: Tattha pana dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu devatā ojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:638_0: Nāhaṃ tanti imaṃ sīhanādaṃ kimatthaṃ nadati?
atk-s0102a:638_4: āvāṭe nikhaṇāpetvā vināsesīti hi vattukāmānaṃ idaṃ sutvā vacanokāso na bhavissatīti paresaṃ upavādamocanatthaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadatīti.
atk-s0102a:643_6: Ayampi vaṇijjameva karonto pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā dhuravāte vāyante purato gacchati,
atk-s0102a:643_7: pacchā vāte vāyante satthavāhaṃ purato pesetvā sayaṃ pacchā gacchati.
atk-s0102a:643_9: tasmā esa purato satthavāhaṃ pesetvā sabbaratanayāne nisīditvā kusinārato nikkhamitvā “pāvaṃ gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0102a:645_2: Asaniyā phalantiyāti navavidhāya asaniyā bhijjamānāya viya mahāravaṃ ravantiyā.
atk-s0102a:645_3: Navavidhā hi asaniyo – asaññā, vicakkā, saterā, gaggarā, kapisīsā,
atk-s0102a:645_12: Kapisīsā bhamukaṃ ukkhipento makkaṭo viya hoti.
atk-s0102a:646_0: Deve vassanteti sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjitvā antarantarā vassante.
atk-s0102a:646_3: Etthesoti etasmiṃ kāraṇe eso mahājanakāyo sannipatito.
atk-s0102a:646_5: So taṃ bhanteti so tvaṃ bhante.
atk-s0102a:647_6: Taṃ kira so tathārūpe chaṇadivaseyeva dhāretvā sesakāle nikkhipati.
atk-s0102a:647_15: Kiñcāpi hesa evarūpaṃ lābhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0102a:647_19: “anārādhako maññe ānando pañcavīsati vassāni upaṭṭhahantena na kiñci bhagavato santikā tena laddhapubba”nti.
atk-s0102a:647_24: Mallaputtena pana ānandaṃ pūjentena saṅghopi pūjito bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:647_25: evamassa mahāpuññarāsi bhavissatī”ti therassa ekaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0102a:648_4: Hataccikaṃ viyāti yathā hatacciko aṅgāro antanteneva jotati,
atk-s0102a:648_6: evaṃ bahi paṭicchannappabhaṃ hutvā khāyatīti attho.
atk-s0102a:649_1: dvīsupi kālesūti kasmā imesu dvīsu kālesu evaṃ hoti?
atk-s0102a:649_3: Etesu hi dvīsu kālesu sakalacakkavāḷe devatā āhāre ojaṃ pakkhipanti,
atk-s0102a:649_4: taṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ kucchiṃ pavisitvā pasannarūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0102a:649_5: Āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpassa pasannattā manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni ativiya virocanti.
atk-s0102a:649_7: “anekakappakoṭisatasahassasañcito vata me kilesarāsi ajja pahīno”ti āvajjantassa balavasomanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:649_10: lohite pasanne manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni ativiya virocanti.
atk-s0102a:649_12: anekehi buddhasatasahassehi paviṭṭhaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ nāma nagaraṃ pavisissāmī”ti āvajjantassa balavasomanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:649_15: lohite pasanne manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni ativiya virocanti.
atk-s0102a:649_16: Iti āhāravisesena ceva balavasomanassena ca imesu dvīsu kālesu evaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:651_1: Nhatvā ca pivitvā cāti ettha tadā kira bhagavati nahāyante antonadiyaṃ macchakacchapā ca ubhatotīresu vanasaṇḍo ca sabbaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇameva hoti.
atk-s0102a:651_3: Āyasmantaṃ cundakanti tasmiṃ kira khaṇe ānandatthero udakasāṭakaṃ pīḷento ohīyi,
atk-s0102a:652_0: Gantvāna buddho nadikaṃ kakudhanti imāpi gāthā saṅgītikāleyeva ṭhapitā.
atk-s0102a:652_1: Tattha pavattā bhagavā idha dhammeti bhagavā idha sāsane dhamme pavattā,
atk-s0102a:652_5: Evaṃ anuppattaṃ atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0102a:653_1: Alābhāti ye aññesaṃ dānānisaṃsasaṅkhātā lābhā honti,
atk-s0102a:653_5: Uttaṇḍulaṃ vā atikilinnaṃ vā ko jānāti,
atk-s0102a:653_6: kīdisampi pacchimaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā tathāgato parinibbuto,
atk-s0102a:653_7: addhā te yaṃ vā taṃ vā dinnaṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-s0102a:654_0: Nanu ca yaṃ sujātāya dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā tathāgato abhisambuddho,
atk-s0102a:654_2: ayaṃ pana cundena dinno vītarāgavītadosavītamohakāle paribhutto,
atk-s0102a:654_4: Parinibbānasamatāya ca samāpattisamatāya ca anussaraṇasamatāya ca.
atk-s0102a:654_5: Bhagavā hi sujātāya dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto,
atk-s0102a:654_6: cundena dinnaṃ paribhuñjitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutoti evaṃ parinibbānasamatāyapi samaphalā.
atk-s0102a:654_8: parinibbānadivasepi sabbā tā samāpajjīti evaṃ samāpattisamatāyapi samaphalā.
atk-s0102a:654_12: taṃ kira piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0102a:654_19: mayhaṃ kira piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā satthā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto”ti sutvā “lābhā
atk-s0102a:654_20: vata me”ti anussarato balavasomanassaṃ udapādīti evaṃ anussaraṇasamatāyapi samaphalāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:656_2: Veraṃ na cīyatīti pañcavidhaṃ veraṃ na vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0102a:656_3: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti kusalo pana ñāṇasampanno ariyamaggena anavasesaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ akusalaṃ jahāti.
atk-s0102a:656_4: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti so imaṃ pāpakaṃ jahitvā rāgādīnaṃ khayā kilesanibbānena nibbutoti.
atk-s0102a:656_6: attano ca dakkhiṇeyyasampattiṃ sampassamāno udānaṃ udānesīti.
atk-s0102a:659_1: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti idha bhikkhūnaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi.
atk-s0102a:659_3: “na cirena bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā tato tato āgatesu bhikkhūsu ekabhikkhupi pakkanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:659_5: Upavattanaṃ mallānaṃ sālavananti yatheva hi kalambanadītīrato rājamātuvihāradvārena thūpārāmaṃ gantabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:659_9: Yathā thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivatto,
atk-s0102a:659_10: evaṃ uyyānato sālavanaṃ pācīnamukhaṃ gantvā uttarena nivattaṃ.
atk-s0102a:659_13: Antarena yamakasālānaṃ uttarasīsakanti tassa kira mañcakassa ekā sālapanti sīsabhāge hoti,
atk-s0102a:659_15: Tatrāpi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanno hoti,
atk-s0102a:659_17: Api ca yamakasālā nāma mūlakhandhaviṭapapattehi aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitvā ṭhitasālāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:659_18: Mañcakaṃ paññapehīti tasmiṃ kira uyyāne rājakulassa sayanamañco atthi,
atk-s0102a:662_0: Hemavato ca tambo ca, mandākini uposatho;
atk-s0102a:664_0: Ettha yaṃ dasannaṃ gocarisaṅkhātānaṃ pakatihatthīnaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0102a:664_2: Evaṃ dasaguṇavaḍḍhitāya gaṇanāya pakatihatthīnaṃ koṭisahassabalappamāṇaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0102a:664_3: taṃ sabbampi cundassa piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuttakālato paṭṭhāya caṅgavāre pakkhittaudakaṃ viya parikkhayaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0102a:664_5: etasmiṃ antare pañcavīsatiyā ṭhānesu nisīditvā mahatā ussāhena āgacchantopi sūriyassa atthaṅgamitavelāyaṃ sañjhāsamaye bhagavā sālavanaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0102a:664_6: Evaṃ rogo sabbaṃ ārogyaṃ maddanto āgacchati.
atk-s0102a:664_7: Etamatthaṃ dassento viya sabbalokassa saṃvegakaraṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto –
atk-s0102a:665_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ mahantena ussāhena idhāgato,
atk-s0102a:665_2: Parinibbāyituṃ nāma na katthaci na sakkā,
atk-s0102a:665_5: “mayi aññattha parinibbāyante mahāsudassanasuttassa atthuppatti na bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:665_6: kusinārāyaṃ pana parinibbāyante yamahaṃ devaloke anubhavitabbaṃ sampattiṃ manussalokeyeva anubhaviṃ,
atk-s0102a:665_8: taṃ me sutvā bahū janā kusalaṃ kātabbaṃ maññissantī”ti.
atk-s0102a:666_5: Kusinārāyaṃ parinibbāyantaṃ pana maṃ so upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissati,
atk-s0102a:666_6: pañhāvissajjanapariyosāne ca saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya mama santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:666_7: gahetvā mayi dharamāneyeva arahattaṃ patvā pacchimasāvako bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:667_3: Kusinārāyaṃ parinibbute doṇabrāhmaṇo taṃ vivādaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo vibhajissatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:667_4: Imehi tīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā evaṃ mahantena ussāhena idhāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:668_0: Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogīseyyā, petaseyyā, sīhaseyyā, tathāgataseyyāti catasso seyyā.
atk-s0102a:669_3: kāmabhogī sattā vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-s0102a:669_4: Tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇena passena sayantā nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:670_3: Appamaṃsalohitattā hi petā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0102a:671_4: Tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne,
atk-s0102a:671_5: pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:671_6: ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati.
atk-s0102a:671_7: Divasaṃ sayitvāpi pabujjhamāno na utrasanto pabujjhati,
atk-s0102a:671_8: sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti.
atk-s0102a:671_9: Sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti –
atk-s0102a:671_10: “na yidaṃ tuyhaṃ jātiyā sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati,
atk-s0102a:671_13: “tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ
atk-s0102a:671_14: vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-s0102a:673_4: jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:673_15: niddāvasena pana taṃ rattiṃ bhagavato bhavaṅgassa okāsoyeva nāhosi.
atk-s0102a:674_0: Sabbaphāliphullāti sabbe samantato pupphitā mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggā ekacchannā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0102a:674_9: ākāsesu ākāsapadumāni pathavītalaṃ bhinditvā daṇḍapadumāni pupphiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:674_14: supūritaṃ pupphacaṅkoṭakaṃ viya ca atiramaṇīyo ahosi.
atk-s0102a:675_0: Te tathāgatassa sarīraṃ okirantīti te yamakasālā bhummadevatāhi sañcalitakhandhasākhaviṭapā tathāgatassa sarīraṃ avakiranti,
atk-s0102a:675_8: aññānipi pana dibbāni pāricchattakakoviḷārapupphādīni suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakāni pūretvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyampi
atk-s0102a:675_11: Tathāgatassa sarīranti antarā avikiṇṇāneva āgantvā pattakiñjakkhareṇucuṇṇehi tathāgatassa sarīrameva okiranti.
atk-s0102a:676_6: ṭhitāhi devatāhi paviṭṭhāni antarā avippakiritvā tathāgatasseva sarīraṃ okiranti.
atk-s0102a:677_3: tūriyāni ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā antalikkhe vajjantīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0102a:678_0: Dibbānipi saṅgītānīti varuṇavāraṇadevatā kira nāmetā dīghāyukā devatā –
atk-s0102a:678_1: “mahāpuriso manussapathe nibbattitvā buddho bhavissatī”ti sutvā “paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase naṃ gahetvā gamissāmā”ti mālaṃ ganthetumārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:678_3: “mahāpuriso mātukucchiyaṃ nibbatto”ti sutvā “tumhe kassa ganthathā”ti vuttā “na tāva niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0102a:678_6: Ekūnatiṃsavassāni ghare vasitvā “ajja mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto”tipi sutvā “abhisambodhidivase gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0102a:678_7: Chabbassāni padhānaṃ katvā “ajja abhisambuddho”tipi sutvā “dhammacakkappavattanadivase gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0102a:678_8: “Sattasattāhāni bodhimaṇḍe vītināmetvā isipatanaṃ gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattita”ntipi sutvā “yamakapāṭihāriyadivase gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0102a:678_13: “Ajja bhagavā yamakasālānamantare dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ upagato balavapaccūsasamaye parinibbāyissati.
atk-s0102a:678_25: Nanu nāma dutiyadivase yāgupānakālamattampi ṭhātabbaṃ assa.
atk-s0102a:678_26: Dasa pāramiyo pūretvā buddhattaṃ pattassa nāma ananucchavikameta”nti apariniṭṭhitāva mālāyo gahetvā āgamma
atk-s0102a:678_27: anto cakkavāḷe okāsaṃ alabhamānā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ lambitvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyāva ādhāvantiyo
atk-s0102a:678_28: hatthena hatthaṃ gīvāya gīvaṃ gahetvā tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni chabbaṇṇarasmiyo
atk-s0102a:678_29: dasa pāramiyo aḍḍhachaṭṭhāni jātakasatāni cuddasa buddhañāṇāni ārabbha gāyitvā tassa tassa avasāne “mahāyaso,
atk-s0102a:679_1: Bhagavā pana yamakasālānaṃ antarā dakkhiṇena passena nipannoyeva pathavītalato yāva cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyā,
atk-s0102a:679_2: cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭito ca yāva brahmalokā sannipatitāya parisāya mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ disvā āyasmato ānandassa ārocesi.
atk-s0102a:679_6: Evaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ dassetvā tenāpi attano asakkatabhāvameva dassanto na kho, ānanda,
atk-s0102a:680_1: mayā dīpaṅkarapādamūle nipannena aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā abhinīhāraṃ karontena na mālāgandhatūriyasaṅgītānaṃ atthāya abhinīhāro kato,
atk-s0102a:680_3: Tasmā na kho ahaṃ etāya pūjāya pūjito nāma homī”ti.
atk-s0102a:681_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā aññattha ekaṃ umāpupphamattampi gahetvā buddhaguṇe āvajjetvā katāya pūjāya buddhañāṇenāpi
atk-s0102a:681_1: aparicchinnaṃ vipākaṃ vaṇṇetvā idha evaṃ mahantaṃ pūjaṃ paṭikkhipatīti?
atk-s0102a:681_3: Sace hi bhagavā evaṃ na paṭikkhipeyya,
atk-s0102a:681_4: anāgate sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ na paripūressanti,
atk-s0102a:681_8: Āmisapūjā ca nāmesā sāsanaṃ ekadivasampi ekayāgupānakālamattampi sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0102a:681_9: Mahāvihārasadisañhi vihārasahassaṃ mahācetiyasadisañca cetiyasahassampi sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:681_15: tasmā taṃ dassento yo kho ānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:682_0: Tattha dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti navavidhassa lokuttaradhammassa anudhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0102a:682_3: Tameva pubbabhāgapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ anudhammaṃ carati pūretīti anudhammacārī.
atk-s0102a:683_0: Pubbabhāgapaṭipadāti ca sīlaṃ ācārapaññatti dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ yāva gotrabhuto sammāpaṭipadā veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:683_1: Tasmā yo bhikkhu chasu agāravesu patiṭṭhāya paññattiṃ atikkamati,
atk-s0102a:683_4: Yo pana sabbaṃ attano paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ jinavelaṃ jinamariyādaṃ jinakāḷasuttaṃ aṇumattampi na vītikkamati,
atk-s0102a:683_7: Yo upāsako pañca verāni dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattati appeti,
atk-s0102a:684_1: Ayañhi nirāmisapūjā nāma sakkoti mama sāsanaṃ sandhāretuṃ.
atk-s0102a:684_2: Yāva hi imā catasso parisā maṃ imāya pūjessanti,
atk-s0102a:684_3: tāva mama sāsanaṃ majjhe nabhassa puṇṇacando viya virocissatīti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:686_3: Thero ekavacaneneva tālavaṇṭaṃ nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:686_4: Upaṭṭhākotiādi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ anibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha. Ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0102a:686_5: āyasmā upavāṇoti evaṃ therena vutte ānando upavāṇassa sadosabhāvaṃ sallakkheti,
atk-s0102a:686_7: Tattha yebhuyyenāti idaṃ asaññasattānañceva arūpadevatānañca ohīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:686_9: Bhagavato kira āsannapadese vālaggamatte okāse sukhumattabhāvaṃ māpetvā dasa dasa mahesakkhā devatā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:686_14: Tāsaṃ parato saṭṭhi saṭṭhi devatā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:686_15: Tā aññamaññaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā vatthena vā na byābādhenti.
atk-s0102a:686_18: “Tā kho pana devatāyo dasapi hutvā vīsatipi hutvā tiṃsampi hutvā cattālīsampi hutvā paññāsampi hutvā āraggakoṭinitudanamattepi tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0102a:686_19: na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhentī”ti vuttasadisāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:686_22: So paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā atimahā viya ahosi.
atk-s0102a:687_0: Tathāgataṃ dassanāyāti bhagavato mukhaṃ daṭṭhuṃ alabhamānā evaṃ ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:687_1: Kiṃ pana tā theraṃ vinivijjha passituṃ na sakkontīti? Āma,
atk-s0102a:687_3: Devatā hi puthujjane vinivijjha passituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0102a:687_5: Therassa ca mahesakkhatāya tejussadatāya upagantumpi na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:688_0: Vipassimhi kira sammāsambuddhe parinibbute ekagghanasuvaṇṇakkhandhasadisassa dhātusarīrassa ekameva cetiyaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0102a:688_2: Taṃ manussā ratanāyāmāhi vidatthivitthatāhi dvaṅgulabahalāhi suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi haritālena ca manosilāya
atk-s0102a:688_3: ca mattikākiccaṃ tilateleneva udakakiccaṃ sādhetvā yojanappamāṇaṃ uṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:688_9: tato tāvatiṃsā devatā yojanappamāṇaṃ uṭṭhapesunti evaṃ sattayojanikaṃ cetiyaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0102a:688_10: Manussesu mālāgandhavatthādīni gahetvā āgatesu ārakkhadevatā gahetvā tesaṃ passantānaṃyeva cetiyaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0102a:689_0: Tadā ayaṃ thero brāhmaṇamahāsālo hutvā ekaṃ pītakaṃ vatthaṃ ādāya gato.
atk-s0102a:689_1: Devatā tassa hatthato vatthaṃ gahetvā cetiyaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0102a:689_2: Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā pasannacitto “ahampi anāgate evarūpassa buddhassa cetiye ārakkhadevatā homī”ti patthanaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0102a:689_3: Tassa devaloke ca manussaloke ca saṃsarantasseva kassapo bhagavā loke uppajjitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0102a:689_6: So tattha ārakkhadevatā hutvā sāsane antarahite sagge nibbattitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle tato cuto mahākule
atk-s0102a:689_7: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā nikkhamma pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0102a:689_8: Iti cetiye ārakkhadevatā hutvā āgatattā thero tejussadoti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:690_3: na mayhaṃ puttassa añño koci doso atthīti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:691_5: kathaṃ bhūtā pana tā tumhe manasi karotha,
atk-s0102a:691_8: “nāhaṃ adhivāsanakāraṇaṃ vadāmī”ti tāsaṃ anadhivāsanabhāvaṃ dassento santānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:692_0: Tattha ākāse pathavīsaññiniyoti ākāse pathaviṃ māpetvā tattha pathavīsaññiniyo.
atk-s0102a:692_2: Chinnapātaṃ papatantīti majjhe chinnā viya hutvā yato vā tato vā papatanti.
atk-s0102a:692_5: Apica dve pāde pasāretvā sakiṃ purato sakiṃ pacchato sakiṃ vāmato sakiṃ dakkhiṇato saṃparivattamānāpi –
atk-s0102a:692_8: devatā pathaviyaṃ pathavīsaññiniyoti pakatipathavī kira devatā dhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0102a:692_9: Tattha hatthako brahmā viya devatā osīdanti.
atk-s0102a:692_13: Tasmā yā devatā pathaviyaṃ pathaviṃ māpesuṃ,
atk-s0102a:695_1: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāti buddhakāle kira dvīsu kālesu bhikkhū sannipatanti upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ,
atk-s0102a:695_4: evaṃ tambapaṇṇidīpepi apāragaṅgāya bhikkhū lohapāsāde sannipatiṃsu,
atk-s0102a:695_6: Tesu apāragaṅgāya bhikkhū saṅkārachaḍḍakasammajjaniyo gahetvā āgantvā mahāvihāre sannipatitvā cetiye sudhākammaṃ katvā –
atk-s0102a:695_7: “vuṭṭhavassā āgantvā lohapāsāde sannipatathā”ti vattaṃ katvā phāsukaṭṭhānesu vasitvā vuṭṭhavassā āgantvā lohapāsāde pañcanikāyamaṇḍale,
atk-s0102a:695_12: Yo pāḷiṃ vā aṭṭhakathaṃ vā virādheti, taṃ –
atk-s0102a:695_13: “kassa santike tayā gahita”nti vicāretvā ujuṃ katvā gāhāpenti.
atk-s0102a:695_15: Evaṃ dvīsu kālesu sannipatitesu bhikkhūsu ye pure vassūpanāyikāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gatā visesārocanatthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0102a:696_1: Ye vā mano manaṃ bhāventi vaḍḍhenti rāgarajādīni pavāhenti,
atk-s0102a:696_3: Thero kira vattasampanno mahallakaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā thaddho hutvā na nisīdati,
atk-s0102a:696_4: paccuggamanaṃ katvā hatthato chattañca pattacīvarañca gahetvā pīṭhaṃ papphoṭetvā deti,
atk-s0102a:696_5: tattha nisinnassa vattaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ paṭijaggitvā deti.
atk-s0102a:696_6: Navakaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā tuṇhībhūto na nisīdati,
atk-s0102a:696_8: So tāya vattapaṭipattiyā aparihāniṃ patthayamāno evamāha.
atk-s0102a:697_1: “ānando manobhāvanīyānaṃ dassanaṃ na labhissāmī”ti cinteti, handassa,
atk-s0102a:697_3: yattha vasanto ito cito ca anāhiṇḍitvāva lacchati manobhāvanīye bhikkhū dassanāyāti cintetvā cattārimānītiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:698_1: yassa pāto paṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇavattādīni sabbavattāni katāneva paññāyanti.
atk-s0102a:699_0: Ye hi kecīti idaṃ cetiyacārikāya satthakabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:699_1: Tattha cetiyacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantāti ye ca tāva tattha tattha cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjantā,
atk-s0102a:699_2: āsanāni dhovantā bodhimhi udakaṃ siñcantā āhiṇḍanti,
atk-s0102a:699_3: tesu vattabbameva natthi asukavihāre “cetiyaṃ vandissāmā”ti nikkhamitvā pasannacittā antarā kālaṅkarontāpi
atk-s0102a:701_4: Dvāraṃ pidahitvā senāsane nisinno hi bhikkhu āgantvā dvāre ṭhitampi mātugāmaṃ yāva na passati,
atk-s0102a:701_7: Dassane pana satiyeva tadubhayampi assa. Tenāha –
atk-s0102a:701_9: Dassane bhagavā sati kathanti bhikkhaṃ gahetvā upagataṭṭhānādīsu dassane sati kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti pucchati.
atk-s0102a:701_12: ettheva te sīsaṃ pātessāmī”ti ṭhitapurisena vā,
atk-s0102a:701_14: ettheva te maṃsaṃ murumurāpetvā khādissāmī”ti ṭhitayakkhiniyā vā ālapituṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0102a:701_15: Ekasseva hi attabhāvassa tappaccayā vināso hoti,
atk-s0102a:701_17: Mātugāmena pana ālāpasallāpe sati vissāso hoti,
atk-s0102a:703_0: Āsīvisampi āsīde, yena daṭṭho na jīvati;
atk-s0102a:704_0: Na tveva eko ekāya, mātugāmena sallape”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:705_0: Ālapantena panāti sace mātugāmo divasaṃ vā pucchati,
atk-s0102a:705_4: tathārūpaṃ vā panassa pabbajitehi kattabbakammaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:705_9: Evaṃ ālapantena pana kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti pucchati.
atk-s0102a:705_15: dhītumattīsu dhītucittaṃ upaṭṭhapethā”ti imaṃ ovādaṃ sandhāya sati, ānanda,
atk-s0102a:706_6: Kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhatāya pahitattā pesitacittā viharatha.
atk-s0102a:709_1: Rājā cakkavattīti ettha kasmā bhagavā agāramajjhe vasitvā kālaṅkatassa rañño thūpārahataṃ anujānāti,
atk-s0102a:709_4: Puthujjanabhikkhūnañhi thūpe anuññāyamāne tambapaṇṇidīpe tāva thūpānaṃ okāso na bhaveyya,
atk-s0102a:709_9: Puthujjanasīlavato pana parinibbutabhikkhuno viya mahantampi sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0102a:712_2: Yo mama anukampakoti yo maṃ anukampati anusāsati,
atk-s0102a:712_3: sve dāni paṭṭhāya kassa mukhadhovanaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0102a:712_6: kassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarissāmīti bahuṃ vilapi.
atk-s0102a:712_7: Āmantesīti bhikkhusaṅghassa antare theraṃ adisvā āmantesi.
atk-s0102a:713_5: Yathā hi eko sammukhāva karoti na parammukhā,
atk-s0102a:713_6: eko parammukhāva karoti na sammukhā evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā katenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:714_0: Mettena vacīkammenāti mettacittavasena pavattitena mukhadhovanakālārocanādinā vacīkammena.
atk-s0102a:714_3: Mettena manokammenāti kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā vivittāsane nisīditvā –
atk-s0102a:714_7: Katapuññosīti ca ettāvatā vissattho mā pamādamāpajji,
atk-s0102a:714_11: Na hi mādisassa katapāricariyā nipphalā nāma hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:715_1: Evañca pana vatvā mahāpathaviṃ pattharanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārento viya cakkavāḷagiriṃ osārento viya
atk-s0102a:715_2: sineruṃ ukkhipento viya mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento viya āyasmato ānandassa guṇakathaṃ ārabhanto
atk-s0102a:716_1: Bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāyāti ye bhagavantaṃ passitukāmā theraṃ upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0102a:716_2: ye ca “āyasmā kirānando samantapāsādiko abhirūpo dassanīyo bahussuto saṅghasobhano”ti therassa guṇe sutvā āgacchanti,
atk-s0102a:716_3: te sandhāya “bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:716_5: Attamanāti savanena no dassanaṃ sametīti sakamanā tuṭṭhacittā.
atk-s0102a:716_13: aṭṭha garudhamme samādāya vattathā”ti idampi nānākaraṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:716_15: na te kacci sīsaṃ vā aṅgaṃ vā rujjati,
atk-s0102a:716_16: arogā te puttabhātaro”ti na evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0102a:716_18: “kathaṃ upāsakā tīṇi saraṇāni pañca sīlāni rakkhatha,
atk-s0102a:717_0: Idāni ānandattherassa cakkavattinā saddhiṃ upamaṃ karonto cattārome bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:717_1: Tattha khattiyāti abhisittā ca anabhisittā ca khattiyajātikā. Te kira –
atk-s0102a:717_2: “rājā cakkavattī nāma abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko ākāsena vicaranto rajjaṃ anusāsati dhammiko dhammarājā”ti
atk-s0102a:717_3: tassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā “savanena dassanampi sama”nti attamanā honti.
atk-s0102a:717_10: dakkhiṇaṃ vā vatthāni vā kapilaṃ vā alatthā”ti paṭisanthāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0102a:717_13: na vo rājakulato daṇḍena vā balinā vā pīḷā atthi,
atk-s0102a:717_18: samaṇadhamme na pamajjathā”ti evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0102a:719_3: Sākhānagaraketi yathā rukkhānaṃ sākhā nāma khuddakā honti,
atk-s0102a:720_0: Tesu khattiyamahāsālā nāma yesaṃ koṭisatampi koṭisahassampi dhanaṃ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:720_3: Brāhmaṇamahāsālā nāma yesaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ nihitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:720_6: Gahapatimahāsālā nāma yesaṃ cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ nihitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:721_8: Hatthisaddenāti ekasmiṃ hatthimhi saddaṃ karonte caturāsītihatthisahassāni saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0102a:721_11: Puññavanto panettha sattā catusindhavayuttehi rathehi aññamaññaṃ anubandhamānā antaravīthīsu vicaranti,
atk-s0102a:722_0: Asnātha pivatha khādathāti asnātha pivatha khādatha.
atk-s0102a:722_2: bhuñjatha bhoti iminā dasamena saddena avivittā hoti anupacchinnasaddā.
atk-s0102a:722_9: phalakāvudhādīni sajjāni karothā”ti evarūpā saddā honti,
atk-s0102a:723_1: rājadhānī sattahi pākārehi parikkhittā ahosī”ti sabbaṃ mahāsudassanasuttaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā gaccha tvaṃ ānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:723_4: Kiṃ pana te bhagavato āgatabhāvaṃ na jānantīti? Jānanti.
atk-s0102a:723_5: Buddhānaṃ gatagataṭṭhānaṃ nāma mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:723_7: “Te āgantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ saṃvidahitvā dassantī”ti tesaṃ santike avelāyampi bhagavā pesesi.
atk-s0102a:725_1: Amhākañca noti ettha no kāro nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0102a:725_5: Kulaparivattaso kulaparivattaso ṭhapetvāti ekekaṃ kulaparivattaṃ kulasaṅkhepaṃ vīthisabhāgena ceva racchāsabhāgena ca visuṃ visuṃ ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0102a:727_1: Subhaddo nāma paribbājakoti udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālakulā pabbajito channaparibbājako.
atk-s0102a:727_5: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle dve bhātaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:727_8: “ekasmiṃ sasse navavāre aggasassadānaṃ mayā dātabba”nti ahosi.
atk-s0102a:727_9: So vappakāle bījaggaṃ nāma datvā gabbhakāle kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ mantesi –
atk-s0102a:727_12: Jeṭṭho kaniṭṭhassa ananuvattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā khettaṃ vibhajitvā attano koṭṭhāsato gabbhaṃ phāletvā khīraṃ nīharitvā sappinavanītena saṃyojetvā adāsi,
atk-s0102a:727_19: koṭṭhagganti evaṃ ekasasse navavāre aggadānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0102a:728_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti olokento “aññāsikoṇḍañño ekasmiṃ sasse nava aggadānāni adāsi,
atk-s0102a:728_2: imaṃ aggadhammaṃ tassa desessāmī”ti sabbapaṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0102a:728_3: So aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:728_4: Kaniṭṭho pana ohīyitvā pacchā dānassa dinnattā satthu parinibbānakāle evaṃ cintetvā satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0102a:729_2: tassa vissajjāpanatthāya bhagavato bahuṃ bhāsamānassa kāyavācāvihesā bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:729_3: pakatiyāpi ca kilantoyeva bhagavā”ti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0102a:729_6: atthikena pana anuvattitvā kāretabbo”ti theraṃ anuvattanto dutiyampi tatiyampi āha.
atk-s0102a:730_1: Assosi khoti sāṇidvāre ṭhitassa bhāsato pakatisoteneva assosi,
atk-s0102a:730_2: sutvā ca pana subhaddasseva atthāya mahatā ussāhena āgatattā alaṃ ānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:730_13: Atha bhagavā tesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvakathanena atthābhāvato ceva okāsābhāvato ca “ala”nti paṭikkhipitvā dhammameva desesi.
atk-s0102a:730_14: Paṭhamayāmasmiñhi mallānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā majjhimayāme subhaddassa,
atk-s0102a:730_15: pacchimayāme bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovaditvā balavapaccūsasamaye parinibbāyissāmicceva bhagavā āgato.
atk-s0102a:731_1: Samaṇopi tattha na upalabbhatīti paṭhamo sotāpannasamaṇopi tattha natthi,
atk-s0102a:731_5: “Imasmiṃ kho”ti purimadesanāya aniyamato vatvā idāni attano sāsanaṃ niyamento āha.
atk-s0102a:731_6: Suññā parappavādā samaṇebhīti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya āraddhavipassakehi catūhi,
atk-s0102a:731_8: phalaṭṭhehi catūhīti dvādasahi samaṇehi suññā parappavādā tucchā rittakā.
atk-s0102a:731_9: Ime ca subhaddāti ime dvādasa bhikkhū.
atk-s0102a:731_10: Sammā vihareyyunti ettha sotāpanno attano adhigataṭṭhānaṃ aññassa kathetvā taṃ sotāpannaṃ karonto sammā viharati nāma.
atk-s0102a:731_12: Sotāpattimaggaṭṭho aññampi sotāpattimaggaṭṭhaṃ karonto sammā viharati nāma.
atk-s0102a:731_14: Sotāpattimaggatthāya āraddhavipassako attano paguṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā aññampi sotāpattimaggatthāya āraddhavipassakaṃ karonto sammā viharati nāma.
atk-s0102a:731_18: Asuñño loko arahantehi assāti naḷavanaṃ saravanaṃ viya nirantaro assa.
atk-s0102a:732_2: Kiṃ kusalānuesīti “kiṃ kusala”nti anuesanto pariyesanto. Tattha –
atk-s0102a:732_5: Yato ahanti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ pabbajito,
atk-s0102a:732_6: etthantare samadhikāni paññāsa vassāni hontīti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:733_0: Ye etthāti ye tumhe ettha sāsane satthārā sammukhā antevāsikābhisekena abhisittā,
atk-s0102a:733_1: tesaṃ vo lābhā tesaṃ vo suladdhanti.
atk-s0102a:733_6: so tena attano ṭhāne ṭhapito hoti,
atk-s0102a:733_11: Therampi subhaddo tameva bāhirasamayaṃ gahetvā evamāha.
atk-s0102a:734_1: Thero kira naṃ ekamantaṃ netvā udakatumbato pānīyena sīsaṃ temetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā kesamassuṃ
atk-s0102a:734_2: ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā saraṇāni datvā bhagavato santikaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0102a:734_4: So taṃ gahetvā uyyānassa ekamante caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāya ghaṭento vāyamanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0102a:734_5: arahattaṃ patvā āgamma bhagavantaṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:735_0: So ca bhagavato pacchimo sakkhisāvako ahosīti saṅgītikārakānaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:735_1: Tattha yo bhagavati dharamāne pabbajitvā aparabhāge upasampadaṃ labhitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0102a:735_2: upasampadampi vā dharamāneyeva labhitvā aparabhāge kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0102a:735_3: kammaṭṭhānampi vā dharamāneyeva gahetvā aparabhāge arahattameva pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0102a:735_5: Ayaṃ pana dharamāneyeva bhagavati pabbajito ca upasampanno ca kammaṭṭhānañca gahetvā arahattaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0102a:738_2: taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:738_3: Tattha desito paññattoti dhammopi desito ceva paññatto ca,
atk-s0102a:738_5: Paññatto ca nāma ṭhapito paṭṭhapitoti attho.
atk-s0102a:738_6: So vo mamaccayenāti so dhammavinayo tumhākaṃ mamaccayena satthā.
atk-s0102a:738_16: ayaṃ saṅghassa santike vuṭṭhātī”ti sattāpattikkhandhavasena otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ sakhandhakaparivāro ubhatovibhaṅgo vinayo nāma desito,
atk-s0102a:738_17: taṃ sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati.
atk-s0102a:739_7: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti tena tenākārena ime dhamme vibhajitvā vibhajitvā suttantapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:739_8: taṃ sakalampi suttantapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati.
atk-s0102a:739_28: ettakā lokuttarā’ti” ime dhamme vibhajitvā vibhajitvā catuvīsatisamantapaṭṭhānaanantanayamahāpaṭṭhānapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:739_29: taṃ sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati.
atk-s0102a:740_0: Iti sabbampetaṃ abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā pañcacattālīsavassāni bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ –
atk-s0102a:740_7: Ahañca kho pana dāni ekakova ovadāmi anusāsāmi,
atk-s0102a:740_8: mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissantīti evaṃ bhagavā bahūni kāraṇāni dassento –
atk-s0102a:740_9: “so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti ovaditvā puna anāgate cārittaṃ dassento yathā kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:741_1: Nāmena vā gottena vāti navakāti avatvā “tissa,
atk-s0102a:741_5: āvuso kassapā”ti evaṃ āvusovādena vā samudācaritabbo.
atk-s0102a:741_6: Bhanteti vā āyasmāti vāti bhante tissa,
atk-s0102a:741_10: Kasmā pana samūhanathāti ekaṃseneva avatvā vikappavacaneneva ṭhapesīti?
atk-s0102a:742_2: cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakānī”tiādinā nayena pañcasatikasaṅgītiyaṃ khuddānukhuddakakathā
atk-s0102a:742_9: dubbhāsitaṃ anukhuddaka”nti vuttattā nāgasenatthero khuddānukhuddakaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0102a:746_11: na paṭipadā nu khoti yassa saṃsayo uppajjeyya,
atk-s0102a:746_12: taṃ vo vadāmi “pucchatha bhikkhave”ti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0102a:746_13: Satthugāravenāpi na puccheyyāthāti mayaṃ satthusantike pabbajimha,
atk-s0102a:746_15: te mayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kaṅkhaṃ akatvā na arahāma ajja pacchimakāle kaṅkhaṃ kātunti sace evaṃ satthari gāravena na pucchatha.
atk-s0102a:746_16: Sahāyakopi bhikkhave sahāyakassa ārocetūti tumhākaṃ yo yassa bhikkhuno sandiṭṭho sambhatto,
atk-s0102a:746_19: tassa kathaṃ sutvā sabbe nikkaṅkhā bhavissathāti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:747_0: Evaṃ pasannoti evaṃ saddahāmi ahanti attho.
atk-s0102a:747_2: ettha tathāgatassa na saddhāmattanti attho. Imesañhi,
atk-s0102a:747_3: ānandāti imesaṃ antosāṇiyaṃ nisinnānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:748_2: Iti bhagavā parinibbānamañce nipanno pañcacattālīsa vassāni dinnaṃ ovādaṃ sabbaṃ ekasmiṃ appamādapadeyeva pakkhipitvā adāsi.
atk-s0102a:748_3: Ayaṃ tathāgatassa pacchimā vācāti idaṃ pana saṅgītikārakānaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:750_1: Ito paraṃ yaṃ parinibbānaparikammaṃ katvā bhagavā parinibbuto,
atk-s0102a:750_2: taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho bhagavā paṭhamaṃ jhānantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:750_3: Tattha parinibbuto bhanteti nirodhaṃ samāpannassa bhagavato assāsapassāsānaṃ abhāvaṃ disvā pucchati.
atk-s0102a:750_5: Thero kira satthārā saddhiṃyeva taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjanto yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā vuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:750_6: tāva gantvā idāni bhagavā nirodhaṃ samāpanno,
atk-s0102a:750_7: antonirodhe ca kālaṅkiriyā nāma natthīti jānāti.
atk-s0102a:751_0: Atha kho bhagavā saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhahitvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajji…pe…
atk-s0102a:751_1: tatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjīti ettha bhagavā catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0102a:751_8: paricchedākāseti imesu tāva catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0102a:751_9: Ṭhapetvā pana dvattiṃsākārañca dasa asubhāni ca sesesu terasasu dutiyajjhānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:751_14: catūsu arūpesūti imesu pannarasasu ṭhānesu catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0102a:751_16: Nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto pana bhagavā dhammassāmī sabbāpi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā samāpattiyo
atk-s0102a:751_17: pavisitvā videsaṃ gacchanto ñātijanaṃ āliṅgetvā viya sabbasamāpattisukhaṃ anubhavitvā paviṭṭho.
atk-s0102a:752_0: Catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyīti ettha jhānasamanantaraṃ,
atk-s0102a:752_2: Tattha jhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ jhānasamanantaraṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:752_3: Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ paccavekkhaṇāsamanantaraṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:752_5: Bhagavā pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyi.
atk-s0102a:752_6: Ye hi keci buddhā vā paccekabuddhā vā ariyasāvakā vā antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya sabbe bhavaṅgacitteneva
atk-s0102a:753_0: 220. Bhūtāti sattā. Appaṭipuggaloti paṭibhāgapuggalavirahito. Balappattoti dasavidhañāṇabalaṃ patto.
atk-s0102a:755_3: Santimārabbhāti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya.
atk-s0102a:755_6: yo mama satthā buddhamuni santiṃ gamissāmīti,
atk-s0102a:755_8: tassa ṭhitacittassa tādino idāni assāsapassāso na jāto, natthi,
atk-s0102a:756_2: na vedanānuvattī hutvā ito cito ca samparivatti.
atk-s0102a:756_3: Vimokkhoti kenaci dhammena anāvaraṇavimokkho sabbaso apaññattibhāvūpagamo pajjotanibbānasadiso jāto.
atk-s0102a:757_1: Tadāsīti “saha parinibbānā mahābhūmicālo”ti evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ bhūmicālameva sandhāyāha.
atk-s0102a:758_4: Ubhopi hatthe sīse ṭhapetvā rodantīti sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:759_3: Kathaṃbhūtā pana bhante āyasmā anuruddho devatā manasikarotīti devatā, bhante,
atk-s0102a:760_2: Rattāvasesanti balavapaccūse parinibbutattā rattiyā avasesaṃ cullakaddhānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:760_3: Dhammiyā kathāyāti aññā pāṭiyekkā dhammakathā nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:760_4: “āvuso sadevake nāma loke appaṭipuggalassa satthuno ayaṃ maccurājā na lajjati,
atk-s0102a:760_5: kimaṅgaṃ pana lokiyamahājanassa lajjissatī”ti evarūpāya pana maraṇapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya vītināmesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:760_6: Tesañhi taṃ kathaṃ kathentānaṃ muhutteneva aruṇaṃ uggacchi.
atk-s0102a:761_1: Atha khoti aruṇuggaṃ disvāva thero theraṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0102a:761_2: Teneva karaṇīyenāti kīdisena nu kho parinibbānaṭṭhāne mālāgandhādisakkārena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:761_5: evaṃ yaṃ bhagavato parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā kattabbaṃ teneva karaṇīyena.
atk-s0102a:764_1: Bāhirena bāhiranti antonagaraṃ appavesetvā bāhireneva nagarassa bāhirapassaṃ haritvā.
atk-s0102a:764_2: Dakkhiṇato nagarassāti anurādhapurassa dakkhiṇadvārasadise ṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakkārasammānaṃ katvā jetavanasadise ṭhāne jhāpessāmāti attho.
atk-s0102a:765_5: “ayaṃ no pākaṭaṃ katvā kathessatī”ti theraṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:765_10: Thero paṭhamaṃ tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ dassento tumhākaṃ khotiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:765_11: Makuṭabandhanaṃ nāma mallānaṃ cetiyanti mallarājūnaṃ pasādhanamaṅgalasālāya etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0102a:766_1: Yāva sandhisamalasaṅkaṭīrāti ettha sandhi nāma gharasandhi.
atk-s0102a:766_4: Dibbehi ca mānusakehi ca naccehīti upari devatānaṃ naccāni honti,
atk-s0102a:766_8: manussānaṃ antare devatāti evampi sakkarontā pūjentā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:766_9: Majjhena majjhaṃ nagarassa haritvāti evaṃ hariyamāne bhagavato sarīre bandhulamallasenāpatibhariyā mallikā nāma –
atk-s0102a:766_10: “bhagavato sarīraṃ āharantī”ti sutvā attano sāmikassa kālaṃ kiriyato paṭṭhāya aparibhuñjitvā ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0102a:766_12: “iminā satthāraṃ pūjessāmī”ti taṃ majjāpetvā gandhodakena dhovitvā dvāre ṭhitā.
atk-s0102a:767_0: Taṃ kira pasādhanaṃ tāsañca dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ,
atk-s0102a:767_2: Sā ca satthu sarīre dvāraṃ sampatte –
atk-s0102a:767_4: satthusarīra”nti vatvā taṃ pasādhanaṃ satthusarīre paṭimuñci.
atk-s0102a:767_6: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ bhagavato sarīraṃ sattaratanamayena mahāpasādhanena pasādhitaṃ ativiya virocittha.
atk-s0102a:767_7: Taṃ sā disvā pasannacittā patthanaṃ akāsi –
atk-s0102a:767_9: tāva me pāṭiyekkaṃ pasādhanakiccaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0102a:768_0: Atha bhagavantaṃ sattaratanamayena mahāpasādhanena ukkhipitvā puratthimena dvārena nīharitvā puratthimena nagarassa makuṭabandhanaṃ mallānaṃ cetiyaṃ,
atk-s0102a:770_1: Pāvāya kusināranti pāvānagare piṇḍāya caritvā “kusināraṃ gamissāmī”ti addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0102a:770_2: Rukkhamūle nisīdīti ettha kasmā divāvihāranti na vuttaṃ?
atk-s0102a:770_4: Therassa hi parivārā bhikkhū sabbe sukhasaṃvaddhitā mahāpuññā.
atk-s0102a:770_5: Te majjhanhikasamaye tattapāsāṇasadisāya bhūmiyā padasā gacchantā kilamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:770_9: thokaṃ vissamitvā darathaṃ paṭippassambhetvā sāyanhasamaye kusināraṃ gantvā dasabalaṃ passissāmī”ti maggā
atk-s0102a:770_10: okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā udakatumbato udakena hatthapāde sītale katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:770_11: Parivārabhikkhūpissa rukkhamūle nisīditvā yoniso manasikāre kammaṃ kurumānā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:771_0: Mandāravapupphaṃ gahetvāti mahāpātippamāṇaṃ pupphaṃ āgantukadaṇḍake ṭhapetvā chattaṃ viya gahetvā.
atk-s0102a:772_2: yadā pana koci iddhimā iddhiṃ vikubbati,
atk-s0102a:772_4: Na kho pana ajja kenaci iddhivikubbanaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0102a:772_12: Mahallako pana me satthā dhuvaṃ parinibbuto bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:773_3: satthari agāravo kato bhavissatī”ti uṭṭhahitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma chaddanto nāgarājā maṇicammaṃ
atk-s0102a:773_4: viya dasabaladattiyaṃ meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasmiṃ
atk-s0102a:773_5: patiṭṭhapetvā satthari katena gāravena ājīvakassa abhimukho hutvā – “āvuso,
atk-s0102a:773_7: Kiṃ pana satthu parinibbānaṃ jānanto pucchi ajānantoti?
atk-s0102a:773_12: kulasantakampi gāmaṃ pavisitvā dvāre samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhitova bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:773_13: Thero kira iminā pacchimena attabhāvena mahājanānuggahaṃ karissāmi –
atk-s0102a:773_14: “ye mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ vā denti gandhamālādīhi vā sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0102a:773_15: tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ karoti.
atk-s0102a:774_3: Therassa pana parisāya kehici bhikkhūhi bhagavā diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0102a:774_10: te atidassanakāmatāya gantvā “kuhiṃ bhagavā”ti pucchantā “parinibbuto”ti sutvā sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhissanti.
atk-s0102a:774_11: Cīvarañca pattañca chaḍḍetvā ekavatthā vā dunnivatthā vā duppārutā vā urāni paṭipisantā parodissanti.
atk-s0102a:774_13: “mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ āgatā paṃsukūlikā sayampi itthiyo viya parodanti,
atk-s0102a:774_14: te kiṃ amhe samassāsessantī”ti mayhaṃ dosaṃ dassanti.
atk-s0102a:774_16: idha yathā tathā rodantesu doso natthi.
atk-s0102a:774_17: Purimataraṃ sutvā nāma sokopi tanuko hotīti bhikkhūnaṃ satuppādanatthāya jānantova pucchi.
atk-s0102a:775_0: Ajja sattāhaparinibbuto samaṇo gotamoti ajja samaṇo gotamo sattāhaparinibbuto.
atk-s0102a:775_1: Tato me idanti tato samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbutaṭṭhānato.
atk-s0102a:776_5: Ayaṃ kireso khandhake āgate ātumāvatthusmiṃ nahāpitapubbako vuḍḍhapabbajito bhagavati kusinārato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0102a:776_6: aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ ātumaṃ āgacchante bhagavā āgacchatīti sutvā –
atk-s0102a:776_7: “āgatakāle yāgupānaṃ karissāmī”ti sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhite dve putte etadavoca –
atk-s0102a:776_9: ātumaṃ āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi;
atk-s0102a:776_11: khurabhaṇḍaṃ ādāya nāḷiyāvāpakena anugharakaṃ anugharakaṃ āhiṇḍatha loṇampi telampi taṇḍulampi khādanīyampi
atk-s0102a:777_0: Manussā te dārake mañjuke paṭibhāneyyake disvā kāretukāmāpi akāretukāmāpi kārentiyeva.
atk-s0102a:777_7: Taṃ sutvā manussā aparigaṇetvāva yaṃ te sakkonti āharituṃ,
atk-s0102a:777_11: Atha bhagavati ātumaṃ āgantvā bhusāgāraṃ paviṭṭhe subhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ gāmadvāraṃ gantvā manusse āmantesi – “upāsakā,
atk-s0102a:777_12: nāhaṃ tumhākaṃ santikā aññaṃ kiñci paccāsīsāmi,
atk-s0102a:777_13: mayhaṃ dārakehi ābhatāni taṇḍulādīniyeva saṅghassa pahonti.
atk-s0102a:777_16: “Idañcidañca gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhetvā vihāre uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṃ kāḷakaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā tādisameva pārupitvā –
atk-s0102a:777_18: idaṃ karothā”ti sabbarattiṃ vicārento satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā bhojjayāguñca madhugoḷakañca paṭiyādāpesi.
atk-s0102a:777_20: tattha sappimadhuphāṇitamacchamaṃsapupphaphalarasādi yaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ nāma sabbaṃ pakkhipati kīḷitukāmānaṃ sīsamakkhanayoggā hoti sugandhagandhā.
atk-s0102a:778_0: Atha bhagavā kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya carituṃ ātumanagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0102a:778_4: So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena hatthena dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya
atk-s0102a:779_0: Tato “jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantī”ti khandhake āgatanayena bhagavā pucchitvā ca sutvā ca taṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ
atk-s0102a:779_5: idaṃ pana tumhākaṃ akappiyaṃ adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:779_6: imaṃ paribhuttānaṃ anekāni attabhāvasahassāni apāyesveva nibbattissanti,
atk-s0102a:780_0: Subhaddo anattamano hutvā ayaṃ “sabbaṃ jānāmī”ti āhiṇḍati.
atk-s0102a:780_3: Ayaṃ pakkāhāro nāma sabbaciraṃ tiṭṭhanto sattāhamattaṃ tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0102a:780_6: ahitakāmo ayaṃ mayhanti bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhitvā dasabale dharante kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0102a:780_11: Svāyaṃ ajja “parinibbuto bhagavā”ti sutvā laddhassāso viya haṭṭhatuṭṭho evamāha.
atk-s0102a:781_0: Thero taṃ sutvā hadaye pahāradānaṃ viya matthake patitasukkhāsani viya maññi,
atk-s0102a:781_4: dukkhena bhagavatā ārādhitasāsane nāma evaṃ lahu mahantaṃ pāpakasaṭaṃ kaṇṭako uppanno,
atk-s0102a:781_5: alaṃ kho panesa pāpo vaḍḍhamāno aññepi evarūpe sahāye labhitvā sakkā sāsanaṃ osakkāpetu”nti.
atk-s0102a:782_0: “Sace kho panāhaṃ imaṃ mahallakaṃ idheva pilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā chārikāya okirāpetvā nīharāpessāmi,
atk-s0102a:782_1: manussā ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sarīre dharamāneyeva sāvakā vivadantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ dassessanti adhivāsemi tāva.
atk-s0102a:783_1: Tattha yathā vātena pahaṭapupphāni yato vā tato vā gacchanti,
atk-s0102a:783_2: evameva evarūpānaṃ pāpapuggalānaṃ vasena gacchante gacchante kāle vinaye ekaṃ dve sikkhāpadāni nassissanti,
atk-s0102a:783_5: evaṃ anukkamena mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāma;
atk-s0102a:783_7: Evañhi sati daḷhaṃ suttena saṅgahitāni pupphāni viya ayaṃ dhammavinayo niccalo bhavissati.
atk-s0102a:784_0: Etadatthañhi bhagavā mayhaṃ tīṇi gāvutāni paccuggamanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0102a:784_3: ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā candūpamaṃ paṭipadaṃ kathento maṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā kathesi,
atk-s0102a:784_5: Mādise bhikkhumhi tiṭṭhamāne ayaṃ pāpo sāsane vuḍḍhiṃ mā alattha.
atk-s0102a:784_8: Avinayo na dippati vinayo na paṭibāhiyati.
atk-s0102a:784_14: Tato bhikkhū attano attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā kappiyākappiyaṃ kathessanti.
atk-s0102a:785_0: So evaṃ nāma mayhaṃ cittaṃ uppannanti kassaci anārocetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samassāsesi.
atk-s0102a:786_3: Na sakkonti āḷimpetunti aṭṭhapi soḷasapi dvattiṃsapi janā jālanatthāya yamakayamakaukkāyo gahetvā tālavaṇṭehi
atk-s0102a:786_4: bījantā bhastāhi dhamantā tāni tāni kāraṇāni karontāpi na sakkontiyeva aggiṃ gāhāpetuṃ.
atk-s0102a:786_5: Devatānaṃ adhippāyoti ettha tā kira devatā therassa upaṭṭhākadevatāva.
atk-s0102a:786_6: Asītimahāsāvakesu hi cittāni pasādetvā tesaṃ upaṭṭhākāni asītikulasahassāni sagge nibbattāni.
atk-s0102a:786_7: Tattha there cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattā devatā tasmiṃ samāgame theraṃ adisvā –
atk-s0102a:786_8: “kuhiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ kulūpakatthero”ti antarāmagge paṭipannaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ kulūpakattherena avandite citako mā pajjalitthā”ti adhiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:787_1: “mahākassapo kira nāma bho bhikkhu pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ ‘dasabalassa pāde vandissāmī’ti āgacchati.
atk-s0102a:787_2: Tasmiṃ kira anāgate citako na pajjalissati.
atk-s0102a:787_3: Kīdiso bho so bhikkhu kāḷo odāto dīgho rasso,
atk-s0102a:787_4: evarūpe nāma bho bhikkhumhi ṭhite kiṃ dasabalassa parinibbānaṃ nāmā”ti keci gandhamālādihatthā paṭipathaṃ gacchiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:787_5: Keci vīthiyo vicittā katvā āgamanamaggaṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:788_1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo yena kusinārā…pe…
atk-s0102a:788_2: sirasā vandīti thero kira citakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā āvajjantova sallakkhesi –
atk-s0102a:788_5: Tato pādānaṃ samīpe ṭhatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya –
atk-s0102a:788_6: “arāsahassapaṭimaṇḍitacakkalakkhaṇapatiṭṭhitā dasabalassa pādā saddhiṃ kappāsapaṭalehi pañca dussayugasatāni
atk-s0102a:788_7: suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ candanacitakañca dvedhā katvā mayhaṃ uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhahantū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:788_8: Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena tāni pañca dussayugasatāni dvedhā katvā valāhakantarā puṇṇacando viya pādā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:788_9: Thero vikasitarattapadumasadise hatthe pasāretvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇe satthupāde yāva gopphakā daḷhaṃ gahetvā attano siravare patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:789_0: Mahājano taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā ekappahāreneva mahānādaṃ nadi,
atk-s0102a:789_2: Evaṃ pana therena ca mahājanena ca tehi ca pañcahi bhikkhusatehi vanditamatte puna adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0102a:789_3: Pakatiadhiṭṭhānavaseneva therassa hatthato muccitvā alattakavaṇṇāni bhagavato pādatalāni candanadāruādīsu kiñci acāletvāva yathāṭhāne patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0102a:789_5: Bhagavato hi pādesu nikkhamantesu vā pavisantesu vā kappāsaaṃsu vā dasikatantaṃ vā telabindu vā dārukkhandhaṃ vā ṭhānā calitaṃ nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0102a:789_7: Uṭṭhahitvā pana atthaṅgate cande viya sūriye viya ca tathāgatassa pādesu antarahitesu mahājano mahākanditaṃ kandi.
atk-s0102a:790_0: Sayameva bhagavato citako pajjalīti idaṃ pana kassaci pajjalāpetuṃ vāyamantassa adassanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:791_1: Sarīrāneva avasissiṃsūti pubbe ekagghanena ṭhitattā sarīraṃ nāma ahosi.
atk-s0102a:791_2: Idāni vippakiṇṇattā sarīrānīti vuttaṃ sumanamakuḷasadisā ca dhotamuttasadisā ca suvaṇṇasadisā ca dhātuyo avasissiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0102a:791_6: mayhaṃ sāsanaṃ tāva sabbattha na vitthāritaṃ,
atk-s0102a:791_7: tasmā parinibbutassāpi me sāsapamattampi dhātuṃ gahetvā attano attano vasanaṭṭhāne cetiyaṃ katvā paricaranto
atk-s0102a:791_8: mahājano saggaparāyaṇo hotū”ti dhātūnaṃ vikiraṇaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi. Kati,
atk-s0102a:791_13: uṇhīsanti imā satta dhātuyo na vippakiriṃsu,
atk-s0102a:792_0: Udakadhārāti aggabāhumattāpi jaṅghamattāpi tālakkhandhamattāpi udakadhārā ākāsato patitvā nibbāpesi.
atk-s0102a:792_2: tesampi hi khandhantaraviṭapantarehi udakadhārā nikkhamitvā nibbāpesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:792_4: Samantā pathaviṃ bhinditvāpi naṅgalasīsamattā udakavaṭṭi phalikavaṭaṃsakasadisā uggantvā citakameva gaṇhanti.
atk-s0102a:792_5: Gandhodakenāti suvaṇṇaghaṭe rajataghaṭe ca pūretvā ābhatanānāgandhodakena.
atk-s0102a:792_6: Nibbāpesunti suvaṇṇamayarajatamayehi aṭṭhadaṇḍakehi vikiritvā candanacitakaṃ nibbāpesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:793_0: Ettha ca citake jhāyamāne parivāretvā ṭhitasālarukkhānaṃ sākhantarehi viṭapantarehi pattantarehi jālā uggacchanti,
atk-s0102a:793_1: pattaṃ vā sākhā vā pupphaṃ vā daḍḍhā nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:793_3: Ākāsato patitaudakadhārāsupi sālarukkhehi nikkhantaudakadhārāsupi pathaviṃ bhinditvā nikkhantaudakadhārāsupi dhammakathāva pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:793_4: Evaṃ citakaṃ nibbāpetvā pana mallarājāno santhāgāre catujjātiyagandhaparibhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni
atk-s0102a:793_5: pupphāni vikiritvā upari celavitānaṃ bandhitvā suvaṇṇatārakādīhi khacitvā tattha gandhadāmamālādāmaratanadāmāni
atk-s0102a:793_7: tāva ubhohi passehi sāṇikilañjaparikkhepaṃ kāretvā upari celavitānaṃ bandhāpetvā suvaṇṇatārakādīhi khacitvā
atk-s0102a:793_8: tatthapi gandhadāmamālādāmaratanadāmāni olambetvā maṇidaṇḍavaṇṇehi veṇūhi ca pañcavaṇṇaddhaje ussāpetvā
atk-s0102a:793_9: samantā vātapaṭākā parikkhipitvā susammaṭṭhāsu vīthīsu kadaliyo ca puṇṇaghaṭe ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍakadīpikā
atk-s0102a:793_10: jāletvā alaṅkatahatthikkhandhe saha dhātūhi suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ ṭhapetvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjentā sādhukīḷitaṃ
atk-s0102a:793_11: kīḷantā antonagaraṃ pavesetvā santhāgāre sarabhamayapallaṅke ṭhapetvā upari setacchattaṃ dhāresuṃ.
atk-s0102a:793_13: “atha kho kosinārakā mallā bhagavato sarīrāni sattāhaṃ santhāgāre sattipañjaraṃ karitvā”ti sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:794_0: Tattha sattipañjaraṃ karitvāti sattihatthehi purisehi parikkhipāpetvā.
atk-s0102a:794_1: Dhanupākāranti paṭhamaṃ tāva hatthikumbhena kumbhaṃ paharante parikkhipāpesuṃ,
atk-s0102a:794_5: Tesaṃ pariyante koṭiyā koṭiṃ paharamānāni dhanūni parikkhipāpesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:794_6: Iti samantā yojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ sattāhaṃ sannāhagavacchikaṃ viya katvā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:795_1: Ito purimesu hi dvīsu sattāhesu te bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ karontā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ saṃvidahantā sādhukīḷikāya okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:795_4: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ amhākaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kocideva āgantvā dhātuyo gaṇheyya,
atk-s0102a:797_5: Pothujjanikasaddhāya pana amhākaṃ raññā sadiso natthi,
atk-s0102a:797_8: Rājā kho pana amhehi anurakkhitabbo”ti te tisso suvaṇṇadoṇiyo āharitvā catumadhurassa pūretvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā etadavocuṃ – “deva,
atk-s0102a:797_10: tassa paṭighātatthaṃ tumhehi dukūladupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā yathā nāsāpuṭamattaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:797_12: Rājā atthacarānaṃ amaccānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “evaṃ hotu tātā”ti sampaṭicchitvā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0102a:798_0: Atheko amacco alaṅkāraṃ omuñcitvā kese pakiriya yāya disāya satthā parinibbuto,
atk-s0102a:798_1: tadabhimukho hutvā añjaliṃ paggayha rājānaṃ āha – “deva,
atk-s0102a:798_3: amhākaṃ āyuvaḍḍhano cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ puññakkhettaṃ abhisekasiñcako so bhagavā satthā kusinārāya parinibbuto”ti.
atk-s0102a:798_4: Rājā sutvāva visaññījāto catumadhuradoṇiyaṃ usumaṃ muñci.
atk-s0102a:798_5: Atha naṃ ukkhipitvā dutiyāya doṇiyā nipajjāpesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:798_9: Rājā punapi visaññījāto catumadhuradoṇiyā usumaṃ muñci.
atk-s0102a:798_10: Atha naṃ tatopi ukkhipitvā tatiyāya doṇiyā nipajjāpesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:798_15: atha naṃ ukkhipitvā nahāpetvā matthake ghaṭehi udakaṃ āsiñciṃsu.
atk-s0102a:799_0: Rājā saññaṃ labhitvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gandhaparibhāvite maṇivaṇṇe kese vikiritvā suvaṇṇaphalakavaṇṇāya
atk-s0102a:799_1: piṭṭhiyaṃ pakiritvā pāṇinā uraṃ paharitvā pavāḷaṅkuravaṇṇāhi suvaṭṭitaṅgulīhi suvaṇṇabimbisakavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:799_2: uraṃ sibbanto viya gahetvā paridevamāno ummattakavesena antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo,
atk-s0102a:799_3: so alaṅkatanāṭakaparivuto nagarato nikkhamma jīvakambavanaṃ gantvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnena bhagavatā dhammo desito taṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0102a:799_5: nanu imasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā dhammaṃ desayittha,
atk-s0102a:799_9: idāni pana me paṭivacanampi na detha,
atk-s0102a:799_10: bhagavā”ti punappunaṃ paridevitvā “nanu bhagavā ahaṃ aññadā evarūpe kāle ‘tumhe mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā jambudīpatale cārikaṃ carathā’ti suṇomi,
atk-s0102a:799_11: idāni panāhaṃ tumhākaṃ ananurūpaṃ ayuttaṃ pavattiṃ suṇomī”ti evamādīni ca vatvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi bhagavato guṇaṃ anussaritvā cintesi –
atk-s0102a:799_14: Sutvā ca imissā visaññibhāvādipavattiyā avasāne dūtaṃ pāhesi.
atk-s0102a:799_15: Taṃ sandhāya atha kho rājātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:800_0: Tattha dūtaṃ pāhesīti dūtañca paṇṇañca pesesi.
atk-s0102a:800_4: āharaṇupāyena āharissāmī”ti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā sayampi nikkhantoyeva.
atk-s0102a:800_6: evaṃ licchavīādayopi dūtaṃ pesetvā sayampi caturaṅginiyā senāya nikkhamiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0102a:800_7: Tattha pāveyyakā sabbehi āsannatarā kusinārato tigāvutantare nagare vasanti,
atk-s0102a:800_9: Atha kasmā paṭhamataraṃ na āgatāti ce?
atk-s0102a:800_10: Mahāparivārā panete rājāno mahāparivāraṃ karontāva pacchato jātā.
atk-s0102a:801_0: Te saṅghe gaṇe etadavocunti sabbepi te sattanagaravāsino āgantvā –
atk-s0102a:801_7: Satthā pana sayameva āgantvā sāsanaṃ pesetvā amhe pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0102a:801_8: Tumhepi kho pana yaṃ tumhākaṃ gāmakkhette ratanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:801_10: Sadevake ca loke buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:801_11: evarūpaṃ uttamaratanaṃ labhitvā mayaṃ na dassāma.
atk-s0102a:801_12: Na kho pana tumhehiyeva mātuthanato khīraṃ pītaṃ,
atk-s0102a:801_15: amhepi purisā hotū”ti aññamaññaṃ ahaṃkāraṃ katvā sāsanapaṭisāsanaṃ pesenti,
atk-s0102a:801_17: Yuddhe pana sati kosinārakānaṃyeva jayo abhavissa. Kasmā?
atk-s0102a:801_18: Yasmā dhātupāsanatthaṃ āgatā devatā nesaṃ pakkhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:801_21: na mayaṃ dassāma bhagavato sarīrānaṃ bhāga”nti ettakameva āgataṃ.
atk-s0102a:802_1: Evaṃ vutte doṇo brāhmaṇoti doṇabrāhmaṇo imaṃ tesaṃ vivādaṃ sutvā –
atk-s0102a:802_5: vūpasamessāmi na”nti so gantvā te saṅghe gaṇe etadavoca. Kimavoca?
atk-s0102a:802_6: Unnatappadese ṭhatvā dvibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma avoca.
atk-s0102a:802_7: Tattha paṭhamabhāṇavāre tāva ekapadampi te na jāniṃsu.
atk-s0102a:802_10: ācariyassa viya bho saddo”ti sabbe niravā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:802_11: Jambudīpatale kira kulaghare jātā yebhuyyena tassa na antevāsiko nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:802_12: Atha so te attano vacanaṃ sutvā nirave tuṇhībhūte viditvā puna etadavoca –
atk-s0102a:803_1: Ahu khantivādoti buddhabhūmiṃ appatvāpi pāramiyo pūrento khantivāditāpasakāle dhammapālakumārakāle chaddantahatthikāle
atk-s0102a:803_2: bhūridattanāgarājakāle campeyyanāgarājakāle saṅkhapālanāgarājakāle mahākapikāle aññesu ca bahūsu jātakesu
atk-s0102a:803_5: Kimaṅgaṃ pana etarahi iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu tādilakkhaṇaṃ patto,
atk-s0102a:803_9: sarīrabhāge siyā sampahāroti na hi sādhuyanti na hi sādhu ayaṃ.
atk-s0102a:803_12: Siyā sampahāroti āvudhasampahāro sādhu na siyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:804_0: Sabbeva bhonto sahitāti sabbeva bhonto sahitā hotha,
atk-s0102a:804_2: Samaggāti kāyena ca vācāya ca ekasannipātā ekavacanā samaggā hotha.
atk-s0102a:804_4: Karomaṭṭhabhāgeti bhagavato sarīrāni aṭṭha bhāge karoma.
atk-s0102a:804_8: tesu ekopi laddhuṃ ayutto nāma natthīti bahuṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā saññāpesi.
atk-s0102a:805_1: Tesaṃ saṅghānaṃ gaṇānaṃ paṭissutvāti tesaṃ tesaṃ tato tato samāgatasaṅghānaṃ samāgatagaṇānaṃ paṭissuṇitvā.
atk-s0102a:805_2: Bhagavato sarīrāni aṭṭhadhā samaṃ suvibhattaṃ vibhajitvāti ettha ayamanukkamo –
atk-s0102a:805_3: doṇo kira tesaṃ paṭissuṇitvā suvaṇṇadoṇiṃ vivarāpesi.
atk-s0102a:805_4: Rājāno āgantvā doṇiyaṃyeva ṭhitā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dhātuyo disvā –
atk-s0102a:805_5: “bhagavā sabbaññu pubbe mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmikhacitaṃ
atk-s0102a:805_7: idāni pana suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva dhātuyo avasiṭṭhā jātā,
atk-s0102a:806_0: Brāhmaṇopi tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ gahetvā veṭhantare ṭhapesi,
atk-s0102a:806_1: atha pacchā aṭṭhadhā samaṃ suvibhattaṃ vibhaji,
atk-s0102a:806_2: sabbāpi dhātuyo pākatikanāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo ahesuṃ,
atk-s0102a:806_4: Brāhmaṇassa pana dhātuyo vibhajantasseva sakko devānamindo –
atk-s0102a:806_5: “kena nu kho sadevakassa lokassa kaṅkhacchedanatthāya catusaccakathāya paccayabhūtā bhagavato dakkhiṇadāṭhā
atk-s0102a:806_7: “brāhmaṇopi dāṭhāya anucchavikaṃ sakkāraṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0102a:806_8: gaṇhāmi na”nti veṭhantarato gahetvā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭake ṭhapetvā devalokaṃ netvā cūḷāmaṇicetiye patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:807_0: Brāhmaṇopi dhātuyo vibhajitvā dāṭhaṃ apassanto corikāya gahitattā –
atk-s0102a:807_3: kiṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva attano dhātuyā atthibhāvaṃ na aññāsī”ti attani dosāropanaṃ sampassanto –
atk-s0102a:807_7: imassāhaṃ thūpaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā imaṃ me bhonto tumbaṃ dadantūti āha.
atk-s0102a:808_0: Pippalivaniyā moriyāpi ajātasattuādayo viya dūtaṃ pesetvā yuddhasajjāva nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:810_1: Rājagahe bhagavato sarīrānaṃ thūpañca mahañca akāsīti kathaṃ akāsi?
atk-s0102a:810_3: etthantare aṭṭhausabhavitthataṃ samatalaṃ maggaṃ kāretvā yādisaṃ mallarājāno makuṭabandhanassa ca santhāgārassa ca antare pūjaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0102a:810_4: Tādisaṃ pañcavīsatiyojanepi magge pūjaṃ kāretvā lokassa anukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ sabbattha antarāpaṇe pasāretvā
atk-s0102a:810_5: suvaṇṇadoṇiyaṃ pakkhittadhātuyo sattipañjarena parikkhipāpetvā attano vijite pañcayojanasataparimaṇḍale
atk-s0102a:810_7: Te dhātuyo gahetvā kusinārato sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷantā nikkhamitvā yattha yattha suvaṇṇavaṇṇāni pupphāni passanti,
atk-s0102a:810_8: tattha tattha dhātuyo sattiantare ṭhapetvā pūjaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:810_10: rathassa dhuraṭṭhānaṃ pacchimaṭṭhāne sampatte satta divase sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷanti.
atk-s0102a:810_11: Evaṃ dhātuyo gahetvā āgacchantānaṃ satta vassāni satta māsāni satta divasāni vītivattāni.
atk-s0102a:811_1: “samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbutakālato paṭṭhāya balakkārena sādhukīḷitāya upaddutamha sabbe no kammantā
atk-s0102a:811_2: naṭṭhā”ti ujjhāyantā manaṃ padosetvā chaḷāsītisahassamattā apāye nibbattā.
atk-s0102a:811_3: Khīṇāsavā āvajjitvā “mahājano manaṃ padosetvā apāye nibbattī”ti disvā –
atk-s0102a:811_4: “sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ dhātuāharaṇūpāyaṃ kāressāmā”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā –
atk-s0102a:811_7: puthujjano nāma ajātasattunā samo saddho natthi,
atk-s0102a:811_12: tumhe ‘amanussā mahārāja kupitā dhātuyo āharāpethā’ti vadeyyātha,
atk-s0102a:811_14: Atha kho sakko taṃ sabbaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0102a:812_3: dhātuyo āharāpehī”ti bhaṇiṃsu. Rājā – “na tāva, bhante,
atk-s0102a:812_7: Evaṃ āhatā dhātuyo gahetvā rājagahe thūpañca mahañca akāsi.
atk-s0102a:812_8: Itarepi attano attano balānurūpena āharitvā sakasakaṭṭhānesu thūpañca mahañca akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:813_1: Evametaṃ bhūtapubbanti evaṃ etaṃ dhātubhājanañceva dasathūpakaraṇañca jambudīpe bhūtapubbanti pacchā saṅgītikārakā āhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:813_2: Evaṃ patiṭṭhitesu pana thūpesu mahākassapatthero dhātūnaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā rājānaṃ ajātasattuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0102a:813_3: ekaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0102a:813_5: sesadhātuyo pana kathaṃ āharāmīti? Na, mahārāja,
atk-s0102a:813_10: Thero tesaṃ tesaṃ rājakulānaṃ paricaraṇamattameva ṭhapetvā sesadhātuyo āhari.
atk-s0102a:813_13: “Anāgate laṅkādīpe mahāvihāre mahācetiyamhi nidahissantī”ti tā na āharitvā sesehi sattahi nagarehi āharitvā
atk-s0102a:814_0: Rājā taṃ ṭhānaṃ khaṇāpetvā tato uddhatapaṃsunā iṭṭhakā kāretvā asītimahāsāvakānaṃ cetiyāni kāreti.
atk-s0102a:814_1: “Idha rājā kiṃ kāretī”ti pucchantānampi “mahāsāvakānaṃ cetiyānī”ti vadanti,
atk-s0102a:814_3: Asītihatthagambhīre pana tasmiṃ padese jāte heṭṭhā lohasanthāraṃ santharāpetvā tattha thūpārāme cetiyagharappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0102a:814_4: tambalohamayaṃ gehaṃ kārāpetvā aṭṭha aṭṭha haricandanādimaye karaṇḍe ca thūpe ca kārāpesi.
atk-s0102a:814_5: Atha bhagavato dhātuyo haricandanakaraṇḍe pakkhipitvā taṃ haricandanakaraṇḍakampi aññasmiṃ haricandanakaraṇḍake,
atk-s0102a:814_6: tampi aññasminti evaṃ aṭṭha haricandanakaraṇḍe ekato katvā eteneva upāyena te aṭṭha karaṇḍe aṭṭhasu haricandanathūpesu,
atk-s0102a:815_5: Tattha sabbaratanamayaṃ vālikaṃ okiritvā jalajathalajapupphānaṃ sahassāni vippakiritvā aḍḍhachaṭṭhāni
