atk-s0102a:1331_4: Cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ appaṭilābhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1331_5: vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā apaṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato
atk-s0102a:1332_0: Evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ sevitabbanti evarūpaṃ nekkhammasitadomanassaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1332_3: Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca sabbe te rūpā aniccā, dukkhā,
atk-s0102a:1332_4: vipariṇāmadhammāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sampappaññāya disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1332_7: Iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihapaccayā domanassaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1332_9: idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitadomanassa”nti evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate anuttaravimokkhasaṅkhātaariyaphaladhammesu
atk-s0102a:1332_10: pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā tadadhigamāya aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetumasakkontassa imampi pakkhaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1332_12: imampi saṃvaccharaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhinti anusocato uppannaṃ domanassaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1333_0: Tattha yaṃ ce savitakkasavicāranti tasmimpi duvidhe domanasse gehasitadomanassameva savitakkasavicāradomanassaṃ nāma.
atk-s0102a:1333_4: paṭhamadutiyajjhānavasena ca uppannadomanassaṃ pana avitakkaavicāradomanassanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1333_7: etassa pana bhikkhuno maññanavasena savitakkasavicāranti ca avitakkaavicāranti ca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1334_1: idha bhikkhu domanassapaccayabhūte savitakkasavicāradhamme avitakkaavicāradhamme ca domanassapaccayā
atk-s0102a:1334_2: eva uppanne maggaphaladhamme ca aññesaṃ paṭipattidassanavasena domanassanti gahetvā “kadā nu kho me savitakkasavicāradomanasse
atk-s0102a:1334_4: kadā avitakkaavicāradomanasse”ti ca “kadā nu kho me savitakkasavicāradomanassaphalasamāpatti nibbattitā bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:1334_8: Temāsikaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamāse ekaṃ yāmaṃ jaggati,
atk-s0102a:1334_17: Tatrāpi dve dve māse vuttanayena paṭipajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asakkonto visesetvā navamāsikaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1334_18: Tatrāpi tayo tayo māse tatheva paṭipajjitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asakkontassa “na ladvaṃ vata me sabrahmacārīhi
atk-s0102a:1334_19: saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretu”nti āvajjato domanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1336_1: Tassovāde ṭhatvā tiṃsasahassā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1336_2: Atheko bhikkhu “mayhaṃ tāva abbhantare guṇā appamāṇā,
atk-s0102a:1336_3: kīdisā nu kho me ācariyassa guṇā”ti āvajjanto puthujjanabhāvaṃ passitvā “amhākaṃ ācariyo aññesaṃ avassayo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1336_5: ovādamassa dassāmī”ti ākāsena gantvā vihārasamīpe otaritvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:1337_12: Tattha aṭṭhakathātherā attano kaṅkhaṃ vinodenti, āvusoti.
atk-s0102a:1337_21: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva aruṇā apare pucchanti, āvusoti.
atk-s0102a:1337_28: nanu mukhaṃ dhovitvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā tayo cattāro pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpetvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karontānaṃ okāsakālena bhavitabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0102a:1337_32: na me tumhākaṃ anumodanāya atthoti ākāse uppatitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:1338_2: mayhaṃ pana aṅkusako bhavissāmīti āgato”ti ñatvā “idāni okāso na bhavissati,
atk-s0102a:1338_3: paccūsakāle gamissāmī”ti pattacīvaraṃ samīpe katvā sabbaṃ divasabhāgaṃ paṭhamayāmamajjhimayāmañca dhammaṃ
atk-s0102a:1338_4: vācetvā pacchimayāme ekasmiṃ there uddesaṃ gahetvā nikkhante pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā teneva saddhiṃ nikkhanto.
atk-s0102a:1338_5: Nisinnaantevāsikā ācariyo kenaci papañcena nikkhantoti maññiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1338_6: Nikkhanto thero koci deva samānācariyabhikkhūti saññaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0102a:1339_1: dvīhatīheneva pāpuṇitvā paccāgamissāmī”ti antevāsikānaṃ anārocetvāva āsāḷhīmāsassa juṇhapakkhaterasiyā
atk-s0102a:1339_2: nikkhanto gāmantapabbhāraṃ gantvā caṅkamaṃ āruyha kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto taṃ divasaṃ arahattaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0102a:1339_5: Tayo māse pana tīṇi divasāni viya yāva mahāpavāraṇā tāva jānissāmī”ti vassaṃ upagantvāpi gahetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0102a:1339_11: Tato “na mañce mayhaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi maggaphalaṃ uppajjissati,
atk-s0102a:1339_12: arahattaṃ appatvā neva mañce piṭṭhiṃ pasāressāmi,
atk-s0102a:1339_13: na pāde dhovissāmī”ti mañcaṃ ussāpetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:1339_17: Gāmadārakā therassa pādesu phālitaṭṭhānāni kaṇṭakehi sibbanti,
atk-s0102a:1339_18: davaṃ karontāpi “ayyassa mahāsīvattherassa viya pādā hontū”ti davaṃ karonti.
atk-s0102a:1340_0: Thero tiṃsasaṃvacchare mahāpavāraṇādivase ālambaṇaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhito “idāni me tiṃsa vassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa,
atk-s0102a:1340_2: addhā me imasmiṃ attabhāve maggo vā phalaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0102a:1340_3: na me laddhaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretu”nti cintesi.
atk-s0102a:1340_6: Atha avidūraṭṭhāne ekā devadhītā rodamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1340_11: tena ahampi ekaṃ dve maggaphalāni nibbattessāmīti rodāmi,
atk-s0102a:1341_3: anucchavikaṃ nu kho te eta”nti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0102a:1341_4: So “idāni nipajjissāmī”ti senāsanaṃ paṭijaggitvā mañcakaṃ paññapetvā udakaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā “pāde dhovissāmī”ti sopānaphalake nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:1342_0: Antevāsikāpissa “amhākaṃ ācariyassa samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ gacchantassa tiṃsa vassāni,
atk-s0102a:1342_2: nāsakkhī”ti āvajjayamānā “arahattaṃ patvā pādadhovanatthaṃ nisinno”ti disvā “amhākaṃ ācariyo amhādisesu
atk-s0102a:1342_4: ahaṃ dhovissāmi ahaṃ dhovissāmī”ti tiṃsasahassānipi ākāsena gantvā vanditvā “pāde dhovissāma,
atk-s0102a:1342_6: idāni tiṃsa vassāni honti mama pādānaṃ adhotānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1343_1: “mayhaṃ ayyo mahāsīvatthero arahattaṃ patto tiṃsasahassānaṃ antevāsikānaṃ ‘pāde dhovissāmā’ti āgatānaṃ pāde dhovituṃ na deti.
atk-s0102a:1343_2: Mādise pana upaṭṭhāke tiṭṭhante ‘mayhaṃ ayyo sayaṃ pāde dhovissatī’ti aṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1343_3: ahaṃ dhovissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā sujātāya deviyā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa santike pāturahosi.
atk-s0102a:1343_4: So sujaṃ asurakaññaṃ purato katvā “apetha, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1343_5: mātugāmo”ti okāsaṃ kāretvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā purato ukkuṭiko nisīditvā “pāde dhovissāmi,
atk-s0102a:1343_7: idāni me tiṃsa vassāni pādānaṃ adhotānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1343_9: yojanasate ṭhitānampi kaṇṭhe āsattakuṇapaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0102a:1343_12: tumhākaṃ pana sīlagandho cha devaloke atikkamitvā upari bhavaggaṃ patvā ṭhito.
atk-s0102a:1343_13: Sīlagandhato añño uttaritaro gandho nāma natthi, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1343_14: tumhākaṃ sīlagandhenamhi āgatoti vāmahatthena gopphakasandhiyaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena pādatalaṃ parimajji.
atk-s0102a:1343_16: Sakko pāde dhovitvā vanditvā devalokameva gato.
atk-s0102a:1344_0: Evaṃ “na labhāmi sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretu”nti āvajjantassa uppannaṃ domanassaṃ
atk-s0102a:1344_1: nissāya bhikkhuno maññanavasena vipassanāya ārammaṇampi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi savitakkasavicāradomanassanti
atk-s0102a:1345_0: Tattha eko bhikkhu savitakkasavicāradomanasse vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā idaṃ domanassaṃ kiṃ nissitanti upadhārento
atk-s0102a:1345_1: vatthunissitanti pajānātīti phassapañcamake vuttanayeneva anukkamena arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1345_2: Eko avitakkāvicāre domanasse vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1346_1: Evarūpā upekkhā na sevitabbāti evarūpā gehasitaupekkhā na sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1346_3: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa,
atk-s0102a:1346_6: tasmā sā upekkhā gehasitāti vuccatī”ti evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍike nilīnamakkhikā
atk-s0102a:1346_7: viya rūpādīni anativattamānā tattheva laggā laggitā hutvā uppannā kāmaguṇanissitā upekkhā na sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1347_0: Evarūpā upekkhā sevitabbāti evarūpā nekkhammasitā upekkhā sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1347_3: Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca,
atk-s0102a:1347_5: vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato uppajjati upekkhā,
atk-s0102a:1347_9: Evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhaārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe arajjantassa,
atk-s0102a:1347_11: asamapekkhanena asammuyhantassa uppannā vipassanā ñāṇasampayuttā upekkhā.
atk-s0102a:1347_12: Apica vedanāsabhāgā tatra majjhattupekkhāpi ettha upekkhāva.
atk-s0102a:1347_13: Tasmā sevitabbāti ayaṃ nekkhammavasena vipassanāvasena anussatiṭṭhānavasena paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānavasena
atk-s0102a:1348_0: Ettha yaṃ ce savitakkaṃ savicāranti tāyapi nekkhammasitaupekkhāya yaṃ nekkhammavasena vipassanāvasena
atk-s0102a:1348_1: anussatiṭṭhānavasena paṭhamajjhānavasena ca uppannaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ upekkhanti jāneyya.
atk-s0102a:1348_2: Yaṃ ce avitakkaṃ avicāranti yaṃ pana dutiyajjhānādivasena uppannaṃ avitakkāvicāraṃ upekkhanti jāneyya.
atk-s0102a:1348_3: Ye avitakke avicāre te paṇītatareti etāsu dvīsu yā avitakkaavicārā,
atk-s0102a:1348_7: Eko hi bhikkhu savitakkasavicāraupekkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ayaṃ upekkhā kiṃ nissitāti upadhārento
atk-s0102a:1348_8: vatthunissitāti pajānātīti phassapañcamake vuttanayeneva anukkamena arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1348_9: Eko avitakkāvicārāya upekkhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva arahatte patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0102a:1348_13: Tenāha bhagavā “ye avitakke avicāre te paṇītatare”ti.
atk-s0102a:1349_3: bhikkhu papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hotīti bhagavā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:1349_7: Ekassapi bahūnampi dhammaṃ desentā arahatteneva kūṭaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0102a:1349_8: Sattā pana attano anurūpe upanissaye ṭhitā keci sotāpannā honti,
atk-s0102a:1349_14: Yathā hi rājā bhojanakāle attano pamāṇena piṇḍaṃ uddharitvā rājakumārānaṃ upaneti,
atk-s0102a:1349_15: te tato attano mukhappamāṇeneva kabaḷaṃ karonti,
atk-s0102a:1349_16: evaṃ bhagavā attajjhāsayānurūpāya desanāya arahatteneva kūṭaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1349_17: Veneyyā attano upanissayappamāṇena tato sotāpattiphalamattaṃ vā sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattaphalameva vā gaṇhanti.
atk-s0102a:1349_19: Sotāpanno ca hutvā bhagavato puratoyeva cavitvā taruṇasakko hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0102a:1349_20: devatānañhi cavamānānaṃ attabhāvassa gatāgataṭṭhānaṃ nāma na paññāyati,
atk-s0102a:1349_23: Sakko pana sayaṃ cutattā bhagavā ca appaṭihatañāṇattā dveva janā jāniṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1349_24: Atha sakko cintesi “mayhañhi bhagavatā tīsu ṭhānesu nibbattitaphalameva kathitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1349_25: ayañca pana maggo vā phalaṃ vā sakuṇikāya viya uppatitvā gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0102a:1351_1: Tato taṃ pucchanto kathaṃ paṭipanno pana,
atk-s0102a:1351_5: Sīlakathā ca nāmesā kammapathavasena vā paṇṇattivasena vā kathetabbā hoti.
atk-s0102a:1352_0: Tattha kammapathavasena kathentena asevitabbakāyasamācāro tāva pāṇātipātaadinnādānamicchācārehi kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1352_2: Sevitabbakāyasamācāro pāṇātipātādiveramaṇīhi ceva kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1352_3: Asevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādivacīduccaritena ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1352_4: Sevitabbavacīsamācāro musāvādādiveramaṇīhi ceva vacīdvāre paññattasikkhāpadaavītikkamena ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0102a:1353_1: Sā kāyavacīsamācāragahaṇena gahitāpi samānā yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ nāma etasmiññeva dvāradvaye uppajjati, na ākāse,
atk-s0102a:1354_8: ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesati,
atk-s0102a:1355_12: etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1357_11: etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā byādhidhammo samāno byādhidhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1359_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sokadhammaṃ vadetha? Puttabhariyaṃ…pe… sokadhammaṃyeva pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1360_6: etthāyaṃ gathito mucchito ajjhāpanno attanā saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhammaṃyeva pariyesati. Ayaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1361_2: evaṃ pavattā sabbāpi anesanā anariyapariyesanāyevāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1362_4: ekacco attanā jātidhammo samāno jātidhamme ādīnavaṃ viditvā ajātaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesati,
atk-s0102a:1362_6: saṃkilesadhammo samāno saṃkilesadhamme ādīnavaṃ viditvā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesati.
atk-s0102a:1363_0: Apica pañca kuhanādīni cha agocare ekavīsatividhañca anesanaṃ vajjetvā bhikkhācariyāya dhammena samena pariyesanāpi ariyapariyesanāyevāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1364_0: Ettha ca yo yo “na sevitabbo”ti vutto,
atk-s0102a:1364_1: so so pubbabhāge pāṇātipātādīnaṃ sambhārapariyesanāpayogakaraṇagamanakālato paṭṭhāya na sevitabbova.
atk-s0102a:1364_4: Apica saṅghabhedādīnaṃ atthāya parakkamantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya kāyasamācāro na sevitabbo,
atk-s0102a:1364_5: divasassa dvattikkhattuṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upaṭṭhānagamanādivasena pavatto dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattherādīnaṃ viya kāyasamācāro sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1364_6: Dhanuggahapesanādivasena vācaṃ bhindantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya vacīsamācāro na sevitabbo,
atk-s0102a:1364_7: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇakittanādivasena pavatto dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattherādīnaṃ viya vacīsamācāro sevitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1364_8: Anariyapariyesanaṃ pariyesantānaṃ devadattādīnaṃ viya pariyesanā na sevitabbā,
atk-s0102a:1364_9: ariyapariyesanameva pariyesantānaṃ dhammasenāpatimahāmoggallānattherādīnaṃ viya pariyesanā sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1365_0: Evaṃ paṭipanno khoti evaṃ asevitabbaṃ kāyavacīsamācāraṃ pariyesanañca pahāya sevitabbānaṃ pāripūriyā paṭipanno,
atk-s0102a:1365_2: bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarāya uttamajeṭṭhakasīlasaṃvaratthāya paṭipanno nāma hotīti bhagavā khīṇāsavassa āgamanīyapubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:1367_3: Vissajjane panassa cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpampītiādi sevitabbarūpādivasena indriyasaṃvaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1367_4: Tattha evaṃ vutteti heṭṭhā somanassādipañhāvissajjanānaṃ sutattā imināpi evarūpena bhavitabbanti sañjātapaṭibhāno
atk-s0102a:1367_5: bhagavatā evaṃ vutte sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca,
atk-s0102a:1367_9: Kathetukāmopi hi yo atthaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:1367_10: atthaṃ sampādetuṃ sakkonto vā na kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1367_13: sakkoti ca atthaṃ sampādetuṃ tenassa bhagavā okāsamakāsi.
atk-s0102a:1368_0: Tattha evarūpaṃ na sevitabbanti ādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepo –
atk-s0102a:1368_2: taṃ na sevitabbaṃ na daṭṭhabbaṃ na oloketabbanti attho.
atk-s0102a:1368_3: Yaṃ pana passato asubhasaññā vā saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0102a:1369_0: Yaṃ cittakkharaṃ cittabyañjanampi saddaṃ suṇato rāgādayo uppajjanti,
atk-s0102a:1369_2: Yaṃ pana atthanissitaṃ dhammanissitaṃ kumbhadāsigītampi suṇantassa pasādo vā uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1370_2: Yaṃ pana gandhaṃ ghāyato asubhasaññādipaṭilābho hoti,
atk-s0102a:1371_2: Yaṃ pana rasaṃ sāyato āhāre paṭikūlasaññā ceva uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1371_3: sāyitapaccayā ca kāyabalaṃ nissāya ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:1371_4: mahāsīvattherabhāgineyyasīvasāmaṇerassa viya paribhuñjantasseva kilesakkhayo vā hoti,
atk-s0102a:1372_2: Yaṃ pana phusato sāriputtattherādīnaṃ viya āsavakkhayo ceva,
atk-s0102a:1372_4: pacchimā ca janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpādanena anuggahitā hoti,
atk-s0102a:1372_6: Sāriputtatthero kira tiṃsa vassāni mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresi.
atk-s0102a:1372_8: Mahākassapatthero vīsavassasataṃ mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresi.
atk-s0102a:1372_16: Nāḷakatthero yāvaparinibbānā mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāresīti.
atk-s0102a:1373_0: Ye manoviññeyye dhamme samannāharantassa rāgādayo uppajjanti, “aho,
atk-s0102a:1373_1: vata yaṃ paresaṃ paravittūpakaraṇaṃ taṃ mamassā”tiādinā nayena vā abhijjhādīni āpāthamāgacchanti evarūpā dhammā na sevitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1373_3: ye vā pana tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ dhammā,
atk-s0102a:1373_5: Tayo kira therā vassūpanāyikadivase kāmavitakkādayo akusalavitakkā na vitakketabbāti katikaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1373_7: imasmiṃ temāse kittake ṭhāne cittassa dhāvituṃ dinna”nti? Na, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1373_16: bahi dhāvituṃ na adāsinti. Tumhehi, bhante,
atk-s0102a:1375_7: Tasmiṃ anekadhātunānādhātusmiṃ loke yaṃ yadeva dhātuṃ yaṃ yadeva ajjhāsayaṃ sattā abhinivisanti gaṇhanti,
atk-s0102a:1375_9: Thāmasā parāmāsāti thāmena ca parāmāsena ca.
atk-s0102a:1375_12: Idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti idaṃ amhākameva vacanaṃ saccaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1377_2: Nibbānaṃ yasmā taṃ āgamma taṇhā saṅkhiyati vinassati,
atk-s0102a:1378_0: Ettāvatā ca bhagavatā cuddasapi mahāpañhā byākatā honti.
atk-s0102a:1378_1: Cuddasa mahāpañhā nāma issāmacchariyaṃ eko pañho,
atk-s0102a:1379_5: Tasmā ayaṃ purisoti yasmā ejā attanā katakammānurūpena purisaṃ tattha tattha abhinibbattatthāya kaḍḍhati,
atk-s0102a:1379_6: tasmā ayaṃ puriso tesaṃ tesaṃ bhavānaṃ vasena uccāvacaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0102a:1379_15: Yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattanti yathā mayā suto ceva uggahito ca, evaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1379_17: Na cāhaṃ tesanti ahaṃ pana tesaṃ sāvako na sampajjāmi.
atk-s0102a:1381_3: Samupabyūḷhoti samāpanno nalāṭena nalāṭaṃ paharaṇākārappatto viya.
atk-s0102a:1381_4: Etesaṃ kira kadāci mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe saṅgāmo hoti tattha pana chedanavijjhanādīhi aññamaññaṃ ghāto nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:1381_8: Tattha yasmiṃ saṅgāme devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsu,
atk-s0102a:1381_9: taṃ sandhāya tasmiṃ kho pana bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1381_11: Duvidhampi ojaṃ ettha devaloke devāyeva paribhuñjissantīti evamassa āvajjantassa balavapītisomanassaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0102a:1381_15: Ekantanibbidāyāti ekanteneva vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāyāti sabbaṃ mahāgovindasutte vuttameva.
atk-s0102a:1382_3: Devabhūtassa me satoti devassa me sato.
atk-s0102a:1382_4: Punarāyu ca me laddhoti puna aññena kammavipākena me jīvitaṃ laddhanti,
atk-s0102a:1382_5: iminā attano cutabhāvaṃ ceva upapannabhāvañca āvikaroti.
atk-s0102a:1383_1: Āyuṃ hitvā amānusanti dibbaṃ āyuṃ jahitvā.
atk-s0102a:1383_3: Yattha me ramatī manoti yattha me mano ramissati,
atk-s0102a:1383_4: tattheva khattiyakulādīsu gabbhaṃ upagacchissāmīti sattakkhattuṃ deve ca mānuse cāti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0102a:1384_0: Ñāyena viharissāmīti manussesu upapannopi mātaraṃ jīvitā voropanādīnaṃ abhabbattā ñāyena kāraṇena samena viharissāmīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1385_0: Sambodhi ce bhavissatīti idaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sandhāya vadati,
atk-s0102a:1385_2: Aññātā viharissāmīti aññātā ājānitukāmo hutvā viharissāmi.
atk-s0102a:1385_3: Sveva anto bhavissatīti so eva me manussaloke anto bhavissatīti.
atk-s0102a:1386_1: devalokasmiṃ uttamoti puna devalokasmiṃ uttamo sakko devānamindo bhavissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0102a:1387_1: So nivāso bhavissatīti ye te āyunā ca paññāya ca akaniṭṭhā jeṭṭhakā sabbadevehi paṇītatarā devā,
atk-s0102a:1387_3: Ayaṃ kira tato sakkattabhāvato cuto tasmiṃ attabhāve anāgāmimaggassa paṭiladdhattā uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī
atk-s0102a:1387_4: hutvā avihādīsu nibbattanto avasāne akaniṭṭhe nibbattissati.
atk-s0102a:1387_10: akaniṭṭhesu soḷasāti ekatiṃsa kappasahassāni brahmaāyuṃ anubhavissati.
atk-s0102a:1387_11: Sakko devarājā anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati visākhā mahāupāsikāti tayopi hi ime ekappamāṇaāyukā eva,
atk-s0102a:1387_12: vaṭṭābhiratasattā nāma etehi sadisā sukhabhāgino nāma natthi.
atk-s0102a:1388_2: Yassu maññāmi samaṇeti ye ca samaṇe pavivittavihārinoti maññāmi.
atk-s0102a:1389_0: Ārādhanāti sampādanā. Virādhanāti asampādanā. Na sampāyantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0102a:1390_3: Yaṃ karomasīti yaṃ pubbe brahmuno namakkāraṃ karoma.
atk-s0102a:1390_5: ito paṭṭhāya idāni amhākaṃ brahmuno namakkārakaraṇaṃ natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0102a:1391_1: Parāmasitvāti tuṭṭhacitto sahāyaṃ hatthena hatthamhi paharanto viya pathaviṃ paharitvā,
atk-s0102a:1398_7: Kururaṭṭhavāsino kira bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena
atk-s0102a:1398_9: Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā gambhīrakathaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0102a:1398_10: Tena nesaṃ bhagavā imaṃ gambhīradesanāpaṭiggahaṇasamatthataṃ sampassanto ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1398_11: arahatte pakkhipitvā idaṃ gambhīratthaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1398_12: Yathā hi puriso suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakaṃ labhitvā tattha nānāpupphāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0102a:1398_13: suvaṇṇamañjūsaṃ vā pana labhitvā sattaratanāni pakkhipeyya,
atk-s0102a:1398_14: evaṃ bhagavā kururaṭṭhavāsiparisaṃ labhitvā gambhīradesanaṃ desesi.
atk-s0102a:1398_15: Tenevettha aññānipi gambhīratthāni imasmiṃ dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1399_0: Apica tasmiṃ janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
atk-s0102a:1399_4: tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasikarosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati,
atk-s0102a:1399_7: Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti.
atk-s0102a:1399_8: Yā pana “ahaṃ asukasatipaṭṭhānaṃ nāma manasikaromī”ti vadati,
atk-s0102a:1399_9: tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ katvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1400_1: eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati.
atk-s0102a:1400_2: So bhikkhunupassayaṃ upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato.
atk-s0102a:1400_5: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā mahātherī āha –
atk-s0102a:1400_7: Atthi te koci bhāvanāmanasikāroti? Natthi, ayyeti. Āvuso,
atk-s0102a:1400_8: pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0102a:1400_12: So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
atk-s0102a:1401_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena aggahesi.
atk-s0102a:1401_3: mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ.
atk-s0102a:1401_4: Taṃ ānetvā purato ṭhapitaṃ therī āha –
atk-s0102a:1401_6: sakuṇena gahitakāle kiṃ cintesī”ti? Na, ayye,
atk-s0102a:1401_10: evaṃ ayye aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti. Sādhu, sādhu,
atk-s0102a:1401_14: Tasmā nesaṃ bhagavā satipaṭṭhānabuddhimeva janento idaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1404_0: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisisaṅkamo”ti.
atk-s0102a:1405_6: maggo na dvidhā pathabhūtoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1405_17: evaṃ santepi bhagavatova so ayano tena uppāditattā.
atk-s0102a:1405_30: Pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattopi aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1410_0: Keci pana “na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti gāthānayena yasmā ekavāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1410_3: Imassa hi atthassa sakiṃ ayanoti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1410_4: Yadi pana ekaṃ ayanamassa ekā gati pavattīti evaṃ atthaṃ yojetvā vucceyya,
atk-s0102a:1410_6: attho pana ubhayathāpi na yujjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0102a:1411_0: Pubbepi ca imasmiṃ pade mahātherānaṃ sākacchā ahosiyeva.
atk-s0102a:1411_4: Ācariye pana punappunaṃ bhaṇante appaṭibāhitvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0102a:1411_8: ko nu kho ettha nicchayo”ti suttantaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya parivattento “yo hi koci,
atk-s0102a:1411_10: ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ bhāveyya satta vassānī”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne sallakkhesi.
atk-s0102a:1411_11: Lokuttaramaggo uppajjitvā satta vassāni tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:1411_13: Cūḷanāgena diṭṭho pubbabhāgamaggova labbhatīti ñatvā aṭṭhamiyaṃ dhammasavane saṅghuṭṭhe agamāsi.
atk-s0102a:1412_4: tena dhammāsane nisīditvā bījaniṃ gahetvā pubbagāthāsu vuttāsu therassa āsanapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa etadahosi –
atk-s0102a:1412_7: Na attano rucimeva ucchubhāraṃ viya evaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranti,
atk-s0102a:1412_12: So ācariyassa viya saddoti dhammaṃ ṭhapetvā “kiṃ bhante”ti āha. Āvuso, cūḷanāga,
atk-s0102a:1412_17: evarūpassāpi nāma bhikkhuno ayaṃ pañho āluḷeti,
atk-s0102a:1412_18: anāgate mama bhātikā imaṃ pañhaṃ āluḷessantīti suttaṃ gahetvā imaṃ pañhaṃ niccalaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭisambhidāmaggato
atk-s0102a:1419_2: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
atk-s0102a:1419_3: Tathā hi imināva maggena ito satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ upari ekasmiṃyeva kappe
atk-s0102a:1419_4: nibbatte taṇhaṅkaramedhaṅkarasaraṇaṅkaradīpaṅkaranāmake buddhe ādiṃ katvā sakyamunipariyosānā aneke sammāsambuddhā
atk-s0102a:1419_5: anekasatā paccekabuddhā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ariyasāvakā cāti ime sattā sabbe cittamalaṃ pavāhetvā
atk-s0102a:1423_0: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā”.
atk-s0102a:1425_0: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya pahānāyāti attho,
atk-s0102a:1425_1: ayañhi maggo bhāvito santatimahāmattādīnaṃ viya sokasamatikkamāya,
atk-s0102a:1426_0: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehi, pacchā te mātu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0102a:1427_0: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1428_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto. Paṭācārā –
atk-s0102a:1429_0: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0102a:1431_1: Yasmā pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu kañci dhammaṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0102a:1431_2: tasmā tepi imināva maggena sokaparideve samatikkantāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1432_0: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
atk-s0102a:1432_2: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa,
atk-s0102a:1432_3: sakkādīnaṃ viya ca domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1433_1: sāvatthiyaṃ kira tisso nāma kuṭumbikaputto cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo pahāya pabbajitvā agāmake araññe viharati.
atk-s0102a:1433_3: naṃ jīvitā voropethā”ti pañcasate core pesesi.
atk-s0102a:1433_9: gahetvā ajjekarattiṃ jīvitaṃ dethāti. Ko te, samaṇa,
atk-s0102a:1433_11: Thero mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ gahetvā dve ūruṭṭhīni bhinditvā “vaṭṭati upāsakā pāṭibhogo”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1433_12: Te apakkamitvā caṅkamanasīse aggiṃ katvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1433_13: Therassa vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā sīlaṃ paccavekkhato parisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0102a:1433_14: Tato anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento tiyāmarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane arahattaṃ patto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0102a:1438_0: Aparepi tiṃsa bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññavihāre vassaṃ upagantvā “āvuso,
atk-s0102a:1438_2: na aññamaññassa santikaṃ āgantabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1438_3: Tesaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paccūsasamaye pacalāyantānaṃ eko byaggho āgantvā ekekaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0102a:1438_4: Na koci “maṃ byaggho gaṇhī”ti vācampi nicchāresi.
atk-s0102a:1438_5: Evaṃ pañcasu dasasu bhikkhūsu khāditesu uposathadivase “itare, āvuso,
atk-s0102a:1438_6: kuhi”nti pucchitvā ñatvā ca “idāni gahitena gahitomhīti vattabba”nti vatvā vihariṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1438_7: Atha aññataraṃ daharabhikkhuṃ purimanayeneva byaggho gaṇhi.
atk-s0102a:1438_9: Bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍe ca ukkāyo ca gahetvā mocessāmāti anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1438_10: Byaggho bhikkhūnaṃ agatiṃ chinnataṭaṭṭhānamāruyha taṃ bhikkhuṃ pādaṅguṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya khādituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0102a:1438_13: bhikkhūnaṃ viseso nāma evarūpe ṭhāne paññāyatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0102a:1438_14: So byagghamukhe nipannova taṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento yāva gopphakā khāditasamaye sotāpanno hutvā,
atk-s0102a:1438_17: hadayarūpe akhāditeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0102a:1442_0: Kāmaṃ khādatu maṃ byaggho, aṭṭhiyā ca nhārussa ca;
atk-s0102a:1444_0: Aparopi pītamallatthero nāma gihikāle tīsu rajjesu paṭākaṃ gahetvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma rājānaṃ passitvā
atk-s0102a:1444_5: taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti na tumhākavākyaṃ sutvā cintesi “neva kira rūpaṃ attano,
atk-s0102a:1444_7: So taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvā nikkhamitvā mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajito upasampanno dvemātikā
atk-s0102a:1444_8: paguṇā katvā tiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā gabalavāliyaaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0102a:1444_10: Tamenaṃ rattiṃ eko migaluddako migoti maññamāno pahari.
atk-s0102a:1444_12: so taṃ sattiṃ harāpetvā paharaṇamukhāni tiṇavaṭṭiyā pūrāpetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ attānaṃ nisīdāpetvā okāsaṃ
atk-s0102a:1444_13: kāretvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā ukkāsitasaddena āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0102a:1446_0: Na tumhākamidaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ jaheyyātha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0102a:1449_0: Evaṃ tāva ayaṃ maggo tissattherādīnaṃ viya dukkhassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1450_0: Sakko pana devānamindo attano pañcavidhapubbanimittaṃ disvā maraṇabhayasantajjito domanassajāto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0102a:1450_1: So upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne asītisahassāhi devatāhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1450_2: Sā cassa upapatti puna pākatikāva ahosi.
atk-s0102a:1451_1: Tattha pañcasatā accharāyo rukkhato pupphāni ocinantiyo cavitvā niraye uppannā.
atk-s0102a:1451_2: So “kiṃ imā cirāyantī”ti upadhārento tāsaṃ niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kittakaṃ nu kho mama āyū”ti
atk-s0102a:1451_3: upaparikkhanto attano āyuparikkhayaṃ viditvā cavitvā tattheva niraye nibbattanabhāvaṃ disvā bhīto ativiya
atk-s0102a:1451_4: domanassajāto hutvā “imaṃ me domanassaṃ satthā vinayissati,
atk-s0102a:1451_5: na añño”ti avasesā pañcasatā accharāyo gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0102a:1454_0: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitoti. ;
atk-s0102a:1458_0: So desanāpariyosāne pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya taṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ katvā devalokameva agamāsīti.
atk-s0102a:1458_1: Evaṃ ayaṃ maggo bhāvito sakkādīnaṃ viya domanassassa atthaṅgamāya saṃvattatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1459_0: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0102a:1459_3: Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa adhigamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0102a:1459_5: Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0102a:1459_7: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0102a:1460_0: Tattha kiñcāpi “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vutte sokasamatikkamādīni atthato siddhāneva honti,
atk-s0102a:1460_1: ṭhapetvā pana sāsanayuttikovide aññesaṃ na pākaṭāni,
atk-s0102a:1460_2: na ca bhagavā paṭhamaṃ sāsanayuttikovidaṃ janaṃ katvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0102a:1460_3: Tena teneva pana suttena taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpeti.
atk-s0102a:1460_4: Tasmā idha yaṃ yaṃ atthaṃ ekāyanamaggo sādheti,
atk-s0102a:1460_5: taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1460_6: Yasmā vā yā sattānaṃ visuddhi ekāyanamaggena saṃvattati,
atk-s0102a:1460_11: Tasmā imampi kamaṃ dassento “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti vatvā “sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1461_4: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1461_5: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi yadidaṃ chachakkānī”ti chachakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1461_8: ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṅkīyanti na saṅkīyissanti,
atk-s0102a:1461_9: appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi;
atk-s0102a:1461_10: evaṃ imassāpi ekāyanamaggassa sattānaṃ visuddhiyātiādīhi sattahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1461_13: Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū “ayaṃ kira maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṃ sokaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1461_17: visuddhiṃ ñāyaṃ nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1461_20: Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0102a:1462_0: Yathā hi satasahassagghanikapaṇḍukambalavāṇijena ‘kambalaṃ gaṇhathā’ti ugghositepi asukakambaloti na tāva manussā jānanti.
atk-s0102a:1462_1: Kesakambalavāḷakambalādayopi hi duggandhā kharasamphassā kambalātveva vuccanti.
atk-s0102a:1462_2: Yadā pana tena gandhārako rattakambalo sukhumo ujjalo sukhasamphassoti ugghositaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1462_9: ayaṃ maggo’ti vuttepi asukamaggoti na tāva pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1462_11: “Sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimhi pana vutte “ayaṃ kira maggo cattāro upaddave hanati,
atk-s0102a:1462_12: tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1462_13: imañca maggaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maññissantīti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto “sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1463_5: Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā satigocaropi tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0102a:1463_12: Āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1464_1: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsituṃ arahatī”ti ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuttā.
atk-s0102a:1464_7: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva “satipaṭṭhānaṃ”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1464_10: upaṭṭhāti okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pattharitvā pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1464_14: Iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānaṃ cātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1465_5: Catassopi hi etā satiyo maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0102a:1465_10: Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0102a:1465_13: Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti,
atk-s0102a:1465_25: Evaṃ “ekāyanamaggo”ti ca “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1466_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti?
atk-s0102a:1466_2: Taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritasamathayānikavipassanāyānikesu hi mandatikkhavasena dvedhā dvedhā pavattesu veneyyesu
atk-s0102a:1466_7: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo,
atk-s0102a:1467_3: Tesaṃ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1467_4: Sukhaṃ niccaṃ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā,
atk-s0102a:1467_8: Tesaṃ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṃ vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthaṃ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti evaṃ subhasukhaniccaattabhāvavipallāsappahānatthaṃ
atk-s0102a:1467_9: vā cattārova vuttā anūnā anadhikāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1467_11: atha kho caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatipahānatthampi catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1468_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattāroti etadeva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1468_1: Yathā hi catudvāre nagare pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1468_4: Uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti; evaṃ –
atk-s0102a:1469_0: Yathā pācīnato āgacchantā pācīnadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1469_1: evaṃ kāyānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā kāyānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1469_3: Yathā dakkhiṇato āgacchantā dakkhiṇāya disāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1469_4: evaṃ vedanānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā vedanānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1469_6: Yathā pacchimato āgacchantā pacchimadisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pacchimadvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1469_7: evaṃ cittānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā cittānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1469_9: Yathā uttarato āgacchantā uttaradisāya uṭṭhānakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā uttaradvārena nagarameva pavisanti,
atk-s0102a:1469_10: evaṃ dhammānupassanāmukhena āgacchantā pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ bhāvetvā dhammānupassanābhāvanānubhāvanibbattena
atk-s0102a:1469_12: Evaṃ saraṇavasena ceva ekattasamosaraṇavasena ca ekameva satipaṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇavasena cattārova vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1470_5: seṭṭhattā pana paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanato ca “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1470_6: Bhagavato hi anusāsaniṃ sampaṭicchantesu bhikkhu seṭṭho,
atk-s0102a:1470_9: Tasmiṃ gahite pana sesā gahitāva honti,
atk-s0102a:1470_12: so bhikkhu nāma hotīti paṭipattiyā bhikkhubhāvadassanatopi “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1470_13: Paṭipannako hi devo vā hotu manusso vā,
atk-s0102a:1474_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1475_1: Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto.
atk-s0102a:1476_0: Kāyānupassīti kāye anupassanasīlo kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno.
atk-s0102a:1476_1: Kāyeti ca vatvāpi puna kāyānupassīti dutiyakāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1476_4: atha kho kāyānupassīyevāti kāyasaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1476_11: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibbhujako viya rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti
atk-s0102a:1476_12: nānappakārato samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti.
atk-s0102a:1476_13: Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati,
atk-s0102a:1476_14: yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
atk-s0102a:1477_0: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passati;
atk-s0102a:1478_0: Apassaṃ bajjhate mūḷho, bajjhamāno na muccatī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1479_5: na evaṃ aniccadukkhānattaasubhabhūteyeva imasmiṃ kāye niccasukhaattasubhabhāvānupassī,
atk-s0102a:1479_10: so satova assasatī”tiādinā nayena assāsapassāsādicuṇṇikajātaaṭṭhikapariyosāno kāyo vutto,
atk-s0102a:1479_12: āpokāyaṃ tejokāyaṃ vāyokāyaṃ kesakāyaṃ lomakāyaṃ chavikāyaṃ cammakāyaṃ maṃsakāyaṃ rudhirakāyaṃ nhārukāyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1479_14: tassa sabbassa imasmiññeva kāye anupassanato kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1480_0: Atha vā kāye ahanti vā mamanti vā evaṃ gahetabbassa yassa kassaci ananupassanato,
atk-s0102a:1480_1: tassa tasseva pana kesalomādikassa nānādhammasamūhassa anupassanato kāye kesādidhammasamūhasaṅkhātakāyānupassīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1481_1: no niccato”tiādinā anukkamena paṭisambhidāyaṃ āgatanayassa sabbasseva aniccalakkhaṇādino ākārasamūhasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0102a:1481_2: kāyassa anupassanatopi kāye kāyānupassīti evampi attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1481_3: Tathā hi ayaṃ kāye kāyānupassanāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati,
atk-s0102a:1481_17: So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0102a:1482_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātāpetīti ātāpo,
atk-s0102a:1482_6: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati,
atk-s0102a:1482_7: na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi,
atk-s0102a:1482_12: Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1482_13: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0102a:1482_15: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti,
atk-s0102a:1482_17: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati,
atk-s0102a:1482_18: tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1483_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1483_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0102a:1483_3: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0102a:1483_4: Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1483_6: Tasmā pañcapi upādānakkhandhā lokoti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1483_7: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1483_12: Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0102a:1484_5: domanassavinayena kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1484_6: Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
atk-s0102a:1484_8: yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito ca hoti.
atk-s0102a:1484_9: Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca anapanayanto yogasamattho hotīti.
atk-s0102a:1485_0: Aparo nayo “kāye kāyānupassī”ti ettha anupassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1485_6: sampajaññena vipassanā abhijjhādomanassavinayena bhāvanābalaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1486_1: Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ
atk-s0102a:1486_2: nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrīmedhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1486_3: paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo
atk-s0102a:1486_6: Imāya anupassanāya upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samannāgato,
atk-s0102a:1486_8: Viharatīti iriyati pavattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
atk-s0102a:1486_11: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho nikammo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
atk-s0102a:1486_12: anikkhittaddandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāhī vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ sammāvāyāmo,
atk-s0102a:1486_18: Yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ
atk-s0102a:1486_19: nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrīmedhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ
atk-s0102a:1486_20: paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo
atk-s0102a:1486_27: Yā sati anussati paṭissati sati saraṇatā dhāraṇatā apilāpanatā asammusanatā sati satindriyaṃ satibalaṃ sammāsati,
atk-s0102a:1487_0: Vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti tattha katamo loko?
atk-s0102a:1487_5: Yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho nandī nandirāgo cittassa sārāgo,
atk-s0102a:1487_8: Yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1487_11: idañca domanassaṃ imamhi loke vinītā honti paṭivinītā santā samitā vūpasamitā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā visositā byantīkatā,
atk-s0102a:1488_1: Tena saha ayaṃ aṭṭhakathānayo yathā saṃsandati,
atk-s0102a:1489_2: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti ettha vedanāsu vedanānupassīti evamādīsu vedanādīnaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ
atk-s0102a:1489_6: Dhammesu dhammānupassīti ettha pana vedanāti tisso vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1492_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0102a:1493_5: Yathāha “sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1494_2: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ suññatadhammassa aniccādisattānupassanānaṃ niddesavāre āgatasantādibhedānañca vasena anupassitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1494_4: Kāmañcettha yassa kāyasaṅkhāte loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīnaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1494_7: Yato vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1494_8: tenevassa tattha pahānadassanatthampi etaṃ vuttanti veditabbanti.
atk-s0102a:1497_1: Idāni seyyathāpi nāma cheko vilīvakārako thūlakilañjasaṇhakilañjacaṅkoṭakapeḷāpuṭādīni upakaraṇāni kattukāmo
atk-s0102a:1497_2: ekaṃ mahāveṇuṃ labhitvā catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ veṇukhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā phāletvā taṃ taṃ upakaraṇaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0102a:1497_3: evameva bhagavā satipaṭṭhānadesanāya sattānaṃ anekappakāraṃ visesādhigamaṃ kattukāmo ekameva sammāsatiṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0102a:1497_6: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇavasena catudhā bhinditvā tato ekekaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1497_7: gahetvā kāyaṃ vibhajanto “kathañca bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena niddesavāraṃ vattumāraddho.
atk-s0102a:1498_3: kena ca pakārena bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti?
atk-s0102a:1498_5: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhūti bhikkhave imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu.
atk-s0102a:1498_6: Ayañhettha idhasaddo sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca.
atk-s0102a:1499_0: Araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vāti idamassa satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1499_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ otarituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0102a:1499_3: Tasmā seyyathāpi nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
atk-s0102a:1499_4: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya.
atk-s0102a:1499_5: Athassa so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
atk-s0102a:1499_6: evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato
atk-s0102a:1499_7: apanetvā araññaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā suññāgāraṃ vā pavisitvā tattha satipaṭṭhānārammaṇatthambhe satiyottena

atk-s0102a:1500_0: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
atk-s0102a:1503_0: Apica yasmā idaṃ kāyānupassanāya muddhabhūtaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0102a:1503_1: ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ itthipurisahatthiassādisaddasamākulaṃ gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ sampādetuṃ,
atk-s0102a:1503_3: Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0102a:1503_4: tadeva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0102a:1504_1: So yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati,
atk-s0102a:1504_2: sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati,
atk-s0102a:1504_3: evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpasenāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā “ettha kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati,
atk-s0102a:1504_4: tato tattha kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjantena yoginā anukkamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
atk-s0102a:1505_1: Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo mige gaṇhāti,
atk-s0102a:1505_2: evameva ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena cattāro magge ceva cattāri ariyaphalāni ca gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1509_0: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1509_1: Ito paraṃ imasmiṃ ānāpānapabbe yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0102a:1509_5: dakkho bhamakāro vāti idañhi upamāmattameva iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāyeti idaṃ appanāmattameva ca tattha anāgataṃ,
atk-s0102a:1510_2: Dīghaṃ vā añchantoti mahantānaṃ bherīpokkharādīnaṃ likhanakāle hatthe ca pāde ca pasāretvā dīghaṃ kaḍḍhanto.
atk-s0102a:1510_3: Rassaṃ vā añchantoti khuddakānaṃ dantasūcivedhakādīnaṃ likhanakāle mandamandaṃ rassaṃ kaḍḍhanto.
atk-s0102a:1510_4: Evameva khoti evaṃ ayampi bhikkhu addhānavasena ittaravasena ca pavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ vasena dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe…
atk-s0102a:1510_6: Tassevaṃ sikkhato assāsapassāsanimitte cattāri jhānāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0102a:1510_7: so jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā assāsapassāse vā pariggaṇhāti jhānaṅgāni vā.
atk-s0102a:1511_3: karajakāyo nāma cattāri mahābhūtāni upādārūpañce”ti evaṃ rūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1511_5: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggahetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaṭiccasamuppādaṃ disvā “paccayapaccayuppannadhammamattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1511_6: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0102a:1511_7: Idaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1512_3: karajakāyo rūpa”nti nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesanto avijjādipaccayākāraṃ disvā “paccayapaccayuppannadhammamattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1512_4: añño satto vā puggalo vā natthī”ti vitiṇṇakaṅkho sappaccayanāmarūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0102a:1513_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā assāsapassāsakāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1513_4: Etenassa paguṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhapetvā aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo kathito.
atk-s0102a:1513_5: Ekasmiṃ kāle panidaṃ ubhayaṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0102a:1514_0: Samudayadhammānupassī vāti yathā nāma kammārassa bhastañca gaggaranāḷiñca tajjañca vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto aparāparaṃ sañcarati,
atk-s0102a:1514_1: evaṃ bhikkhuno karajakāyañca nāsapuṭañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsakāyo aparāparaṃ sañcarati.
atk-s0102a:1514_3: te passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1514_4: Vayadhammānupassī vāti yathā bhastāya apanītāya gaggaranāḷiyā bhinnāya tajje ca vāyāme asati so vāto nappavattati,
atk-s0102a:1514_5: evameva kāye bhinne nāsapuṭe viddhaste citte ca niruddhe assāsapassāsakāyo nāma nappavattatīti kāyādinirodhā
atk-s0102a:1514_6: assāsapassāsanirodhoti evaṃ passanto “vayadhammānupassī vā kāyasmiṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1514_7: Samudayavayadhammānupassī vāti kālena samudayaṃ kālena vayaṃ anupassanto.
atk-s0102a:1514_8: Atthi kāyoti vā panassāti kāyova atthi, na satto,
atk-s0102a:1514_11: na attaniyaṃ, nāhaṃ, na mama, na koci,
atk-s0102a:1514_12: na kassacīti evamassa sati paccupaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0102a:1515_4: Atha kho yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya aparāparaṃ uttaruttari ñāṇapamāṇatthāya ceva satipamāṇatthāya ca,
atk-s0102a:1515_6: Anissito ca viharatīti taṇhānissayadiṭṭhinissayānaṃ vasena anissitova viharati.
atk-s0102a:1515_7: Na ca kiñci loke upādiyatīti lokasmiṃ kiñci rūpaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0102a:1515_8: viññāṇaṃ vā “ayaṃ me attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0102a:1515_9: Evampīti upari atthaṃ upādāya sampiṇḍanattho pi- kāro.
atk-s0102a:1515_10: Iminā pana padena bhagavā ānāpānapabbadesanaṃ niyyātetvā dasseti.
atk-s0102a:1516_1: tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayasaccaṃ ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1516_3: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa assāsapassāsavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1519_1: Evaṃ assāsapassāsavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni iriyāpathavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1519_3: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1519_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1519_7: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0102a:1519_8: attasaññaṃ ugghāṭeti kammaṭṭhānañceva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā ca hoti.
atk-s0102a:1519_11: kiṃ kāraṇā gacchatī”ti evaṃ sampajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1520_1: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati.
atk-s0102a:1520_3: Na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā gamanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1520_10: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa purato abhinīhāro gamananti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1521_3: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalakāyassa koṭito paṭṭhāya ussitabhāvo ṭhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1521_7: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena heṭṭhimakāyassa samiñjanaṃ uparimakāyassa ussitabhāvo nisajjāti vuccati.
atk-s0102a:1521_11: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena sakalasarīrassa tiriyato pasāraṇaṃ sayananti vuccatīti.
atk-s0102a:1522_0: Tassa evaṃ pajānato evaṃ hoti “satto gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1522_2: atthato pana koci satto gacchanto vā ṭhito vā natthi.
atk-s0102a:1522_5: na ca kiñci sakaṭaṃ nāma gacchantaṃ vā ṭhitaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0102a:1522_6: cattāro pana goṇe yojetvā chekamhi sārathimhi pājente “sakaṭaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0102a:1522_11: “Gacchāmi tiṭṭhāmī”ti citte uppanne vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0102a:1524_0: Yathā yāti tathā kāyo, yāti vātāhato ayaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1527_0: Ko nāma ettha so satto, yo vinā hetupaccaye;
atk-s0102a:1528_0: Attano ānubhāvena, tiṭṭhe vā yadi vā vaje”ti.
atk-s0102a:1529_0: Tasmā evaṃ hetupaccayavaseneva pavattāni gamanādīni sallakkhento esa “gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti, ṭhito vā,
atk-s0102a:1530_0: Yathā yathā vā panassa kāyo paṇihito hoti,
atk-s0102a:1530_3: yena yena vā ākārenassa kāyo ṭhito hoti,
atk-s0102a:1531_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ attano vā catuiriyāpathapariggaṇhanena kāye kāyānupassī viharati.

atk-s0102a:1531_4: Samudayadhammānupassī vātiādīsu pana avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayotiādinā nayena pañcahākārehi rūpakkhandhassa samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1532_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catuiriyāpathapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1535_1: Evaṃ iriyāpathavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni catusampajaññavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1535_3: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ catusampajaññapariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1535_6: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1535_7: Idhāpi samudayavayadhammānupassītiādīsu rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1536_4: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idamekassa catusampajaññapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno vasena yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1539_1: Evaṃ catusampajaññavasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni paṭikūlamanasikāravasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1539_2: Tattha imameva kāyantiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0102a:1539_3: taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena vitthārato visuddhimagge kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1539_4: Ubhatomukhāti heṭṭhā ca upari cāti dvīhi mukhehi yuttā.
atk-s0102a:1540_1: ubhatomukhā putoḷi viya hi cātumahābhūtiko kāyo,
atk-s0102a:1540_2: tattha missetvā pakkhittanānāvidhadhaññaṃ viya kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā,
atk-s0102a:1540_4: tassa taṃ putoḷiṃ muñcitvā paccavekkhato nānāvidhadhaññassa pākaṭakālo viya yogino dvattiṃsākārassa vibhūtakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1540_5: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ kesādipariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1540_8: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1540_10: Kevalañhi idha dvattiṃsākārapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1543_1: Evaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhātumanasikāravasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1543_3: yathā koci goghātako vā tasseva vā bhattavetanabhato antevāsiko gāviṃ vadhitvā vinivijjhitvā catasso
atk-s0102a:1543_4: disā gatānaṃ mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catumahāpathe koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā nisinno assa,
atk-s0102a:1543_5: evameva bhikkhu catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1543_6: yathāṭhitattā ca yathāpaṇihitaṃ kāyaṃ “atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu…pe…
atk-s0102a:1544_1: yathā goghātakassa gāviṃ posentassāpi āghātanaṃ āharantassāpi āharitvā tattha bandhitvā ṭhapentassapi
atk-s0102a:1544_2: vadhentassāpi vadhitaṃ mataṃ passantassāpi tāvadeva gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0102a:1544_3: yāva naṃ padāletvā bilaso na vibhajati.
atk-s0102a:1544_4: Vibhajitvā nisinnassa panassa gāvīti saññā antaradhāyati,
atk-s0102a:1544_11: evameva imassāpi bhikkhuno pubbe bālaputhujjanakāle gihibhūtassāpi pabbajitassāpi tāvadeva sattoti vā puggaloti vā saññā na antaradhāyati,
atk-s0102a:1544_12: yāva imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso na paccavekkhati.
atk-s0102a:1544_16: “‘imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti.
atk-s0102a:1544_24: bilaso vibhajitvā nisinnabhāvo viya dhātuso paccavekkhaṇanti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-s0102a:1545_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ catudhātupariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1545_3: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1545_5: Kevalañhi idha catudhātupariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1548_1: Evaṃ dhātumanasikāravasena kāyānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni navahi sivathikapabbehi vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1548_8: Kammārabhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1548_14: Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0102a:1548_16: Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi navahi vā vaṇamukhehi vissandamānapubbaṃ vipubbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1549_0: So imameva kāyanti so bhikkhu imaṃ attano kāyaṃ tena kāyena saddhiṃ ñāṇena upasaṃharati upaneti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0102a:1549_1: Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatītoti.
atk-s0102a:1549_3: viññāṇanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāya ayaṃ kāyo ṭhānagamanādikhamo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1549_4: imesaṃ pana vigamā ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃ pūtikasabhāvoyeva,
atk-s0102a:1549_7: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ uddhumātādipariggaṇhanena attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1549_10: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1550_0: Khajjamānanti udarādīsu nisīditvā udaramaṃsaoṭṭhamaṃsaakkhikūṭādīni luñcitvā luñcitvā khādiyamānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1550_2: Nimaṃsalohitamakkhitanti maṃse khīṇepi lohitaṃ na sussati,
atk-s0102a:1550_5: Hatthaṭṭhikanti catusaṭṭhibhedampi hatthaṭṭhikaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1551_1: Pūtīnīti abbhokāse ṭhitāni vātātapavuṭṭhisamphassena terovassikāneva pūtīni honti,
atk-s0102a:1551_4: Sabbattha so imamevāti vuttanayena khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0102a:1551_5: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ khajjamānādipariggaṇhanena yāva cuṇṇakabhāvā attano vā kāye,
atk-s0102a:1551_6: parassa vā kāye kālena vā attano,
atk-s0102a:1551_7: kālena vā parassa kāye kāyānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1552_1: Ekāhamataṃ vāti hi ādinā nayena vuttā sabbāpi ekā,
atk-s0102a:1552_6: aṭṭhikāni apagatasambandhānītiādikā ekā aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkhavaṇṇapaṭibhāgānīti ekā,
atk-s0102a:1553_1: bhikkhaveti idaṃ navasivathikā dassetvā kāyānupassanaṃ niṭṭhapento āha.
atk-s0102a:1553_6: Evaṃ catusaccavasena ussakkitvā nibbutiṃ pāpuṇātīti idaṃ navasivathikapariggāhakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāva arahattā niyyānamukhanti.
atk-s0102a:1555_8: sivathikānaṃ pana ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā sesāni dvādasāpi upacārakammaṭṭhānānevāti.
atk-s0102a:1558_1: Evaṃ bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0102a:1558_3: Tattha sukhaṃ vedananti kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānātīti attho.
atk-s0102a:1558_4: Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi dārakā thaññapivanādikāle sukhaṃ vedayamānā “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmā”ti pajānanti,
atk-s0102a:1558_5: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1558_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
atk-s0102a:1558_9: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattūpaladdhiṃ jahati,
atk-s0102a:1558_14: kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1559_0: Tattha ko vedayatīti na koci satto vā puggalo vā vedayati.
atk-s0102a:1559_1: Kassa vedanāti na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā.
atk-s0102a:1559_2: Kiṃ kāraṇā vedanāti vatthuārammaṇāva panassa vedanā,
atk-s0102a:1559_3: tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti “taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayati taṃ pana vedanāya
atk-s0102a:1559_5: Evaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vedayatīti sallakkhento esa “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātī”ti veditabbo cittalapabbate aññataratthero viya.
atk-s0102a:1560_0: Thero kira aphāsukakāle balavavedanāya nitthunanto aparāparaṃ parivattati,
atk-s0102a:1560_6: Evaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati no,
atk-s0102a:1560_16: Thero vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0102a:1561_2: nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “nirāmisaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1561_3: Iti bhagavā rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento yasmā phassavasena cittavasena vā kathiyamānaṃ pākaṭaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0102a:1561_5: vedanānaṃ pana uppattipākaṭatāya vedanāvasena pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1561_6: tasmā sakkapañhe viya idhāpi vedanāvasena arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0102a:1561_7: Tattha “duvidhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ arūpakammaṭṭhānañcā”tiādi kathāmaggo sakkapañhe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1562_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vedanantiādīsu ayaṃ aparopi pajānanapariyāyo,
atk-s0102a:1562_1: sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhavedanāya abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno “sukhaṃ vedanaṃyeva vedayāmī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1562_3: tassa idāni abhāvato imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya ito paṭhamaṃ abhāvato vedanā nāma aniccā adhuvā vipariṇāmadhammā,
atk-s0102a:1563_3: neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,
atk-s0102a:1563_5: sukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ samaye vedanaṃ vedeti. Yasmiṃ,
atk-s0102a:1563_9: neva tasmiṃ samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti,
atk-s0102a:1563_11: adukkhamasukhaṃyeva tasmiṃ samaye vedanaṃ vedeti. Sukhāpi, kho,
atk-s0102a:1563_13: vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā. Dukkhāpi, kho…pe…
atk-s0102a:1564_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisasannissitā cha gehasitasomanassavedanā.
atk-s0102a:1565_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sukhavedanādipariggaṇhanena attano vā vedanāsu,
atk-s0102a:1565_3: kālena vā parassa vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1565_4: Samudayavayadhammānupassī vāti ettha pana avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayotiādīhi pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi
atk-s0102a:1565_5: vedanānaṃ samudayañca vayañca passanto “samudayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu viharati,
atk-s0102a:1565_8: kālena vayadhammānupassī vā vedanāsu viharatī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1565_10: Kevalañhi idha vedanāpariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā vedanāpariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1568_1: Evaṃ navavidhena vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0102a:1568_5: Idaṃ pana yasmā sammasanaṃ na dhammasamodhānaṃ tasmā idha ekapadepi lokuttaraṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0102a:1568_6: Sesāni cattāri akusalacittāni neva purimapadaṃ na pacchimapadaṃ bhajanti.
atk-s0102a:1569_6: Samāhitanti yassa appanāsamādhi upacārasamādhi vā atthi.
atk-s0102a:1570_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ sarāgādipariggaṇhanena yasmiṃ yasmiṃ khaṇe yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0102a:1570_1: taṃ taṃ sallakkhento attano vā citte,
atk-s0102a:1570_4: kālena vā parassa citte cittānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1570_5: Samudayavayadhammānupassīti ettha pana avijjāsamudayā viññāṇasamudayoti evaṃ pañcahi pañcahi ākārehi viññāṇassa samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo.
atk-s0102a:1570_7: Kevalañhi idha cittapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ padayojanaṃ katvā cittapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1573_1: Evaṃ soḷasavidhena cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā idāni pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ kathetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0102a:1574_1: Asantanti asamudācāravasena vā pahīnattā vā asaṃvijjamānaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1574_2: Yathā cāti yena kāraṇena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1574_4: Iti iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0102a:1575_0: Tattha subhanimitte ayonisomanasikārena kāmacchandassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1575_3: Ayonisomanasikāro nāma anupāyamanasikāro uppathamanasikāro anicce niccanti vā,
atk-s0102a:1575_7: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1575_12: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1576_2: Yonisomanasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro pathamanasikāro anicce aniccanti vā,
atk-s0102a:1576_6: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato kāmacchando pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1576_11: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1577_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti asubhanimittassa uggaho,
atk-s0102a:1577_7: bhāventassāpi indriyesu pihitadvārassāpi catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojanamattaññunopi.
atk-s0102a:1580_0: Asubhakammikatissattherasadise asubhabhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassapi kāmacchando pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1580_4: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnakāmacchandassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1581_0: Paṭighanimitte ayonisomanasikārena pana byāpādassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1581_4: Taṃ tasmiṃ nimitte bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1581_9: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa uppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1582_0: Mettāya pana cetovimuttiyā yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1582_1: Tattha mettāti vutte appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0102a:1582_4: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1582_9: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā byāpādassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā byāpādassa pahānāyā”ti.
atk-s0102a:1583_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti mettānimittassa uggaho mettābhāvanānuyogo kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0102a:1583_2: Odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1583_6: nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi,
atk-s0102a:1583_7: parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccitaṅgāra tattaaya salākagūthādīni gahetvā paraṃ paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0102a:1583_10: esa attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati,
atk-s0102a:1583_11: appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake patissatī”ti
atk-s0102a:1583_12: evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi,
atk-s0102a:1583_14: assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1583_18: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa byāpādassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1584_5: Imesu aratiādīsu ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1584_7: arati tandī vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso līnattaṃ,
atk-s0102a:1585_2: Nikkamadhātu nāma kosajjato nikkhantatāya tato balavataraṃ.
atk-s0102a:1585_3: Parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
atk-s0102a:1585_4: Imasmiṃ tippabhede vīriye yonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1586_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0102a:1586_7: Āharahatthaka tatravaṭṭaka alaṃsāṭaka kākamāsaka bhuttavamitakabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne
atk-s0102a:1586_8: nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0102a:1586_9: catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1586_14: mahākassapattherasadise pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1586_18: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa thinamiddhassa arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1587_0: Cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārena uddhaccakukkuccassa uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1587_3: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato uddhaccakukkuccaṃ uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1588_0: Samādhisaṅkhāte pana cetaso vūpasame yonisomanasikārenassa pahānaṃ hoti. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1589_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti bahussutatā paripucchakatā vinaye pakataññutā vuddhasevitā kalyāṇamittatā sappāyakathāti.
atk-s0102a:1589_1: Bāhussaccenapi hi ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0102a:1589_5: upālittherasadise vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1589_9: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīne uddhaccakukkucce uddhaccassa arahattamaggena,
atk-s0102a:1589_10: kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1590_0: Vicikicchāṭhānīyesu dhammesu ayonisomanasikārena vicikicchāya uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1590_1: Vicikicchāṭhānīyā dhammā nāma punappunaṃ vicikicchāya kāraṇattā vicikicchāva.
atk-s0102a:1590_2: Tattha ayonisomanasikāraṃ bahulaṃ pavattayato vicikicchā uppajjati. Tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1591_0: Kusalādidhammesu yonisomanasikārena panassā pahānaṃ hoti, tenāha – “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1591_2: kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā sevitabbāsevitabbā dhammā hīnapaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā.
atk-s0102a:1592_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti bahussutatā,
atk-s0102a:1592_7: pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1592_11: saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0102a:1592_15: Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnāya vicikicchāya sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1593_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇapariggaṇhanena attano vā dhammesu,
atk-s0102a:1593_3: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1593_4: Samudayavayā panettha subhanimittaasubhanimittādīsu ayonisomanasikārayonisomanasikāravasena pañcasu nīvaraṇesu vuttāyeva nīharitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1593_6: Kevalañhi idha nīvaraṇapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā nīvaraṇapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1596_1: Evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni pañcakkhandhavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1596_2: Tattha pañcasu upādānakkhandhesūti upādānassa khandhā upādānakkhandhā,
atk-s0102a:1597_2: na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthīti sabhāvato rūpaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1597_5: vitthārena pana rūpādīni visuddhimagge khandhakathāyameva vuttāni.
atk-s0102a:1597_6: Iti rūpassa samudayoti evaṃ avijjāsamudayādivasena pañcahākārehi rūpassa samudayo.
atk-s0102a:1597_7: Iti rūpassa atthaṅgamoti evaṃ avijjānirodhādivasena pañcahākārehi rūpassa atthaṅgamo.
atk-s0102a:1598_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ pañcakkhandhapariggaṇhanena attano vā dhammesu,
atk-s0102a:1598_3: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1598_4: Samudayavayā panettha “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādīnaṃ pañcasu khandhesu vuttānaṃ paññāsāya lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena nīharitabbā.
atk-s0102a:1598_6: Kevalañhi idha khandhapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā khandhapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1601_1: Evaṃ pañcakkhandhavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni āyatanavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1601_2: Tattha chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesūti cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo manoti imesu chasu ajjhattikesu,
atk-s0102a:1601_3: rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso phoṭṭhabbo dhammoti imesu chasu bāhiresu.
atk-s0102a:1601_5: Rūpe ca pajānātīti bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasena pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1601_6: Yañca tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppajjati saṃyojananti yañca taṃ cakkhuṃ ceva rūpe cāti ubhayaṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0102a:1602_1: Cakkhudvāre tāva āpāthagataṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ kāmassādavasena assādayato abhinandato kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1602_3: “Ṭhapetvā maṃ ko añño etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ samattho atthī”ti maññato mānasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1602_4: Etaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ niccaṃ dhuvanti gaṇhato diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1602_6: sattassa nu kho”ti vicikicchato vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1602_7: “Sampattibhave vata no idaṃ sulabhaṃ jāta”nti bhavaṃ patthentassa bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1602_8: “Āyatimpi evarūpaṃ sīlabbataṃ samādiyitvā sakkā laddhu”nti sīlabbataṃ samādiyantassa sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1602_9: “Aho vata taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ aññe na labheyyu”nti usūyato issāsaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1602_10: Attanā laddhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ aññassa maccharāyato macchariyasaṃyojanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1603_0: Yathā ca anuppannassāti yena kāraṇena asamudācāravasena anuppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi saṃyojanassa uppādo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1603_2: Yathā ca uppannassāti appahīnaṭṭhena pana samudācāravasena vā uppannassa tassa dasavidhassāpi saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1603_4: Yathā ca pahīnassāti tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena pahīnassāpi tassa dasavidhassa saṃyojanassa yena kāraṇena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti,
atk-s0102a:1603_6: Kena kāraṇena panassa āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti?
atk-s0102a:1603_7: Diṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsaissāmacchariyabhedassa tāva pañcavidhassa saṃyojanassa sotāpattimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1603_11: Sotañca pajānāti sadde cātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0102a:1603_12: Apicettha āyatanakathā vitthārato visuddhimagge āyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1604_0: Iti ajjhattaṃ vāti evaṃ ajjhattikāyatanapariggaṇhanena attano vā dhammesu bāhirāyatanapariggaṇhanena parassa vā dhammesu,
atk-s0102a:1604_2: kālena vā parassa dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati.
atk-s0102a:1604_8: Kevalañhi idha āyatanapariggāhikā sati dukkhasaccanti evaṃ yojanaṃ katvā āyatanapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno niyyānamukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1607_1: Evaṃ cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanavasena dhammānupassanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni bojjhaṅgavasena vibhajituṃ puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0102a:1607_5: Ettha hi sambujjhati āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhi.
atk-s0102a:1607_6: Yāya vā so satiādikāya sattadhammasāmaggiyā sambujjhati kilesaniddāto uṭṭhāti,
atk-s0102a:1608_1: Yathā ca anupannassātiādīsu pana satisambojjhaṅgassa tāva “atthi,
atk-s0102a:1608_6: uppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1608_9: Taṃ tattha bahulaṃ pavattayato satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1609_0: Apica cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti satisampajaññaṃ muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0102a:1609_5: ṭhānanisajjādīsu satisamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatāya ca satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1609_6: Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1610_6: uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1611_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā vatthuvisadakiriyā
atk-s0102a:1611_7: tadā ajjhattikaṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1611_8: Yadā pana cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0102a:1611_11: Tasmā kesādichedāpanena uddhaṃvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi sarīrasallahukabhāvakaraṇena ucchādananahāpanena ca ajjhattikavatthu visadaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1611_13: Etasmiñhi ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ
atk-s0102a:1611_14: aparisuddhāni dīpakapallavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
atk-s0102a:1611_15: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallavaṭṭitelāni
atk-s0102a:1612_12: atha saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0102a:1612_16: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
atk-s0102a:1613_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
atk-s0102a:1613_5: Cittuppādamatteneva kusalaṃ hotīti atidhāvitvā dānādīni akaronto niraye uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1613_7: Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0102a:1613_8: Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0102a:1613_9: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati,
atk-s0102a:1613_10: vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati.
atk-s0102a:1614_2: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
atk-s0102a:1614_8: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato,

atk-s0102a:1614_18: Duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā nāma khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññānaṃ dummedhapuggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ.
atk-s0102a:1614_20: Gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā nāma gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā.
atk-s0102a:1614_22: Evaṃ uppannassa pannassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūri hotīti pajānāti.
atk-s0102a:1615_5: uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ uppādo hoti.
atk-s0102a:1616_0: Apica ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇatā ānisaṃsadassāvitā
atk-s0102a:1617_3: pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi khuppipāsāhi āturībhūtakālepi,
atk-s0102a:1617_6: ayameva te bhikkhu kālo vīriyakaraṇāyāti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1618_1: āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā ayamānisaṃso vīriyassāti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinopi uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1618_3: so ca na sakkā kusītena gantunti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1618_7: nāpi taṃ nissāya jīvissāmāti te paṇītāni cīvarādīni denti.
atk-s0102a:1618_8: Atha kho attano kārānaṃ mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsamānā denti.
atk-s0102a:1618_9: Satthārāpi “ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhībahulo sukhaṃ viharissatī”ti na evaṃ sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññātā.
atk-s0102a:1618_10: Atha kho “ayaṃ ime paribhuñjamāno samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī”ti te paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0102a:1618_11: so dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apacāyissati.
atk-s0102a:1618_12: Āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati ayyamittattherassa viya.
atk-s0102a:1619_1: Tassa ca gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0102a:1619_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma,
atk-s0102a:1619_7: tava bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-s0102a:1619_9: Ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkapārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjiyena bhuttāmhī”ti.
atk-s0102a:1619_11: Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ pacitvā ṭhapehi ammā,ti.
atk-s0102a:1620_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi “mahāupāsikā kira kañjiyena pārivāsikabhattaṃ bhuñji,
atk-s0102a:1620_3: taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ na vatthuṃ na bhattaṃ na vatthaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0102a:1620_5: tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0102a:1620_7: ayaṃ kho pana piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā gaṇhitu”nti pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0102a:1620_8: gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce cīvaraṃ cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā
atk-s0102a:1620_9: “arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0102a:1620_10: Dīgharattaṃ appamatto hutvā nivutthabhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purebhattameva arahattaṃ patvā vikasamānamiva
atk-s0102a:1622_0: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0102a:1623_1: piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ arahantānaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā mahallakitthiyo dukkhā muccissantī”ti āha.
atk-s0102a:1623_2: Thero uṭṭhahitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā kālaṃ olokento “pātoyevā”ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0102a:1624_0: Dārikāpi bhattaṃ sampādetvā “idāni me bhātā āgamissati,
atk-s0102a:1624_2: Sā there gharadvāraṃ sampatte pattaṃ gahetvā sappiphāṇitayojitassa khīrapiṇḍapātassa pūretvā hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0102a:1624_5: Therassa hi tadā ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-s0102a:1624_7: mukhaṃ bandhanā pavuttatālapakkaṃ viya ativiya virocittha.
atk-s0102a:1625_3: Upāsikā “ajja mama puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti ñatvā “abhiramati te, amma,
atk-s0102a:1626_0: Mahantaṃ kho panetaṃ satthudāyajjaṃ yadidaṃ satta ariyadhanāni nāma,
atk-s0102a:1626_2: Yathā hi vippaṭipannaṃ puttaṃ mātāpitaro “ayaṃ amhākaṃ aputto”ti paribāhiraṃ karonti,
atk-s0102a:1626_3: so tesaṃ accayena dāyajjaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0102a:1626_4: evaṃ kusītopi idaṃ ariyadhanadāyajjaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0102a:1627_1: satthuno hi te mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhigaṇhanakālepi abhinikkhamanepi abhisambodhiyampi dhammacakkappavattanayamakapāṭihāriyadevorohanaāyusaṅkhāravossajjanesupi
atk-s0102a:1627_3: yuttaṃ nu te evarūpassa satthu sāsane pabbajitvā kusītena bhavitunti evaṃ satthumahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0102a:1628_4: tayā nāma evarūpena jinaputtena hutvā na yuttaṃ kusītena viharitunti evaṃ jātimahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
